01066 
01067 
01068 // the tries to select a mapscreen character by his soldier ID
01069 BOOLEAN SetInfoChar( UINT8 ubID )
01070 {
01071       INT8 bCounter;
01072 
01073       for ( bCounter = 0; bCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; bCounter++)
01074       {
01075             // skip invalid characters
01076             if ( gCharactersList[ bCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
01077             {
01078                   if ( gCharactersList[ bCounter ].usSolID == (UINT16)ubID )
01079                   {
01080                         ChangeSelectedInfoChar( bCounter, TRUE );
01081                         return( TRUE );
01082                   }
01083             }
01084       }
01085 
01086       return ( FALSE );
01087 }
01088 
01089 
01090 
01091 void DisplayDestinationOfCurrentDestMerc( void )
01092 {
01093       // will display the dest of the current dest merc
01094       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
01095       INT16 sX, sY;
01096       INT16 sSector;
01097 
01098       SetFont( MAP_SCREEN_FONT );
01099 
01100       sSector = GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( &Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID] );
01101 
01102       SetBoxForeground(ghVehicleBox, FONT_LTGREEN);
01103       SetBoxBackground(ghVehicleBox, FONT_BLACK);
01104 
01105       swprintf( sString, L"%s%s", pMapVertIndex[ sSector / MAP_WORLD_X ], pMapHortIndex[ sSector % MAP_WORLD_X ] );
01106       FindFontCenterCoordinates(DEST_PLOT_X, DEST_PLOT_Y ,70 ,GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) ,sString , MAP_SCREEN_FONT, &sX, &sY);
01107 
01108       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( DEST_PLOT_X, DEST_PLOT_Y ,70 ,GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) );
01109       mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
01110 }
01111 
01112 
01113 
01114 void ContractBoxGlow( void )
01115 {
01116 /* Why not?
01117  static INT32 iColorNum=10;
01118  static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
01119  static BOOLEAN fOldContractGlow = FALSE;
01120  UINT16 usColor;
01121  UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01122  UINT8      *pDestBuf;
01123 
01124 
01125       // stopped glowing?
01126       if( ( fGlowContractRegion == FALSE )&&( ( fOldContractGlow == TRUE )||( fResetContractGlow== TRUE ) ) )
01127       {
01128             // restore background
01129             // RestoreExternBackgroundRect( CONTRACT_X, CONTRACT_Y, CONTRACT_WIDTH+1, CONTRACT_HEIGHT+1 );
01130  
01131             // reset old
01132             fOldContractGlow = FALSE;
01133       }
01134 
01135       // not glowing right now, leave
01136       if( ( fGlowContractRegion == FALSE )||( fResetContractGlow == TRUE ) )
01137       {
01138             // reset color rotation
01139             iColorNum =0;
01140             fDelta = TRUE;
01141 
01142             // reset
01143             fResetContractGlow = FALSE;
01144             return;
01145       }
01146 
01147       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
01148       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
01149             return;
01150 
01151 
01152       // change direction of glow?
01153       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
01154       {
01155        fDelta=!fDelta;
01156       }
01157 
01158       // increment color
01159       if(!fDelta)
01160             iColorNum++;
01161       else
01162             iColorNum--;
01163 
01164       usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
01165       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
01166       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480);
01167       RectangleDraw( TRUE, CONTRACT_X, CONTRACT_Y, CONTRACT_X+CONTRACT_WIDTH, CONTRACT_Y+CONTRACT_HEIGHT, usColor, pDestBuf );      
01168       InvalidateRegion(CONTRACT_X, CONTRACT_Y, CONTRACT_X+CONTRACT_WIDTH+1, CONTRACT_Y+CONTRACT_HEIGHT+1);
01169       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01170 
01171       // restore background
01172       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==1))
01173             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( CONTRACT_X, CONTRACT_Y, CONTRACT_WIDTH+1, CONTRACT_HEIGHT+1 );
01174 */
01175 }
01176 
01177 
01178 void ContractListRegionBoxGlow( UINT16 usCount )
01179 {
01180  static INT32 iColorNum =10;
01181  static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
01182  UINT16 usColor;
01183  UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01184  UINT8      *pDestBuf;
01185  INT16 usY = 0;
01186  INT16 sYAdd = 0;
01187  INT16 sYStart = 0;
01188  INT16 usVehicleCount = 0;
01189 
01190 
01191       // if not glowing right now, leave
01192       if( ( giContractHighLine == -1 )||( fResetContractGlow == TRUE ) || fShowInventoryFlag )
01193       {
01194             iColorNum = 0;
01195             fDelta = TRUE;
01196             return;
01197       }
01198 
01199       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
01200       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
01201             return;
01202 
01203 
01204       // change direction of glow?
01205       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
01206       {
01207        fDelta=!fDelta;
01208       }
01209 
01210       // increment color
01211       if(!fDelta)
01212             iColorNum++;
01213       else
01214             iColorNum--;
01215 
01216 
01217       // WANNE 2
01218       if( usCount >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
01219       {
01220             usVehicleCount = usCount - FIRST_VEHICLE;
01221             sYStart = usVehicleY;
01222             usY=(Y_OFFSET*usVehicleCount-1)+(sYStart+(usVehicleCount*Y_SIZE));      
01223       }
01224       else
01225       {
01226             sYStart = Y_START;
01227             usY=(Y_OFFSET*usCount-1)+(sYStart+(usCount*Y_SIZE));  
01228       }
01229 
01230       // y start position of box
01231       //usY=(Y_OFFSET*usCount-1)+(Y_START+(usCount*Y_SIZE) + sYAdd );   
01232 
01233       // WANNE 2 <this is not correct!!>
01234       //usY=(Y_OFFSET*usCount-1)+(sYStart+(usCount*Y_SIZE));      
01235 
01236       // glow contract box
01237       usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
01238       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
01239       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
01240       RectangleDraw( TRUE, TIME_REMAINING_X, usY, TIME_REMAINING_X + TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, usY + GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 2, usColor, pDestBuf ); 
01241       InvalidateRegion(TIME_REMAINING_X - 1, usY, TIME_REMAINING_X + TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH + 1, usY + GetFontHeight( MAP_SCREEN_FONT ) + 3 );
01242       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01243 
01244 /*
01245       // restore background
01246       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==1))
01247             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( CONTRACT_X, CONTRACT_Y, CONTRACT_WIDTH+1, CONTRACT_HEIGHT+1 );
01248 */
01249 }
01250 
01251 
01252 void GlowFace( void )
01253 {
01254  static INT32 iColorNum =10;
01255  static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
01256  static BOOLEAN fOldFaceGlow = FALSE;
01257  UINT16 usColor;
01258  UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01259  UINT8      *pDestBuf;
01260  INT16 usY = 0;
01261 
01262 
01263       // not glowing right now, leave
01264       if( fShowFaceHightLight == FALSE )
01265       {
01266             iColorNum =0;
01267             fDelta = TRUE;
01268 
01269             if( fOldFaceGlow == TRUE )
01270             {
01271                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 9, 18, ( UINT16 )( 61 - 9 ), ( UINT16 )( 64 - 18 ) );
01272             }
01273 
01274             fOldFaceGlow = FALSE;
01275             return;
01276       }
01277 
01278       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
01279       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
01280             return;
01281 
01282 
01283       fOldFaceGlow = TRUE;
01284 
01285       // change direction of glow?
01286       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
01287       {
01288        fDelta=!fDelta;
01289       }
01290 
01291       // increment color
01292       if(!fDelta)
01293             iColorNum++;
01294       else
01295             iColorNum--;
01296 
01297       // glow contract box
01298       usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
01299       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
01300       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
01301       RectangleDraw( TRUE, 9, 18, 60, 63 , usColor, pDestBuf );   
01302       InvalidateRegion( 9, 18, 61, 64 );
01303       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01304 
01305       // restore background
01306       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==1))
01307             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 9, 18, ( UINT16 )( 61 - 9 ), ( UINT16 )( 64 - 18 ) );
01308 }
01309 
01310 
01311 void GlowItem( void )
01312 {
01313  static INT32 iColorNum =10;
01314  static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
01315  static BOOLEAN fOldItemGlow = FALSE;
01316  UINT16 usColor;
01317  UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01318  UINT8      *pDestBuf;
01319  INT16 usY = 0;
01320 
01321 
01322       // not glowing right now, leave
01323       if( fShowItemHighLight == FALSE )
01324       {
01325             iColorNum =0;
01326             fDelta = TRUE;
01327 
01328             if( fOldItemGlow == TRUE )
01329             {
01330                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 3, 80, ( UINT16 )( 65 - 3 ), ( UINT16 )( 105 - 80 ) );
01331             }
01332 
01333             fOldItemGlow = FALSE;
01334             return;
01335       }
01336 
01337       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
01338       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
01339             return;
01340 
01341 
01342       fOldItemGlow = TRUE;
01343 
01344       // change direction of glow?
01345       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
01346       {
01347        fDelta=!fDelta;
01348       }
01349 
01350       // increment color
01351       if(!fDelta)
01352             iColorNum++;
01353       else
01354             iColorNum--;
01355 
01356       // restore background
01357       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==1))
01358       {
01359             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 3, 80, ( UINT16 )( 65 - 3 ), ( UINT16 )( 105 - 80 ) );
01360             RenderHandPosItem();
01361       }
01362 
01363       // glow contract box
01364       usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
01365       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
01366       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
01367       RectangleDraw( TRUE, 3, 80, 64, 104 , usColor, pDestBuf );  
01368       InvalidateRegion( 3, 80, 65, 105 );
01369       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01370 }
01371 
01372 
01373 void GlowTrashCan( void )
01374 {
01375  static INT32 iColorNum =10;
01376  static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
01377  static BOOLEAN fOldTrashCanGlow = FALSE;
01378  UINT16 usColor;
01379  UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01380  UINT8      *pDestBuf;
01381  INT16 usY = 0;
01382 
01383 
01384       if( fShowInventoryFlag == FALSE )
01385       {
01386             fShowTrashCanHighLight = FALSE;
01387       }
01388 
01389       // not glowing right now, leave
01390       if( fShowTrashCanHighLight == FALSE )
01391       {
01392             iColorNum =0;
01393             fDelta = TRUE;
01394 
01395             if( fOldTrashCanGlow == TRUE )
01396             {
01397                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( TRASH_CAN_X, TRASH_CAN_Y, ( UINT16 )( TRASH_CAN_WIDTH + 2 ), ( UINT16 )( TRASH_CAN_HEIGHT + 2 ) );
01398             }
01399 
01400             fOldTrashCanGlow = FALSE;
01401             return;
01402       }
01403 
01404       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
01405       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
01406             return;
01407 
01408 
01409       fOldTrashCanGlow = TRUE;
01410 
01411       // glow contract box
01412       usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
01413       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
01414       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
01415       RectangleDraw( TRUE, TRASH_CAN_X, TRASH_CAN_Y , TRASH_CAN_X + TRASH_CAN_WIDTH, TRASH_CAN_Y + TRASH_CAN_HEIGHT , usColor, pDestBuf );      
01416       InvalidateRegion( TRASH_CAN_X, TRASH_CAN_Y, TRASH_CAN_X + TRASH_CAN_WIDTH + 1, TRASH_CAN_Y + TRASH_CAN_HEIGHT + 1 );
01417       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01418 
01419       // restore background
01420       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==1))
01421             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( TRASH_CAN_X, TRASH_CAN_Y, ( UINT16 )( TRASH_CAN_WIDTH + 2 ), ( UINT16 )( TRASH_CAN_HEIGHT + 2 ) );
01422 }
01423 
01424 
01425 
01426 void DrawFace( INT16 sCharNumber )
01427 {
01428       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01429       static INT16 sOldId = -1;
01430       
01431       // draws the face of the currently selected merc, being displayed int he upper left hand corner
01432 
01433       // grab the soldier
01434       if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
01435       {
01436             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid )
01437             {
01438                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID );
01439             }
01440       }
01441 
01442       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01443       {
01444             return;
01445       }
01446 
01447 
01448       if( ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID == sOldId )&&( fReDrawFace == FALSE ) )
01449       {
01450             // are the same, return
01451             return;
01452       }
01453 
01454       // get old id value
01455       sOldId = gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID;
01456 
01457       // reset redraw of face
01458       fReDrawFace = FALSE;
01459 
01460       // render their face
01461       RenderSoldierFace( pSoldier, SOLDIER_PIC_X, SOLDIER_PIC_Y, TRUE );
01462       
01463       return;
01464 }
01465 
01466 
01467 
01468 void RenderHandPosItem( void )
01469 {
01470       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01471       // renders the inventory item in char's right hand
01472 
01473       // ARM: if already in the inventory panel, don't show the item again here, seeing it twice is confusing
01474       if ( fShowInventoryFlag )
01475       {
01476             return;
01477       }
01478 
01479 
01480       // grab the soldier
01481       if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
01482       {
01483             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid )
01484             {
01485                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID );
01486             }
01487       }
01488 
01489       if( pSoldier == NULL )
01490       {
01491             return;
01492       }
01493 
01494       // check if still alive?
01495       if( pSoldier -> bLife == 0 )
01496       {
01497             return;
01498       }
01499 
01500       SetFont(BLOCKFONT2);
01501       SetFontForeground(CHAR_INFO_PANEL_BLOCK_COLOR);
01502       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01503 
01504       INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier, &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), SOLDIER_HAND_X, SOLDIER_HAND_Y,    58, 23, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, 0, FALSE, 0);
01505 }
01506 
01507 
01508 
01509 void RenderIconsForUpperLeftCornerPiece( INT8 bCharNumber )
01510 {
01511       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01512 
01513       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiULICONS);
01514 
01515       // if merc is an AIM merc
01516       if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
01517       {
01518             // finite contract length icon
01519             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hHandle, 0, CHAR_ICON_X, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01520       }
01521 
01522       // if merc has life insurance
01523       if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ].usLifeInsurance > 0 )
01524       {
01525             // draw life insurance icon
01526             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hHandle, 2, CHAR_ICON_X, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + CHAR_ICON_SPACING, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01527       }
01528 
01529       // if merc has a medical deposit
01530       if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ].usMedicalDeposit > 0 )
01531       {
01532             // draw medical deposit icon
01533             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hHandle, 1, CHAR_ICON_X, CHAR_ICON_CONTRACT_Y + ( 2 * CHAR_ICON_SPACING ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL ); 
01534       }
01535 }
01536 
01537 
01538 void DrawPay(INT16 sCharNumber)
01539 {
01540       // will draw the pay
01541       INT32 uiSalary;
01542       wchar_t sString[7];
01543       UINT16 usX, usY;
01544       INT16 usMercProfileID;
01545 
01546 
01547       // get merc id
01548       usMercProfileID = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ] -> ubProfile;
01549       
01550       // grab salary
01551       uiSalary=( ( UINT32 ) gMercProfiles[ usMercProfileID ].sSalary );
01552       
01553       
01554       // font stuff
01555       SetFontForeground( CHAR_TITLE_FONT_COLOR );
01556       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01557       
01558       // parse salary 
01559       swprintf( sString, L"%d", uiSalary );
01560       
01561       // right justify salary
01562       FindFontRightCoordinates(CHAR_PAY_X,CHAR_PAY_Y , CHAR_PAY_WID,CHAR_PAY_HEI ,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01563       
01564       // draw salary
01565       DrawString(sString,usX, usY, CHAR_FONT);
01566 }
01567 
01568 void DrawCharBars( void )
01569 {
01570       UINT16 usSoldierID;
01571       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01572 
01573       // will draw the heath, morale and breath bars for a character being displayed in the upper left hand corner 
01574 
01575       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )&&( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) )
01576       {
01577             // error, no character to display right now
01578             return;
01579       }
01580       else
01581       {
01582             // valid character
01583             if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
01584             {
01585                   usSoldierID=gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID;
01586             }
01587             else
01588             {
01589                   usSoldierID=gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID;
01590             }
01591 
01592             // grab soldier's id number
01593             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, usSoldierID );
01594 
01595             if( pSoldier == NULL )
01596             {
01597                   // no soldier
01598                   return;
01599             }
01600 
01601             // skip POWs, dead guys
01602             if( ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 ) ||
01603                         ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) ||
01604                         ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
01605             {
01606                   return;
01607             }
01608 
01609             // current health
01610             DrawLifeUIBarEx( pSoldier, BAR_INFO_X, BAR_INFO_Y,3,42, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
01611 
01612             // robot doesn't have energy/fuel
01613             if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01614             {
01615                   // current energy/fuel
01616                   DrawBreathUIBarEx( pSoldier, BAR_INFO_X + 6, BAR_INFO_Y,3,42, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
01617             }
01618 
01619             // vehicles and robot don't have morale
01620             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01621             {
01622                   // draw morale bar
01623                   DrawMoraleUIBarEx( pSoldier, BAR_INFO_X + 12, BAR_INFO_Y,3,42, TRUE, FRAME_BUFFER );
01624             }
01625       }
01626 
01627       return;
01628 }
01629 
01630 
01631 void DrawCharStats( INT16 sCharNum )
01632 {
01633       // will draw the characters stats, max life, strength, dex, and skills
01634       wchar_t sString[9];
01635       UINT16 usX, usY;
01636       //HVOBJECT hCrossHandle;
01637       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01638 
01639       pSoldier = &Menptr[gCharactersList[sCharNum].usSolID];
01640 
01641       // set up font
01642       SetFont(CHAR_FONT);
01643       SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01644       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01645       
01646 
01647       // strength
01648       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bStrength);
01649 
01650       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeStrengthTime)&& ( pSoldier->uiChangeStrengthTime != 0 ) )
01651       {
01652             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & STRENGTH_INCREASE )
01653             {
01654                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01655             }
01656             else
01657             {
01658                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01659             }
01660       }
01661       else
01662       {
01663             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01664       }
01665 
01666       // right justify
01667       FindFontRightCoordinates(STR_X, STR_Y ,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI ,sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01668       DrawString(sString,usX, STR_Y,CHAR_FONT );
01669 
01670       // dexterity 
01671       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bDexterity );
01672 
01673       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeDexterityTime ) && ( pSoldier->uiChangeDexterityTime != 0 ) )
01674       {
01675             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & DEX_INCREASE )
01676             {
01677                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01678             }
01679             else
01680             {
01681                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01682             }
01683       }
01684       else
01685       {
01686             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01687       }
01688 
01689       // right justify
01690       FindFontRightCoordinates(DEX_X,DEX_Y ,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI ,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);      
01691       DrawString(sString,usX, DEX_Y,CHAR_FONT );
01692 
01693       // agility
01694       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bAgility );
01695 
01696       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeAgilityTime)&& ( pSoldier->uiChangeAgilityTime != 0 ) )
01697       {
01698             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & AGIL_INCREASE )
01699             {
01700                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01701             }
01702             else
01703             {
01704                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01705             }
01706       }
01707       else
01708       {
01709             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01710       }
01711 
01712       // right justify
01713       FindFontRightCoordinates(AGL_X,AGL_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI ,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01714       DrawString(sString,usX, AGL_Y,CHAR_FONT );
01715 
01716       // wisdom
01717       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bWisdom );
01718 
01719       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeWisdomTime )&&( pSoldier->uiChangeWisdomTime != 0 ))
01720       {
01721             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & WIS_INCREASE )
01722             {
01723                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01724             }
01725             else
01726             {
01727                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01728             }
01729       }
01730       else
01731       {
01732             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01733       }
01734 
01735       // right justify
01736       FindFontRightCoordinates( WIS_X,WIS_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01737       DrawString(sString,usX, WIS_Y,CHAR_FONT );
01738 
01739       // leadership
01740       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bLeadership );
01741       
01742       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeLeadershipTime ) && ( pSoldier->uiChangeLeadershipTime != 0 ) )
01743       {
01744             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & LDR_INCREASE )
01745             {
01746                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01747             }
01748             else
01749             {
01750                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01751             }
01752       }
01753       else
01754       {
01755             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01756       }
01757 
01758       // right justify
01759       FindFontRightCoordinates(LDR_X,LDR_Y,STAT_WID,STAT_HEI, sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01760       DrawString(sString,usX, LDR_Y,CHAR_FONT );
01761 
01762       // experience level
01763       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bExpLevel );
01764 
01765       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeLevelTime)&&( pSoldier->uiChangeLevelTime != 0 ) )
01766       {
01767             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & LVL_INCREASE )
01768             {
01769                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01770             }
01771             else
01772             {
01773                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01774             }
01775       }
01776       else
01777       {
01778             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01779       }
01780 
01781       // right justify
01782       FindFontRightCoordinates(LVL_X,LVL_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01783       DrawString(sString,usX, LVL_Y,CHAR_FONT ); 
01784 
01785       // marksmanship
01786       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bMarksmanship );
01787 
01788       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeMarksmanshipTime) && ( pSoldier->uiChangeMarksmanshipTime != 0 ) )
01789       {
01790             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & MRK_INCREASE )
01791             {
01792                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01793             }
01794             else
01795             {
01796                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01797             }
01798       }
01799       else
01800       {
01801             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01802       }
01803 
01804       // right justify 
01805       FindFontRightCoordinates(MRK_X,MRK_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01806       DrawString(sString,usX, MRK_Y,CHAR_FONT ); 
01807 
01808       // explosives
01809       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bExplosive );
01810 
01811       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeExplosivesTime)&& ( pSoldier->uiChangeExplosivesTime != 0 ) )
01812       {
01813             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & EXP_INCREASE )
01814             {
01815                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01816             }
01817             else
01818             {
01819                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01820             }
01821       }
01822       else
01823       {
01824             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01825       }
01826 
01827       // right justify
01828       FindFontRightCoordinates(EXP_X,EXP_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01829       DrawString(sString,usX, EXP_Y,CHAR_FONT ); 
01830       
01831       // mechanical
01832       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bMechanical );
01833 
01834       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeMechanicalTime )&& ( pSoldier->uiChangeMechanicalTime != 0 ) )
01835       {
01836             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & MECH_INCREASE )
01837             {
01838                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01839             }
01840             else
01841             {
01842                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01843             }
01844       }
01845       else
01846       {
01847             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01848       }
01849 
01850       // right justify
01851       FindFontRightCoordinates(MEC_X,MEC_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01852       DrawString(sString,usX, MEC_Y,CHAR_FONT ); 
01853       
01854       // medical
01855       swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bMedical );
01856 
01857       if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeMedicalTime)&& ( pSoldier->uiChangeMedicalTime != 0 ) )
01858       {
01859             if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & MED_INCREASE )
01860             {
01861                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01862             }
01863             else
01864             {
01865                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01866             }
01867       }
01868       else
01869       {
01870             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01871       }
01872 
01873       // right justify
01874       FindFontRightCoordinates(MED_X,MED_Y,STAT_WID ,STAT_HEI,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01875       DrawString(sString,usX, MED_Y,CHAR_FONT );
01876 
01877       SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01878 
01879       return;
01880 }
01881 
01882 
01883 
01884 void DrawCharHealth( INT16 sCharNum )
01885 {
01886       UINT32 uiHealthPercent = 0;
01887       wchar_t sString[9];
01888       UINT16 usX, usY;
01889       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01890 
01891 
01892       pSoldier = &Menptr[gCharactersList[sCharNum].usSolID];
01893 
01894       if( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
01895       {
01896             // find starting X coordinate by centering all 3 substrings together, then print them separately (different colors)!
01897             swprintf( sString, L"%d/%d", pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->bLifeMax );
01898             FindFontCenterCoordinates(CHAR_HP_X, CHAR_HP_Y, CHAR_HP_WID, CHAR_HP_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01899 
01900 
01901             if ( pSoldier->bLifeMax > 0 )
01902             {
01903                   uiHealthPercent = ( pSoldier->bLife * 100 ) / pSoldier->bLifeMax;
01904             }
01905 
01906             // how is characters life?
01907             if (uiHealthPercent == 0)
01908             {
01909                   // he's dead, Jim
01910                   SetFontForeground(FONT_METALGRAY);
01911             }
01912             else
01913             if (uiHealthPercent < 25)
01914             {
01915                   // very bad
01916                   SetFontForeground(FONT_RED);
01917             }
01918             else
01919             if (uiHealthPercent < 50)
01920             {
01921                   // not good
01922                   SetFontForeground(FONT_YELLOW);
01923             }
01924             else
01925             {
01926                   // ok
01927                   SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01928             }
01929 
01930             // current life
01931             swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bLife );
01932             DrawString( sString, usX, CHAR_HP_Y, CHAR_FONT );
01933             usX += StringPixLength( sString, CHAR_FONT );
01934 
01935 
01936             // slash
01937             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01938             wcscpy( sString, L"/" );
01939             DrawString( sString, usX, CHAR_HP_Y, CHAR_FONT );
01940             usX += StringPixLength( sString, CHAR_FONT );
01941 
01942 
01943             if( ( GetJA2Clock() < CHANGE_STAT_RECENTLY_DURATION + pSoldier->uiChangeHealthTime)&& ( pSoldier->uiChangeHealthTime != 0 ) )
01944             {
01945                   if( pSoldier->usValueGoneUp & HEALTH_INCREASE )
01946                   {
01947                         SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01948                   }
01949                   else
01950                   {
01951                         SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01952                   }
01953             }
01954             else
01955             {
01956                   SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01957             }
01958 
01959             // maximum life
01960             swprintf( sString, L"%d", pSoldier->bLifeMax );
01961             DrawString( sString, usX, CHAR_HP_Y, CHAR_FONT );
01962       }
01963       else
01964       {
01965             // POW - health unknown
01966             SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01967             swprintf( sString, pPOWStrings[ 1 ] );
01968             FindFontCenterCoordinates(CHAR_HP_X, CHAR_HP_Y, CHAR_HP_WID, CHAR_HP_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
01969             DrawString(sString, usX, CHAR_HP_Y, CHAR_FONT);
01970       }
01971 
01972 
01973       SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01974 }
01975 
01976 
01977 
01978 // "character" refers to hired people AND vehicles
01979 void DrawCharacterInfo(INT16 sCharNumber)
01980 {
01981       wchar_t sString[80];
01982       UINT16 usX, usY;
01983       INT16 usMercProfileID;
01984       INT32 iTimeRemaining=0;
01985       INT8 bMorale =0;
01986       INT32 iDailyCost = 0;
01987       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01988       UINT32 uiArrivalTime;
01989 
01990 
01991       if( gCharactersList[sCharNumber].fValid == FALSE )
01992       {
01993             return;
01994       }
01995 
01996       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[sCharNumber].usSolID ];
01997 
01998       if( pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
01999       {
02000             return;
02001       }
02002 
02003 
02004       // draw particular info about a character that are neither attributes nor skills
02005       
02006 
02007       // get profile information
02008       usMercProfileID = pSoldier->ubProfile;
02009 
02010 
02011       // set font stuff
02012       SetFont(CHAR_FONT);
02013       SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
02014       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
02015 
02016 
02017       // Nickname (beneath Picture)
02018       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02019       {
02020             // vehicle
02021             wcscpy(sString, pShortVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].ubVehicleType ]);
02022       }
02023       else
02024       {
02025             // soldier
02026             wcscpy(sString, gMercProfiles[usMercProfileID].zNickname);
02027       }
02028 
02029       FindFontCenterCoordinates(PIC_NAME_X, PIC_NAME_Y, PIC_NAME_WID, PIC_NAME_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02030       DrawString(sString, usX, usY, CHAR_FONT);
02031 
02032 
02033       // Full name (Top Box)
02034       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02035       {
02036             // vehicle
02037             wcscpy(sString, pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].ubVehicleType ]);
02038       }
02039       else
02040       {
02041             // soldier
02042             wcscpy(sString, gMercProfiles[usMercProfileID].zName);
02043       }
02044 
02045       FindFontCenterCoordinates(CHAR_NAME_X, CHAR_NAME_Y, CHAR_NAME_WID, CHAR_NAME_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02046       DrawString(sString, usX, usY, CHAR_FONT);
02047 
02048 
02049       // Assignment
02050       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
02051       {
02052             // show vehicle type
02053             wcscpy( sString, pShortVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].ubVehicleType ] );
02054       }
02055       else
02056       {
02057             wcscpy( sString, pAssignmentStrings[ pSoldier->bAssignment ] );
02058       }
02059 
02060       FindFontCenterCoordinates( CHAR_ASSIGN_X, CHAR_ASSIGN1_Y, CHAR_ASSIGN_WID, CHAR_ASSIGN_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY );
02061       DrawString( sString, usX, usY, CHAR_FONT );
02062 
02063 
02064       // second assignment line
02065 
02066       // train self / teammate / by other ?
02067       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_SELF ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_TEAMMATE ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_BY_OTHER ) )
02068       {
02069             wcscpy(sString, pAttributeMenuStrings[pSoldier->bTrainStat]);
02070       }
02071       // train town?
02072       else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == TRAIN_TOWN )
02073       {
02074             wcscpy(sString,pTownNames[GetTownIdForSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY ) ] );
02075       }
02076       // repairing?
02077       else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == REPAIR )
02078       {
02079             if ( pSoldier->fFixingRobot )
02080             {
02081                   // robot
02082                   wcscpy( sString, pRepairStrings[ 3 ] );
02083             }
02084 /*
02085             else if ( pSoldier->fFixingSAMSite )
02086             {
02087                   // SAM site
02088                   wcscpy( sString, pRepairStrings[ 1 ] );
02089             }
02090 */
02091             else if ( pSoldier->bVehicleUnderRepairID != -1 )
02092             {
02093                   // vehicle
02094                   wcscpy( sString, pShortVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleUnderRepairID ].ubVehicleType ] );
02095             }
02096             else
02097             {
02098                   // items
02099                   wcscpy( sString, pRepairStrings[ 0 ] );
02100             }
02101       }
02102       // in transit?
02103       else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
02104       {
02105             // show ETA
02106             ConvertMinTimeToETADayHourMinString( pSoldier->uiTimeSoldierWillArrive, sString );
02107       }
02108       // traveling ?
02109       else if ( PlayerIDGroupInMotion( GetSoldierGroupId( pSoldier ) ) )
02110       {
02111             // show ETA
02112             uiArrivalTime = GetWorldTotalMin( ) + CalculateTravelTimeOfGroupId( GetSoldierGroupId( pSoldier ) );
02113             ConvertMinTimeToETADayHourMinString( uiArrivalTime, sString );
02114       }
02115       else
02116       {
02117             // show location
02118             GetMapscreenMercLocationString( pSoldier, sString );
02119       }
02120 
02121       if ( wcslen( sString ) > 0 )
02122       {
02123             FindFontCenterCoordinates(CHAR_ASSIGN_X, CHAR_ASSIGN2_Y ,CHAR_ASSIGN_WID ,CHAR_ASSIGN_HEI ,sString , CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02124             DrawString(sString, usX, usY, CHAR_FONT );
02125       }
02126 
02127 
02128       // draw health/condition
02129       DrawCharHealth( sCharNumber );
02130 
02131 
02132       // if a vehicle or robot
02133       if( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
02134       {
02135             // we're done - the remainder applies only to people
02136             return;
02137       }
02138 
02139 
02140       // draw attributes & skills for currently displayed character 
02141       DrawCharStats(sCharNumber);
02142 
02143       // remaining contract length
02144 
02145       // dead?
02146       if( pSoldier->bLife <= 0 )
02147       {
02148             swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
02149       }
02150       // what kind of merc
02151       else if(pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC || pSoldier->ubProfile == SLAY )
02152       {
02153             FLOAT dTimeLeft = 0.0;
02154 
02155             // amount of time left on contract
02156             iTimeRemaining = pSoldier->iEndofContractTime-GetWorldTotalMin();
02157 
02158             //if the merc is in transit
02159             if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
02160             {
02161                   //and if the ttime left on the cotract is greater then the contract time
02162                   if( iTimeRemaining > (INT32)( pSoldier->iTotalContractLength * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) )
02163                   {
02164                         iTimeRemaining = ( pSoldier->iTotalContractLength * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY );
02165                   }
02166             }
02167 
02168 
02169             if(iTimeRemaining >= ( 24 * 60 ) )
02170             {
02171                   //calculate the exact time left on the contract ( ex 1.8 days )
02172                   dTimeLeft = (FLOAT)(iTimeRemaining / (60*24.0) );
02173 
02174                   // more than a day, display in green
02175                   iTimeRemaining /= (60*24);
02176                   if( pSoldier->bLife > 0 )
02177                   {
02178                         SetFontForeground(FONT_LTGREEN);
02179                   }
02180 
02181                   swprintf(sString, L"%.1f%s/%d%s", dTimeLeft, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ], pSoldier->iTotalContractLength, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ]); 
02182             }
02183             else
02184             {
02185                   // less than a day, display hours left in red
02186                   if( iTimeRemaining > 5 )
02187                   {
02188                         BOOLEAN fNeedToIncrement = FALSE;
02189 
02190                         if( iTimeRemaining % 60 != 0 )
02191                               fNeedToIncrement = TRUE;
02192 
02193                         iTimeRemaining /= 60;
02194 
02195                         if( fNeedToIncrement )
02196                               iTimeRemaining++;
02197                   }
02198                   else
02199                   {
02200                         iTimeRemaining /= 60;
02201                   }
02202 
02203                   if( pSoldier->bLife > 0 )
02204                   {
02205                         SetFontForeground(FONT_RED);
02206                   }
02207 
02208              swprintf(sString, L"%d%s/%d%s",iTimeRemaining, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_HOURS_ABBREVIATION ], pSoldier->iTotalContractLength, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ]);
02209             }
02210       }
02211       else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC )
02212       {
02213             INT32 iBeenHiredFor = ( GetWorldTotalMin( ) / NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) - pSoldier->iStartContractTime;
02214 
02215             swprintf(sString, L"%d%s/%d%s",gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ], iBeenHiredFor, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ] ); 
02216       }
02217       else
02218       {
02219             swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
02220       }
02221 
02222 
02223       // set font stuff
02224       SetFontForeground(CHAR_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
02225       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
02226 
02227       // center and draw
02228       FindFontCenterCoordinates(CHAR_TIME_REMAINING_X, CHAR_TIME_REMAINING_Y, CHAR_TIME_REMAINING_WID, CHAR_TIME_REMAINING_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02229       DrawString(sString,usX,usY, CHAR_FONT);
02230 
02231 
02232       // salary
02233       if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC )
02234       {
02235             // daily rate
02236             if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK )
02237             {
02238                   iDailyCost = ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiBiWeeklySalary / 14 );
02239             }
02240             if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK )
02241             {
02242                   iDailyCost = ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiWeeklySalary / 7 );
02243             }
02244             else
02245             {
02246                   iDailyCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
02247             }
02248       }
02249       else
02250       {
02251             iDailyCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
02252       }
02253 
02254       swprintf(sString, L"%d", iDailyCost );
02255 
02256       // insert commas and dollar sign
02257       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
02258       InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );    
02259       
02260       FindFontRightCoordinates(CHAR_SALARY_X, CHAR_SALARY_Y, CHAR_SALARY_WID, CHAR_SALARY_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02261       DrawString(sString,usX,usY, CHAR_FONT);
02262 
02263 
02264       // medical deposit
02265       if( gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ].ubProfile ].sMedicalDepositAmount > 0 )
02266       {
02267             swprintf(sString, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ].ubProfile ].sMedicalDepositAmount );
02268 
02269             // insert commas and dollar sign
02270             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
02271             InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
02272 
02273             FindFontRightCoordinates(CHAR_MEDICAL_X, CHAR_MEDICAL_Y, CHAR_MEDICAL_WID, CHAR_MEDICAL_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY); 
02274             DrawString(sString,usX,CHAR_MEDICAL_Y, CHAR_FONT);
02275       }
02276 
02277 /*
02278       // life insurance
02279       swprintf(sString, L"%d", Menptr[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ].usLifeInsuranceAmount );
02280       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
02281       InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
02282       FindFontRightCoordinates(CHAR_LIFE_INSUR_X, CHAR_LIFE_INSUR_Y, CHAR_LIFE_INSUR_WID, CHAR_LIFE_INSUR_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY);
02283       DrawString(sString,usX,usY, CHAR_FONT);
02284 */
02285 
02286       // morale
02287       if( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
02288       {
02289             if ( pSoldier->bLife != 0 )
02290             {
02291                   GetMoraleString( MercPtrs[gCharactersList[sCharNumber].usSolID], sString );
02292             }
02293             else
02294             {
02295                   wcscpy( sString, L"" );
02296             }
02297       }
02298       else
02299       {
02300             // POW - morale unknown
02301             swprintf( sString, pPOWStrings[ 1 ] );
02302       }
02303 
02304       FindFontCenterCoordinates(CHAR_MORALE_X, CHAR_MORALE_Y, CHAR_MORALE_WID, CHAR_MORALE_HEI, sString, CHAR_FONT, &usX, &usY); 
02305       DrawString(sString,usX,CHAR_MORALE_Y, CHAR_FONT);
02306 
02307       
02308       return;
02309 }
02310 
02311 
02312 // this character is in transit has an item picked up
02313 BOOLEAN CharacterIsInTransitAndHasItemPickedUp( INT8 bCharacterNumber )
02314 {
02315 
02316       // valid character?
02317       if( bCharacterNumber == -1 )
02318       {
02319             // nope
02320             return( FALSE );
02321       }
02322 
02323       // second validity check
02324       if( gCharactersList[ bCharacterNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
02325       {
02326             // nope
02327             return( FALSE );
02328       }
02329 
02330       // character in transit?
02331       if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharacterNumber ].usSolID ].bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT )
02332       {
02333             // nope
02334             return( FALSE );
02335       }
02336 
02337       // item picked up?
02338       if( gMPanelRegion.Cursor != EXTERN_CURSOR)
02339       {
02340             return( FALSE );
02341       }
02342 
02343       return( TRUE );
02344 }
02345 
02346 
02347 
02348 void DisplayCharacterInfo( void )
02349 {
02350       Assert( bSelectedInfoChar < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
02351       Assert( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid );
02352 
02353       // set font buffer
02354       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
02355 
02356       // draw character info and face
02357       DrawCharacterInfo( bSelectedInfoChar );
02358 
02359       RenderHandPosItem();
02360 
02361       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
02362 
02363       RenderIconsForUpperLeftCornerPiece( bSelectedInfoChar );
02364 
02365       // mark all pop ups as dirty
02366       MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
02367 }
02368 
02369 
02370 
02371 INT32 GetPathTravelTimeDuringPlotting( PathStPtr pPath )
02372 {
02373       INT32 iTravelTime = 0;
02374       WAYPOINT pCurrent;
02375       WAYPOINT pNext;
02376       GROUP *pGroup;
02377       UINT8 ubGroupId = 0;
02378       BOOLEAN fSkipFirstNode = FALSE;
02379 
02380 
02381       if( ( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) )
02382       {
02383             return( 0 );
02384       }
02385 
02386       if( fTempPathAlreadyDrawn == FALSE )
02387       {
02388             return( 0 );
02389       }
02390 
02391       if( pPath == NULL )
02392       {
02393             return( 0 );
02394       }
02395 
02396       pPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pPath );
02397 
02398 
02399       if( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE )
02400       {
02401             // plotting for a character...
02402             if( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].bAssignment == VEHICLE )
02403             {
02404                   ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].iVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
02405                   pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
02406 
02407                   if( pGroup == NULL )
02408                   {
02409                         SetUpMvtGroupForVehicle( &( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID] ) );
02410                         
02411                         // get vehicle id
02412                         ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].iVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
02413                         pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
02414                   }
02415             }
02416             else if( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02417             {
02418                   ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].bVehicleID ].ubMovementGroup;
02419                   pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
02420 
02421                   if( pGroup == NULL )
02422                   {
02423                         SetUpMvtGroupForVehicle( &( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID] ) );
02424 
02425                         // get vehicle id
02426                         ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].bVehicleID ].ubMovementGroup;
02427                         pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
02428                   }
02429             }
02430             else
02431             {
02432                   ubGroupId = Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID].ubGroupID;
02433                   pGroup = GetGroup( ( UINT8 )( ubGroupId ) );
02434             }
02435       }
02436       else
02437       {
02438             ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
02439             pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
02440       }
02441 
02442       Assert(pGroup);
02443 
02444 
02445       // if between sectors
02446       if ( pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
02447       {
02448             // arrival time should always be legal!
02449             Assert( pGroup->uiArrivalTime >= GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
02450 
02451             // start with time to finish arriving in any traversal already in progress
02452             iTravelTime = pGroup->uiArrivalTime - GetWorldTotalMin();
02453             fSkipFirstNode = TRUE;
02454       }
02455       else
02456       {
02457             iTravelTime = 0;
02458       }
02459 
02460       while( pPath->pNext )
02461       {
02462             if ( !fSkipFirstNode )
02463             {
02464                   // grab the current location
02465                   pCurrent.x = ( UINT8 )( pPath->uiSectorId % MAP_WORLD_X );
02466                   pCurrent.y = ( UINT8 )( pPath->uiSectorId / MAP_WORLD_X );
02467 
02468                   // grab the next location
02469                   pNext.x = ( UINT8 )( pPath->pNext->uiSectorId % MAP_WORLD_X );
02470                   pNext.y = ( UINT8 )( pPath->pNext->uiSectorId / MAP_WORLD_X );
02471 
02472                   iTravelTime += FindTravelTimeBetweenWaypoints( &pCurrent, &pNext, pGroup );
02473             }
02474             else
02475             {
02476                   fSkipFirstNode = FALSE;
02477             }
02478 
02479             pPath = pPath->pNext;
02480       }
02481       
02482       return( iTravelTime );
02483 }
02484 
02485 
02486 
02487 void DisplayGroundEta( void )
02488 {
02489       UINT32 iTotalTime = 0;
02490 
02491 
02492       if( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
02493       {
02494             return;
02495       }
02496 
02497       if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) 
02498       {
02499             return;
02500       }
02501 
02502       if( !gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].fValid )
02503       {
02504             return;
02505       }
02506 
02507 
02508       iTotalTime = GetGroundTravelTimeOfCharacter( bSelectedDestChar );
02509 
02510       // now display it
02511       SetFont( ETA_FONT );
02512       SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
02513       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02514 
02515       // WANNE 2 <change ETA position>
02516       mprintf( CLOCK_ETA_X, CLOCK_Y_START, pEtaString[ 0 ] ); 
02517 
02518       // if less than one day
02519       if( ( iTotalTime / ( 60 * 24 ) ) < 1 )
02520       {
02521             // show hours and minutes
02522             SetClockMin( L"%d", iTotalTime % 60 );
02523             SetClockHour(L"%d", iTotalTime / 60);
02524       }
02525       else
02526       {
02527             // show days and hours
02528             SetHourAlternate(L"%d", ( iTotalTime / 60 ) % 24 );
02529             SetDayAlternate( L"%d", iTotalTime / ( 60 * 24 ) );
02530       }
02531 }
02532 
02533 
02534 
02535 void HighLightAssignLine()
02536 {
02537       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02538       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
02539       UINT16 usColor;
02540       static INT32 iColorNum = STARTING_COLOR_NUM;
02541       static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
02542       static INT32 uiOldHighlight = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1;
02543       INT16 usCount = 0;
02544       UINT16 usX;
02545       UINT16 usY;
02546       INT16 usVehicleCount = 0;
02547 
02548 
02549       // is this a valid line?
02550       if( ( giAssignHighLine == -1 ) || fShowInventoryFlag )
02551       {
02552             uiOldHighlight = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1;
02553             return;
02554       }
02555 
02556       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
02557       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
02558             return;
02559 
02560 
02561       // check if we have moved lines, if so, reset
02562       if( uiOldHighlight != giAssignHighLine )
02563       {
02564             iColorNum = STARTING_COLOR_NUM;
02565             fDelta = FALSE;
02566 
02567             uiOldHighlight = giAssignHighLine;
02568       }
02569 
02570 
02571       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
02572       {
02573        fDelta=!fDelta;
02574       }
02575       if(!fDelta)
02576             iColorNum++;
02577       else
02578             iColorNum--;
02579       
02580       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
02581       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02582 
02583       for( usCount = 0; usCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; usCount++ )
02584       {
02585             if( IsCharacterSelectedForAssignment( usCount ) == TRUE )
02586             {
02587                   usX=ASSIGN_X;
02588                   //usY=Y_START+(giHighLine*GetFontHeight((MAP_SCREEN_FONT)));
02589                   usY=(Y_OFFSET*usCount-1)+(Y_START+(usCount*Y_SIZE));
02590                   
02591                   // WANNE 2
02592                   if( usCount >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
02593                   {
02594                         usVehicleCount = usCount - FIRST_VEHICLE;
02595                         usY = (Y_OFFSET*usVehicleCount-1)+(usVehicleY+(usVehicleCount*Y_SIZE));
02596                   }
02597             
02598                   usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
02599                   
02600                   LineDraw(TRUE, usX, usY, usX, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02601                   LineDraw(TRUE, usX+ASSIGN_WIDTH, usY, usX+ASSIGN_WIDTH, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02602                   if( ( usCount == 0 ) || ( usCount != 0 ? !( IsCharacterSelectedForAssignment( ( UINT16 )( usCount - 1 ) ) ) : 0 ) || ( usCount == FIRST_VEHICLE ) )
02603                   {
02604                         LineDraw( TRUE, usX, usY, usX+ASSIGN_WIDTH, usY, usColor,pDestBuf);
02605                   }
02606 
02607                   if( ( ( usCount == MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT - 1 ) ) || ( usCount != ( MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT - 1 ) ? !( IsCharacterSelectedForAssignment( ( UINT16 )( usCount + 1 ) ) ) : 0) || ( usCount == FIRST_VEHICLE - 1 ) )
02608                   {
02609                         LineDraw(TRUE, usX, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usX+ASSIGN_WIDTH, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02610                   }
02611 
02612                   InvalidateRegion( usX, usY, usX+ASSIGN_WIDTH+1, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+3);
02613             }
02614       }
02615       
02616       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02617 }
02618 
02619 
02620 void HighLightDestLine()
02621 {
02622       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02623       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
02624       UINT16 usColor;
02625       static INT32 iColorNum = STARTING_COLOR_NUM;
02626       static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
02627       static INT32 uiOldHighlight = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1;
02628       UINT16 usCount = 0;
02629       UINT16 usX;
02630       UINT16 usY;
02631       UINT16 usVehicleCont = 0;
02632 
02633 
02634       if( ( giDestHighLine == -1 ) || fShowInventoryFlag )
02635       {
02636             uiOldHighlight = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1;
02637             return;
02638       }
02639       
02640       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
02641       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
02642             return;
02643 
02644 
02645       // check if we have moved lines, if so, reset 
02646       if( uiOldHighlight != giDestHighLine )
02647       {
02648             iColorNum = STARTING_COLOR_NUM;
02649             fDelta = FALSE;
02650 
02651             uiOldHighlight = giDestHighLine;
02652       }
02653 
02654 
02655       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
02656       {
02657        fDelta=!fDelta;
02658       }
02659       if(!fDelta)
02660             iColorNum++;
02661       else
02662             iColorNum--;
02663  
02664 
02665       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
02666       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02667 
02668       for( usCount = 0; usCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; usCount++ )
02669       {
02670             if( CharacterIsGettingPathPlotted( usCount ) == TRUE )
02671             {
02672                   usX=DEST_ETA_X-4;
02673                   usY=(Y_OFFSET*usCount-1)+(Y_START+(usCount*Y_SIZE));
02674                   
02675                   // WANNE 2
02676                   if( usCount >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
02677                   {
02678                         usVehicleCont = usCount - FIRST_VEHICLE;
02679                         usY=(Y_OFFSET*usVehicleCont-1)+(usVehicleY+(usVehicleCont*Y_SIZE));
02680                   }
02681             
02682                   usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
02683                   
02684                   if( ( usCount == 0 ) || ( usCount != 0 ? !( CharacterIsGettingPathPlotted( ( UINT16 )( usCount - 1 ) ) ) : 0 ) || ( usCount == FIRST_VEHICLE ) )
02685                   {
02686                         LineDraw( TRUE, usX+4, usY, usX+DEST_ETA_WIDTH+4, usY, usColor,pDestBuf);
02687                   }
02688                   if( ( ( usCount == MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT - 1 ) ) || ( usCount != ( MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT - 1 ) ? !( CharacterIsGettingPathPlotted( ( UINT16 )( usCount + 1 ) ) ) : 0) || ( usCount == FIRST_VEHICLE - 1 ) )
02689                   {
02690                         LineDraw(TRUE, usX+4, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usX+DEST_ETA_WIDTH+4, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02691                   }
02692 
02693 
02694                   LineDraw(TRUE, usX+4, usY, usX+4, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02695                   LineDraw(TRUE, usX+DEST_ETA_WIDTH+4, usY, usX+DEST_ETA_WIDTH+4, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02696 
02697                   InvalidateRegion( usX, usY, usX + DEST_ETA_WIDTH + 5, usY + GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+3 );
02698             }
02699       }
02700       //InvalidateRegion( usX+4, usY, DEST_ETA_WIDTH-10, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+3);
02701       //InvalidateRegion( usX+10, usY, usX+ASSIGN_WIDTH, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+3);
02702       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02703 }
02704 
02705 
02706 
02707 void HighLightSleepLine()
02708 {
02709       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
02710       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
02711       UINT16 usColor;
02712       static INT32 iColorNum = STARTING_COLOR_NUM;
02713       static BOOLEAN fDelta=FALSE;
02714       static INT32 uiOldHighlight = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1;
02715       UINT16 usCount = 0;
02716       UINT16 usX, usX2;
02717       UINT16 usY;
02718       UINT16 usVehicleCount = 0;
02719 
02720 
02721       // is this a valid line?
02722       if( ( giSleepHighLine == -1 ) || fShowInventoryFlag )
02723       {
02724             uiOldHighlight = MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT + 1;
02725             return;
02726       }
02727 
02728       // if not ready to change glow phase yet, leave
02729       if ( !gfGlowTimerExpired )
02730             return;
02731 
02732 
02733       // check if we have moved lines, if so, reset
02734       if( uiOldHighlight != giSleepHighLine )
02735       {
02736             iColorNum = STARTING_COLOR_NUM;
02737             fDelta = FALSE;
02738 
02739             uiOldHighlight = giSleepHighLine;
02740       }
02741 
02742 
02743       if((iColorNum==0)||(iColorNum==10))
02744       {
02745        fDelta=!fDelta;
02746       }
02747       if(!fDelta)
02748             iColorNum++;
02749       else
02750             iColorNum--;
02751 
02752  
02753       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
02754       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02755 
02756       for( usCount = 0; usCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; usCount++ )
02757       {
02758             if( IsCharacterSelectedForSleep( usCount ) == TRUE )
02759             {
02760                   usX=SLEEP_X-4;
02761                   usX2 = SLEEP_X + SLEEP_WIDTH;
02762 
02763                   usY=(Y_OFFSET*usCount-1)+(Y_START+(usCount*Y_SIZE));
02764                   
02765                   // WANNE 2
02766                   if( usCount >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
02767                   {
02768                         usVehicleCount = usCount - FIRST_VEHICLE;
02769                         usY=(Y_OFFSET*usVehicleCount-1)+(usVehicleY+(usVehicleCount*Y_SIZE));
02770                   }
02771             
02772                   usColor=Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubRed, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubGreen, GlowColorsA[iColorNum].ubBlue ) );
02773                   
02774                   if( ( usCount == 0 ) || ( usCount != 0 ? !( IsCharacterSelectedForSleep( ( UINT16 )( usCount - 1 ) ) ) : 0 ) || ( usCount == FIRST_VEHICLE ) )
02775                   {
02776                         LineDraw( TRUE, usX+4, usY, usX2, usY, usColor,pDestBuf);
02777                   }
02778                   if( ( ( usCount == MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT - 1 ) ) || ( usCount != ( MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT - 1 ) ? !( IsCharacterSelectedForSleep( ( UINT16 )( usCount + 1 ) ) ) : 0) || ( usCount == FIRST_VEHICLE - 1 ) )
02779                   {
02780                         LineDraw(TRUE, usX+4, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usX2, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02781                   }
02782 
02783                   LineDraw(TRUE, usX+ 4, usY, usX + 4, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02784                   LineDraw(TRUE, usX2, usY, usX2, usY+GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+2, usColor, pDestBuf);
02785 
02786                   InvalidateRegion( usX, usY, usX2 + 5, usY + GetFontHeight(MAP_SCREEN_FONT)+3 );
02787             }
02788       }
02789       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
02790 }
02791 
02792 
02793 
02794 void AddCharacter( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
02795 {
02796       UINT16 usCount=0;
02797       UINT16 usVehicleCount = 0, usVehicleLoop = 0;
02798 
02799       // is character valid?
02800       if( pCharacter == NULL)
02801       {
02802             // not valid, leave
02803             return;
02804       }
02805 
02806       // valid character?
02807       if( pCharacter -> bActive == FALSE )
02808       {
02809             return;
02810       }
02811 
02812       // adding a vehicle?
02813       if( pCharacter->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02814       {
02815             while( usVehicleLoop < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT )
02816             {
02817                   if ( gCharactersList[ usVehicleLoop ].fValid )
02818                   {
02819                         if ( Menptr[ usVehicleLoop ].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
02820                         {
02821                               usVehicleCount++;
02822                         }
02823                   }
02824                   usVehicleLoop++;
02825             }
02826 
02827             usCount = FIRST_VEHICLE + usVehicleCount;
02828       }
02829       else
02830       {
02831             // go through character list until a blank is reached
02832             while( (gCharactersList[usCount].fValid)&&(usCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT) )
02833             {
02834                   usCount++;
02835             }
02836       }
02837 
02838 
02839       Assert( usCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
02840       if (usCount >= MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT )
02841       {
02842             return;
02843       }
02844 
02845       // copy over soldier id value
02846       gCharactersList[usCount].usSolID = ( UINT16 )pCharacter -> ubID;  
02847       
02848       // valid character
02849       gCharactersList[usCount].fValid = TRUE;
02850 
02851       return;
02852 }
02853 
02854 
02855 /*
02856 void MoveCharacter(UINT16 uiInitialPosition, UINT16 uiFinalPosition)
02857 {
02858       if (!gCharactersList[uiInitialPosition].fValid)
02859             return;
02860       else
02861             memcpy(&gCharactersList[uiFinalPosition], &gCharactersList[uiInitialPosition], sizeof(MapScreenCharacterSt)); 
02862 }
02863 
02864 
02865 void SwapCharacters(UINT16 uiInitialPosition, UINT16 uiFinalPosition)
02866 {
02867       MapScreenCharacterSt pTempChar;
02868       memcpy(&pTempChar, &gCharactersList[uiInitialPosition], sizeof(MapScreenCharacterSt));
02869       memcpy(&gCharactersList[uiInitialPosition], &gCharactersList[uiFinalPosition], sizeof(MapScreenCharacterSt));
02870       memcpy(&gCharactersList[uiFinalPosition], &pTempChar, sizeof(MapScreenCharacterSt));
02871 }
02872 
02873 
02874 void RemoveCharacter(UINT16 uiCharPosition)
02875 {
02876  memset(&gCharactersList[uiCharPosition], 0, sizeof( MapScreenCharacterSt ));
02877 }
02878 */
02879 
02880 
02881 void LoadCharacters( void )
02882 {
02883       UINT16 uiCount=0;
02884       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, *pTeamSoldier;
02885       INT32 cnt=0;
02886 
02887       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ];
02888 
02889       // fills array with pressence of player controlled characters
02890       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
02891       {
02892             if(pTeamSoldier->bActive)
02893             {
02894                   AddCharacter( pTeamSoldier );
02895                   uiCount++;
02896             }
02897       }
02898 
02899       // set info char if no selected
02900       if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
02901       {
02902             if( DialogueActive() == FALSE )
02903             {
02904                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( 0, TRUE );
02905             }
02906       }
02907 
02908       // check if ANYONE was available
02909       if( uiCount == 0 )
02910       {
02911             // no one to show
02912             ChangeSelectedInfoChar( -1, TRUE );
02913             bSelectedDestChar = -1;
02914             bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
02915             bSelectedContractChar = -1;
02916             fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
02917       }
02918 }
02919 
02920 
02921 void DisplayCharacterList()
02922 {
02923       INT16 sCount=0;
02924       UINT8 ubForegroundColor = 0;
02925 
02926       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE ) && ( fTeamPanelDirty == FALSE ) )
02927       {
02928             SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER ,0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT,FALSE);
02929             return;
02930       }
02931 
02932 
02933       // set dest buffer
02934       SetFontDestBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER,0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT,FALSE);
02935       SetFont( MAP_SCREEN_FONT );
02936       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
02937 
02938 
02939       for (sCount = 0; sCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; sCount++)
02940       {
02941             // skip invalid characters
02942             if ( gCharactersList[sCount].fValid == TRUE )
02943             {
02944                   if( sCount == ( INT16 ) giHighLine )
02945                   {
02946                         ubForegroundColor = FONT_WHITE;
02947                   } 
02948                   // check to see if character is still alive
02949                   else if( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].bLife == 0 )
02950                   {
02951                         ubForegroundColor = FONT_METALGRAY;
02952                   }
02953                   else if( CharacterIsGettingPathPlotted( sCount ) == TRUE )
02954                   {
02955                         ubForegroundColor = FONT_LTBLUE;
02956                   }
02957                   // in current sector?
02958                   else if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].sSectorX == sSelMapX ) &&
02959                                            ( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].sSectorY == sSelMapY ) &&
02960                                            ( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].bSectorZ == iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
02961                   {
02962                         // mobile ?
02963                         if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) ||
02964                                     ( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
02965                               ubForegroundColor = FONT_YELLOW;
02966                         else
02967                               ubForegroundColor = FONT_MAP_DKYELLOW;
02968                   }
02969                   else
02970                   {
02971                         // not in current sector
02972                         ubForegroundColor = 5;
02973                   }
02974 
02975                   SetFontForeground( ubForegroundColor );
02976 
02977                   DrawName( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCount].usSolID].name, sCount, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
02978                   DrawLocation(sCount, sCount, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
02979                   DrawDestination(sCount, sCount, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
02980                   DrawAssignment(sCount, sCount, MAP_SCREEN_FONT);
02981                   DrawTimeRemaining(sCount, MAP_SCREEN_FONT, ubForegroundColor ); 
02982             }
02983       }
02984 
02985       HandleDisplayOfSelectedMercArrows( );
02986       SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER ,0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT,FALSE);
02987 
02988       EnableDisableTeamListRegionsAndHelpText( );
02989 
02990       // mark all pop ups as dirty, so that any open assigment menus get reblitted over top of the team list
02991       MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
02992 
02993       return;
02994 }
02995 
02996 
02997 
02998 // THIS IS STUFF THAT RUNS *ONCE* DURING APPLICATION EXECUTION, AT INITIAL STARTUP
02999 UINT32 MapScreenInit(void)
03000 {
03001       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
03002 
03003       SetUpBadSectorsList( );
03004 
03005       // setup message box system
03006       InitGlobalMessageList( );
03007 
03008       // init palettes for big map
03009       InitializePalettesForMap( );
03010 
03011       // set up mapscreen fast help text
03012       SetUpMapScreenFastHelpText( );
03013 
03014       // set up leave list arrays for dismissed mercs
03015       InitLeaveList( );
03016 
03017       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03018       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\group_confirm.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03019       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiUpdatePanel ) );
03020 
03021       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03022       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\group_confirm_tactical.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03023       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiUpdatePanelTactical ) );
03024 
03025       return TRUE;
03026 }
03027 
03028 
03029 
03030 UINT32 MapScreenShutdown(void)
03031 { 
03032       // free up alloced mapscreen messages
03033       FreeGlobalMessageList( );
03034 
03035       ShutDownPalettesForMap( );
03036 
03037       // free memory for leave list arrays for dismissed mercs
03038       ShutDownLeaveList( );
03039 
03040       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiUpdatePanel );
03041       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiUpdatePanelTactical);
03042 
03043       return TRUE;
03044 }
03045 
03046 
03047 
03048 UINT32 MapScreenHandle(void)
03049 {
03050       UINT32 uiNewScreen;
03051       INT32 found=FALSE;
03052       UINT32 uiMins=0;
03053       UINT32 uiHours=0;
03054       UINT32 uiDays=0;
03055       VSURFACE_DESC     vs_desc;
03056       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc; 
03057 //    static BOOLEAN fSecondFrame = FALSE;
03058       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03059       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
03060 
03061 
03062 
03063       //DO NOT MOVE THIS FUNCTION CALL!!!
03064       //This determines if the help screen should be active
03065       if( ShouldTheHelpScreenComeUp( HelpScreenDetermineWhichMapScreenHelpToShow(), FALSE ) )
03066       {
03067             // handle the help screen
03068             HelpScreenHandler();
03069             return( MAP_SCREEN ); 
03070       }
03071 
03072       MoveRadarScreen();
03073 
03074       // shaded screen, leave
03075       if ( gfLoadPending == 2 )
03076       {
03077             gfLoadPending = FALSE;
03078 
03079             // Load Sector
03080             // BigCheese
03081             if ( !SetCurrentWorldSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY , ( INT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
03082             {
03083                   // Cannot load!
03084             }
03085             else
03086             {
03087                   CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
03088                   // define our progress bar
03089                   //CreateProgressBar( 0, 118, 183, 522, 202 );
03090 
03091             }
03092             return( MAP_SCREEN );
03093       }
03094 
03095       // WANNE 2 <scroll>
03096       /*if (fShowInventoryFlag == TRUE)
03097       {
03098             DeleteButtonsForScrolling();
03099       }
03100       else
03101       {
03102             CreateButtonsForScrolling();
03103       }*/
03104 
03105 //    if ( (fInMapMode == FALSE ) && ( fMapExitDueToMessageBox == FALSE ) )
03106       if ( !fInMapMode )
03107       {
03108             gfFirstMapscreenFrame = TRUE;
03109 
03110             InitPreviousPaths();
03111 
03112             // if arrival sector is invalid, reset to A9
03113             if ( ( gsMercArriveSectorX <  1 ) || ( gsMercArriveSectorY <  1 ) ||
03114                          ( gsMercArriveSectorX > 16 ) || ( gsMercArriveSectorY > 16 ) )
03115             {
03116                   gsMercArriveSectorX = 9;
03117                   gsMercArriveSectorY = 1;
03118             }
03119 
03120             gfInConfirmMapMoveMode = FALSE;
03121             gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode = FALSE;
03122 
03123             fLeavingMapScreen = FALSE;
03124             fResetTimerForFirstEntryIntoMapScreen = TRUE;
03125             fFlashAssignDone = FALSE;
03126             gfEnteringMapScreen = 0;
03127 
03128             guiTacticalInterfaceFlags |= INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN;
03129 
03130 //          fDisabledMapBorder = FALSE;
03131 
03132             // handle the sort buttons
03133             AddTeamPanelSortButtonsForMapScreen( );
03134 
03135             // load bottom graphics
03136             LoadMapScreenInterfaceBottom( );
03137 
03138             MoveToEndOfMapScreenMessageList( );
03139 
03140             // if the current time compression mode is something legal in mapscreen, keep it
03141             if ( ( giTimeCompressMode >= TIME_COMPRESS_5MINS ) && ( giTimeCompressMode <= TIME_COMPRESS_60MINS ) )
03142             {
03143                   // leave the current time compression mode set, but DO stop it
03144                   StopTimeCompression();
03145             }
03146             else
03147             {
03148                   // set compressed mode to X0 (which also stops time compression)
03149                   SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_X0 );
03150             }
03151 
03152             // disable video overlay for tactical scroll messages
03153             EnableDisableScrollStringVideoOverlay( FALSE );
03154 
03155             CreateDestroyInsuranceMouseRegionForMercs( TRUE );
03156 
03157             // ATE: Init tactical interface interface ( always to team panel )
03158             //SetCurrentInterfacePanel( TEAM_PANEL );

03356             }

03358             {

03558       {

03560             {
03561                   // force mapscreen to be reinitialized even though we're already in it
03562                   EndMapScreen( TRUE );
03563                   return( MAP_SCREEN );
03564             }
03565

03567             {

03569             }

03614       {
03615             // need a one frame pause
03616             fShownAssignmentMenu = fShowAssignmentMenu;
03617             fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
03618             fOneFrame = TRUE;
03619       }
03620       else if( ( fShownContractMenu == FALSE ) && ( fShowContractMenu == TRUE ) )
03621       {
03622             fShownContractMenu = fShowContractMenu;
03623             fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
03624             fOneFrame = TRUE;
03625       }
03626       else if( fOneFrame )
03627       {
03628             // one frame passed
03629             fShowContractMenu = fShownContractMenu;
03630             fShowAssignmentMenu = fShownAssignmentMenu;
03631             fOneFrame = FALSE;
03632       }
03633

03635       {
03636             bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
03637       }

03697

03699       DetermineWhichAssignmentMenusCanBeShown( );
03700

03703       DetermineIfContractMenuCanBeShown( );

03716

03719

03721

03723       BlitBackgroundToSaveBuffer( );
03724 
03725       if( fLeavingMapScreen == TRUE )
03726       {
03727             return( MAP_SCREEN );
03728       }
03729 
03730       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE )
03731       {
03732 /*
03733             // ATE: OK mark is rendering the item every frame - which isn't good 
03734     // however, don't want to break the world here..
03735     // this line was added so that when the ItemGlow() is on,
03736     // we're not rendering also, else glow looks bad
03737     if ( !fShowItemHighLight )
03738     {
03739               RenderHandPosItem();
03740     }
03741 */
03742 
03743             if( fDrawCharacterList )
03744             {
03745                   if ( !fShowInventoryFlag )
03746                   {
03747                         // if we are not in inventory mode, show character list
03748                         HandleHighLightingOfLinesInTeamPanel( );
03749 
03750                         DisplayCharacterList();
03751                   }
03752 
03753                   fDrawCharacterList = FALSE;
03754             }
03755       }
03756 
03757
