03758       if(   !fShowMapInventoryPool && !gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause && !IsMapScreenHelpTextUp( ) /* && !fDisabledMapBorder */ )
03759       {
03760             RenderMapCursorsIndexesAnims( );
03761       }
03762 
03763 
03764       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE )
03765       {
03766             
03767             // render status bar
03768             HandleCharBarRender( );
03769       }
03770       
03771       if( fShowInventoryFlag || fDisableDueToBattleRoster )
03772       {
03773             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_SORT_METHODS; iCounter++ )
03774             {
03775                   UnMarkButtonDirty( giMapSortButton[ iCounter ] );
03776             }
03777       }
03778 
03779       if( fShowContractMenu || fDisableDueToBattleRoster )
03780       {
03781             UnMarkButtonDirty( giMapContractButton );
03782       }
03783 
03784       // handle any old messages
03785       ScrollString( );
03786 
03787 
03788       HandleSpontanousTalking( );
03789 
03790       if( ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE ) )
03791       {
03792             // remove the move box once user leaves it
03793             CreateDestroyMovementBox( 0,0,0 );
03794             
03795             // this updates the move box contents when changes took place
03796             ReBuildMoveBox( );
03797       }
03798 
03799       if( ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE )&&( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE )||( fShowContractMenu == TRUE ) ) )
03800       {
03801             // highlight lines?
03802             HandleHighLightingOfLinesInTeamPanel( );
03803 
03804             // render glow for contract region
03805             ContractBoxGlow( );
03806             GlowTrashCan( );
03807 
03808             // handle changing of highlighted lines
03809             HandleChangeOfHighLightedLine( );
03810       }
03811       
03812       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE )
03813       {
03814             // render face of current info char, for animation
03815             DrawFace( bSelectedInfoChar );
03816 
03817             // handle autofaces
03818             HandleAutoFaces( );
03819             HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
03820 /*
03821             GlowFace( );
03822             GlowItem( );
03823 */
03824       
03825       }
03826 
03827 
03828       // automatically turns off mapscreen ui overlay messages when appropriate
03829       MonitorMapUIMessage( );
03830 
03831 
03832       // if heli is around, show it
03833       if( fHelicopterAvailable && fShowAircraftFlag && ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 ) && !fShowMapInventoryPool )
03834       {
03835             // this is done on EVERY frame, I guess it beats setting entire map dirty all the time while he's moving...
03836             DisplayPositionOfHelicopter( );
03837       }
03838 
03839 
03840       // display town info
03841       DisplayTownInfo( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 ) iCurrentMapSectorZ );
03842 
03843       if( fShowTownInfo == TRUE )
03844       {
03845             // force update of town mine info boxes
03846             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghTownMineBox );
03847             MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
03848       }
03849 
03850       // update town mine pop up display
03851       UpdateTownMinePopUpDisplay( );
03852 
03853       if( fShowAttributeMenu )
03854       {
03855             // mark all popups as dirty
03856             MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
03857       }
03858 
03859 
03860       // if plotting path
03861       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
03862       {
03863             // plot out paths
03864             PlotPermanentPaths( );
03865             PlotTemporaryPaths( );
03866 
03867             // show ETA
03868             RenderMapBorderEtaPopUp( );
03869             DisplayGroundEta();
03870 
03871             //DisplayDestinationOfCurrentDestMerc( );
03872       }
03873 
03874 
03875       HandleContractRenewalSequence( );
03876 
03877       // handle dialog
03878       HandleDialogue( );
03879 
03880 
03881       // now the border corner piece
03882 //    RenderMapBorderCorner( );
03883 
03884 
03885       // handle display of inventory pop up
03886       HandleDisplayOfItemPopUpForSector( 9, 1, 0 );
03887       
03888       // Display Framerate
03889       DisplayFrameRate( );
03890       
03891       // update paused states
03892       UpdatePausedStatesDueToTimeCompression( );
03893 
03894       // is there a description to be displayed?
03895       RenderItemDescriptionBox( );
03896 
03897       // render clock
03898       // WANNE 2 <renders the clock in the strategy screen>
03899       RenderClock(CLOCK_X, CLOCK_Y);
03900 
03901       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03902       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
03903       {
03904             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
03905             if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 500 )
03906                   SetFontForeground( FONT_DKRED );
03907             else
03908                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
03909             mprintf( SCREEN_WIDTH - 110, 2, L"TESTVERSION MSG" );
03910             if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 500 )
03911                   SetFontForeground( FONT_DKYELLOW );
03912             else
03913                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
03914             mprintf( SCREEN_WIDTH - 110, 12, L"NO WORLD LOADED" );
03915             InvalidateRegion( SCREEN_WIDTH - 110, 2, SCREEN_WIDTH, 23 );
03916       }
03917       #endif
03918 
03919       if( fEndShowInventoryFlag == TRUE )
03920       {
03921             if( InKeyRingPopup( ) == TRUE )
03922             {
03923                   DeleteKeyRingPopup( );  
03924             }
03925             else
03926             {
03927                   fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
03928                   // set help text for item glow region
03929                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
03930             }
03931 
03932             
03933             
03934             
03935             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
03936             fEndShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
03937       }
03938 
03939       // handle animated cursor update
03940   if ( !gfFadeIn )
03941   {
03942         HandleAnimatedCursorsForMapScreen( );
03943   }
03944 
03945       // if inventory is being manipulated, update cursor
03946       HandleMapInventoryCursor();
03947 
03948       
03949 
03950       if( fShowDescriptionFlag == TRUE )
03951       {
03952             // unmark done button
03953             if( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
03954             {
03955                   MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
03956             }
03957 
03958             if( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN )
03959             {
03960                   MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
03961             }
03962 
03963             UnMarkButtonDirty( giMapInvDoneButton );
03964             //UnMarkButtonDirty( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
03965             //UnMarkButtonDirty( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
03966             MarkAButtonDirty( giMapInvDescButton );
03967       }
03968       else
03969       {
03970             if( fShowInventoryFlag == TRUE )
03971             {
03972                   MarkAButtonDirty( giMapInvDoneButton );
03973                   MarkAButtonDirty( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
03974                   MarkAButtonDirty( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
03975             }
03976       }
03977 
03978       DrawMilitiaPopUpBox( );
03979 
03980       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE )
03981       {
03982             CreateDestroyTheUpdateBox( );
03983             DisplaySoldierUpdateBox( );
03984       }
03985 
03986 
03987       // pop up display boxes
03988       DisplayBoxes(FRAME_BUFFER);
03989 
03990       // render buttons
03991       RenderButtons( );
03992 
03993       if( fShowMapScreenMovementList )
03994       {
03995             // redisplay Movement box to blit it over any border buttons, since if long enough it can overlap them
03996             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghMoveBox );
03997             DisplayOnePopupBox( ghMoveBox, FRAME_BUFFER );
03998       }
03999 
04000       if( fShowContractMenu )
04001       {
04002             // redisplay Contract box to blit it over any map sort buttons, since they overlap
04003             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghContractBox );
04004             DisplayOnePopupBox( ghContractBox, FRAME_BUFFER );
04005       }
04006 
04007 
04008       //If we have new email, blink the email icon on top of the laptop button.
04009       CheckForAndRenderNewMailOverlay();
04010 
04011       // handle video overlays
04012       ExecuteVideoOverlays( );
04013 
04014       if ( InItemStackPopup( ) )
04015       {
04016             RenderItemStackPopup( FALSE );
04017       }
04018 
04019       if( InKeyRingPopup() )
04020       {
04021             RenderKeyRingPopup( FALSE );
04022       }
04023       
04024       CheckForMeanwhileOKStart( );
04025       
04026       // save background rects
04027       // ATE: DO this BEFORE rendering help text....
04028       SaveBackgroundRects( );
04029 
04030       if( ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE ) && ( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE )&&( fShowContractMenu == FALSE ) )
04031       {
04032             // highlight lines?
04033             HandleHighLightingOfLinesInTeamPanel( );
04034 
04035             // render glow for contract region
04036             ContractBoxGlow( );
04037             GlowTrashCan( );
04038 
04039             // handle changing of highlighted lines
04040             HandleChangeOfHighLightedLine( );
04041 
04042             GlowFace( );
04043             GlowItem( );
04044       }
04045 
04046       if( fShowMapScreenHelpText )
04047       {
04048             // display map screen fast help
04049             DisplayMapScreenFastHelpList( );
04050       }
04051       else
04052       {
04053             // render help
04054             RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
04055       }
04056 
04057 /*
04058       if( fSecondFrame )
04059       {
04060             if( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart )
04061             {
04062                   // game just started, check what state player is in......
04063                   HandlePlayerEnteringMapScreenBeforeGoingToTactical( );
04064             }
04065       }
04066       fSecondFrame = FALSE;
04067 */
04068 
04069       // execute dirty
04070       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
04071 
04072       // update cursor
04073       UpdateCursorIfInLastSector( );
04074       
04075 
04076       // about to leave for new map
04077       if ( gfLoadPending == 1 )
04078       {
04079             gfLoadPending++;
04080 
04081             // Shade this frame!
04082             // Remove cursor
04083             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
04084 
04085             //Shadow area
04086             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );          
04087             InvalidateScreen( );
04088       }
04089       
04090       //InvalidateRegion( 0,0, 640, 480);
04091       EndFrameBufferRender( );
04092 
04093 
04094       // if not going anywhere else
04095       if ( guiPendingScreen == NO_PENDING_SCREEN )
04096       {
04097             if ( HandleFadeInCallback( ) )
04098             {
04099                   // force mapscreen to be reinitialized even though we're already in it
04100                   EndMapScreen( TRUE );
04101             }
04102 
04103             if ( HandleBeginFadeIn( MAP_SCREEN ) )
04104             {
04105             }
04106       }
04107 
04108       HandlePreBattleInterfaceStates();
04109 
04110       if( gfHotKeyEnterSector )
04111       {     
04112             gfHotKeyEnterSector = FALSE;
04113             ActivatePreBattleEnterSectorAction();
04114       }
04115 
04116 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04117       DebugValidateSoldierData( );
04118 #endif
04119 
04120       if ( gfRequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination )
04121       {
04122             RequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination();
04123             gfRequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination = FALSE;
04124       }
04125 
04126 
04127       if( gfFirstMapscreenFrame )
04128       {
04129 //          fSecondFrame = TRUE;
04130             gfFirstMapscreenFrame = FALSE;
04131       }
04132       else
04133       {
04134             // handle exiting from mapscreen due to both exit button clicks and keyboard equivalents
04135             HandleExitsFromMapScreen( );
04136       }
04137 
04138 
04139       return( MAP_SCREEN );
04140 }
04141 
04142 
04143 
04144 void DrawString(STR16 pString, UINT16 uiX, UINT16 uiY, UINT32 uiFont)
04145 {
04146       // draw monochrome string
04147       SetFont(uiFont);
04148       gprintfdirty(uiX,uiY,pString);
04149       mprintf(uiX,uiY,pString); 
04150 }
04151 
04152 
04153 
04154 void SetDayAlternate(STR16 pStringA, ...)
04155 {
04156  // this sets the clock counter, unwind loop
04157  UINT16 uiX=0;
04158  UINT16 uiY=0;
04159  wchar_t String[80]; 
04160  va_list argptr;
04161 
04162       va_start(argptr, pStringA);                                 // Set up variable argument pointer
04163       vswprintf(String, pStringA, argptr);      // process gprintf string (get output str)
04164       va_end(argptr);
04165 
04166       if (String[1]==0)
04167       {
04168             String[1]=String[0];
04169             String[0]=L' ';
04170       }
04171       String[2]=gsTimeStrings[ 3 ][ 0 ];
04172       String[3]=L' ';
04173       String[4]=0; 
04174 
04175       uiX=CLOCK_HOUR_X_START-9;
04176       uiY=CLOCK_Y_START; 
04177 
04178       SetFont( ETA_FONT );
04179       SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
04180       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04181 
04182       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( uiX, uiY, 20 ,GetFontHeight( ETA_FONT ) );
04183       mprintf( uiX, uiY, String );
04184 
04185 }
04186 
04187 
04188 void SetHourAlternate(STR16 pStringA, ...)
04189 {
04190  // this sets the clock counter, unwind loop
04191  UINT16 uiX=0;
04192  UINT16 uiY=0;
04193  wchar_t String[80]; 
04194  va_list argptr;
04195 
04196       va_start(argptr, pStringA);                                 // Set up variable argument pointer
04197       vswprintf(String, pStringA, argptr);      // process gprintf string (get output str)
04198       va_end(argptr);
04199 
04200       if (String[1]==0)
04201       {
04202             String[1]=String[0];
04203             String[0]=L' ';
04204       }
04205 
04206       String[2]=gsTimeStrings[ 0 ][ 0 ];
04207       String[3]=L' ';
04208       String[4]= 0;
04209       uiX=CLOCK_MIN_X_START-5;
04210       uiY=CLOCK_Y_START; 
04211       DrawString(String, uiX, uiY, ETA_FONT);
04212       
04213       SetFont( ETA_FONT );
04214       SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
04215       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04216 
04217       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( uiX, uiY, 20 ,GetFontHeight( ETA_FONT ) );
04218       mprintf( uiX, uiY, String );
04219 
04220 }
04221 
04222 
04223 
04224 void SetClockHour(STR16 pStringA, ...)
04225 {
04226  // this sets the clock counter, unwind loop
04227  UINT16 uiX=0;
04228  UINT16 uiY=0;
04229  wchar_t String[80]; 
04230  va_list argptr;
04231 
04232       va_start(argptr, pStringA);                                 // Set up variable argument pointer
04233       vswprintf(String, pStringA, argptr);      // process gprintf string (get output str)
04234       va_end(argptr);
04235       if (String[1]==0)
04236       {
04237             String[1]=String[0];
04238             String[0]=L' ';
04239       }
04240       String[2]=gsTimeStrings[ 0 ][ 0 ];
04241       String[3]=L' ';
04242       String[4]=0;
04243       uiX=CLOCK_HOUR_X_START-8;
04244       uiY=CLOCK_Y_START; 
04245 
04246       
04247       SetFont( ETA_FONT );
04248       SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
04249       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04250 
04251       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( uiX, uiY, 20 ,GetFontHeight( ETA_FONT ) );
04252       mprintf( uiX, uiY, String );
04253 }
04254 
04255 void SetClockMin(STR16 pStringA, ...)
04256 {
04257  // this sets the clock counter, unwind loop
04258  wchar_t String[10];
04259  va_list argptr;
04260 
04261  va_start(argptr, pStringA);                          // Set up variable argument pointer
04262  vswprintf(String, pStringA, argptr);     // process gprintf string (get output str)
04263  va_end(argptr);
04264  
04265       if (String[1]==0)
04266       {
04267             String[1]=String[0];
04268             String[0]=L' ';
04269       }
04270       String[2]=gsTimeStrings[ 1 ][ 0 ];
04271       String[3]=L' ';
04272       String[4]=0;
04273  
04274       SetFont( ETA_FONT );
04275       SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
04276       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04277 
04278       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( CLOCK_MIN_X_START - 5, CLOCK_Y_START, 20 ,GetFontHeight( ETA_FONT ) );
04279       mprintf( CLOCK_MIN_X_START-5, CLOCK_Y_START, String );
04280 }
04281 
04282 
04283 // WANNE 2 <change 2>
04284 void DrawName(STR16 pName, INT16 sRowIndex, INT32 iFont)
04285 {
04286       UINT16 usX=0;
04287       UINT16 usY=0;
04288 
04289       // mercs
04290       if( sRowIndex < FIRST_VEHICLE )
04291       {
04292             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)NAME_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)NAME_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, pName, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04293       }
04294       // vehicles
04295       else
04296       {
04297             sRowIndex = sRowIndex - FIRST_VEHICLE;
04298             //FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)NAME_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE) + 6), (short)NAME_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, pName, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04299             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)NAME_X + 1, (short)(usVehicleY+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)NAME_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, pName, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04300       }
04301 
04302       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect(NAME_X, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), NAME_WIDTH, Y_SIZE);
04303       DrawString( pName, (UINT16)usX, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), iFont); 
04304 }
04305 
04306 
04307 void DrawAssignment(INT16 sCharNumber, INT16 sRowIndex, INT32 iFont)
04308 {
04309       UINT16 usX=0;
04310       UINT16 usY=0;
04311       wchar_t sString[32];
04312 
04313 
04314       GetMapscreenMercAssignmentString( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ], sString );
04315 
04316       if( sRowIndex < FIRST_VEHICLE )
04317       {
04318             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)ASSIGN_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)ASSIGN_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04319       }
04320       else
04321       {
04322             // WANNE 2
04323             sRowIndex = sRowIndex - FIRST_VEHICLE;
04324             //FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)ASSIGN_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE) + 6), (short)ASSIGN_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04325             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)ASSIGN_X + 1, (short)(usVehicleY+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)ASSIGN_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04326       }
04327 
04328       if( fFlashAssignDone == TRUE )
04329       {
04330             if( Menptr[gCharactersList[sCharNumber].usSolID].fDoneAssignmentAndNothingToDoFlag )
04331             {
04332                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
04333             }
04334       }
04335 
04336       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect(ASSIGN_X-2, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), ASSIGN_WIDTH+2, Y_SIZE);
04337       DrawString(sString, (UINT16)usX, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), iFont);
04338 }
04339 
04340 
04341 void DrawLocation(INT16 sCharNumber, INT16 sRowIndex, INT32 iFont)
04342 {
04343       UINT16 usX=0;
04344       UINT16 usY=0;
04345       wchar_t sString[32];
04346 
04347       GetMapscreenMercLocationString( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ], sString );
04348 
04349       if( sRowIndex < FIRST_VEHICLE )
04350       {
04351             // center
04352             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)LOC_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)LOC_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04353       }
04354       else
04355       {
04356             // WANNE 2
04357             //FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)LOC_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE) + 6), (short)LOC_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04358             sRowIndex = sRowIndex - FIRST_VEHICLE;
04359             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)LOC_X + 1, (short)(usVehicleY+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)LOC_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04360       }
04361       // restore background
04362       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect(LOC_X, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), LOC_WIDTH, Y_SIZE);
04363       
04364       // draw string
04365       DrawString( sString,((UINT16)(usX)), ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), ((UINT32)iFont));
04366 }
04367 
04368 
04369 void DrawDestination(INT16 sCharNumber, INT16 sRowIndex, INT32 iFont)
04370 {
04371       UINT16 usX=0;
04372       UINT16 usY=0;
04373       wchar_t sString[32];
04374 
04375       GetMapscreenMercDestinationString( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ], sString );
04376 
04377       if ( wcslen( sString ) == 0 )
04378       {
04379             return;
04380       }
04381 
04382       if( sRowIndex < FIRST_VEHICLE )
04383       {
04384             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)DEST_ETA_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)DEST_ETA_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04385       }
04386       else
04387       {
04388             // WANNE 2
04389             sRowIndex = sRowIndex - FIRST_VEHICLE;
04390             //FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)DEST_ETA_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE) + 6 ), (short)DEST_ETA_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04391             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)DEST_ETA_X + 1, (short)(usVehicleY+(sRowIndex*Y_SIZE)), (short)DEST_ETA_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04392       }
04393 
04394       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect(DEST_ETA_X+1, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), DEST_ETA_WIDTH-1, Y_SIZE);
04395       // ShowDestinationOfPlottedPath( sString );
04396       DrawString( sString,((UINT16)(usX)), ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sRowIndex+1))), ((UINT32)iFont));
04397 }
04398 
04399 
04400 void DrawTimeRemaining( INT16 sCharNumber, INT32 iFont, UINT8 ubFontColor )
04401 {
04402       UINT16 usX=0;
04403       UINT16 usY=0;
04404       wchar_t sString[32];
04405 
04406 
04407       GetMapscreenMercDepartureString( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ sCharNumber ].usSolID ], sString, &ubFontColor );
04408 
04409       // if merc is highlighted, override the color decided above with bright white
04410       if( sCharNumber == ( INT16 ) giHighLine )
04411       {
04412             ubFontColor = FONT_WHITE;
04413       }
04414 
04415       SetFont(iFont);
04416       SetFontForeground( ubFontColor );
04417 
04418       if( sCharNumber < FIRST_VEHICLE )
04419       {
04420             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)TIME_REMAINING_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sCharNumber*Y_SIZE)), (short)TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04421       }
04422       else
04423       {
04424             // WANNE 2
04425             sCharNumber = sCharNumber - FIRST_VEHICLE;
04426             //FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)TIME_REMAINING_X + 1, (short)(Y_START+(sCharNumber*Y_SIZE) + 6 ), (short)TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04427             FindFontCenterCoordinates((short)TIME_REMAINING_X + 1, (short)(usVehicleY+(sCharNumber*Y_SIZE)), (short)TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, (short)Y_SIZE, sString, (long)iFont, &usX, &usY);
04428       }
04429 
04430       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect(TIME_REMAINING_X, ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sCharNumber+1))), TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, Y_SIZE);
04431       DrawString(sString,((UINT16)(usX)), ((UINT16)(usY+(Y_OFFSET*sCharNumber+1))), ((UINT32)iFont));
04432 }
04433 
04434 
04435 
04436 void RenderMapCursorsIndexesAnims( )
04437 {
04438       BOOLEAN fSelectedSectorHighlighted = FALSE;
04439       BOOLEAN fSelectedCursorIsYellow = TRUE;
04440       UINT16 usCursorColor;
04441       UINT32 uiDeltaTime;
04442       static INT16 sPrevHighlightedMapX = -1, sPrevHighlightedMapY = -1;
04443       static INT16 sPrevSelectedMapX = -1, sPrevSelectedMapY = -1;
04444       static BOOLEAN fFlashCursorIsYellow = FALSE;
04445       BOOLEAN fDrawCursors;
04446       BOOLEAN fHighlightChanged = FALSE;
04447 
04448 
04449       HandleAnimationOfSectors( );
04450 
04451       if( gfBlitBattleSectorLocator )
04452       {
04453             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, gubPBSectorZ, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
04454       }
04455 
04456       fDrawCursors = CanDrawSectorCursor( );
04457 
04458       // if mouse cursor is over a map sector
04459       if ( fDrawCursors && ( GetMouseMapXY( &gsHighlightSectorX, &gsHighlightSectorY ) ) )
04460       {
04461             // handle highlighting of sector pointed at ( WHITE )
04462 
04463             // if we're over a different sector than when we previously blitted this
04464             if ( ( gsHighlightSectorX != sPrevHighlightedMapX ) || ( gsHighlightSectorY != sPrevHighlightedMapY ) || gfMapPanelWasRedrawn )
04465             {
04466                   if ( sPrevHighlightedMapX != -1 && sPrevHighlightedMapY != -1 )
04467                   {
04468                         RestoreMapSectorCursor( sPrevHighlightedMapX, sPrevHighlightedMapY );
04469                   }
04470 
04471                   // draw WHITE highlight rectangle
04472                   RenderMapHighlight( gsHighlightSectorX, gsHighlightSectorY, Get16BPPColor( RGB_WHITE ), FALSE );
04473 
04474                   sPrevHighlightedMapX = gsHighlightSectorX;
04475                   sPrevHighlightedMapY = gsHighlightSectorY;
04476 
04477                   fHighlightChanged = TRUE;
04478             }
04479       }
04480       else
04481       {
04482             // nothing now highlighted
04483             gsHighlightSectorX = -1;
04484             gsHighlightSectorY = -1;
04485 
04486             if ( sPrevHighlightedMapX != -1 && sPrevHighlightedMapY != -1 )
04487             {
04488                   RestoreMapSectorCursor( sPrevHighlightedMapX, sPrevHighlightedMapY );
04489                   fHighlightChanged = TRUE;
04490             }
04491 
04492             sPrevHighlightedMapX = -1;
04493             sPrevHighlightedMapY = -1;
04494       }
04495 
04496 
04497       // handle highlighting of selected sector ( YELLOW ) - don't show it while plotting movement
04498       if ( fDrawCursors && ( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) )
04499       {
04500             // if mouse cursor is over the currently selected sector
04501             if( ( gsHighlightSectorX == sSelMapX ) && ( gsHighlightSectorY == sSelMapY ) )
04502             {
04503                   fSelectedSectorHighlighted = TRUE;
04504 
04505                   // do we need to flash the cursor?  get the delta in time
04506                   uiDeltaTime = GetJA2Clock( ) - guiFlashCursorBaseTime;
04507 
04508                   if ( uiDeltaTime > 300 )
04509                   {
04510                         guiFlashCursorBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
04511                         fFlashCursorIsYellow = !fFlashCursorIsYellow;
04512 
04513                         fHighlightChanged = TRUE;
04514                   }
04515             }
04516 
04517             if ( !fSelectedSectorHighlighted || fFlashCursorIsYellow )
04518             {
04519                   // draw YELLOW highlight rectangle
04520                   usCursorColor = Get16BPPColor( RGB_YELLOW );
04521             }
04522             else
04523             {
04524                   // draw WHITE highlight rectangle
04525                   usCursorColor = Get16BPPColor( RGB_WHITE );
04526 
04527                   // index letters will also be white instead of yellow so that they flash in synch with the cursor
04528                   fSelectedCursorIsYellow = FALSE;
04529             }
04530 
04531             // always render this one, it's too much of a pain detecting overlaps with the white cursor otherwise
04532             RenderMapHighlight( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, usCursorColor, TRUE );
04533 
04534             if ( ( sPrevSelectedMapX != sSelMapX ) || ( sPrevSelectedMapY != sSelMapY ) )
04535             {
04536                   sPrevSelectedMapX = sSelMapX;
04537                   sPrevSelectedMapY = sSelMapY;
04538 
04539                   fHighlightChanged = TRUE;
04540             }
04541       }
04542       else
04543       {
04544             // erase yellow highlight cursor
04545             if ( sPrevSelectedMapX != -1 && sPrevSelectedMapY != -1 )
04546             {
04547                   RestoreMapSectorCursor( sPrevSelectedMapX, sPrevSelectedMapY );
04548                   fHighlightChanged = TRUE;
04549             }
04550 
04551             sPrevSelectedMapX = -1;
04552             sPrevSelectedMapY = -1;
04553       }
04554 
04555 
04556       if ( fHighlightChanged || gfMapPanelWasRedrawn )
04557       {
04558             // redraw sector index letters and numbers
04559 /*
04560             if( fZoomFlag )
04561                   DrawMapIndexSmallMap( fSelectedCursorIsYellow );
04562             else
04563 */
04564                   DrawMapIndexBigMap( fSelectedCursorIsYellow );
04565       }
04566 }
04567 
04568 
04569 
04570 UINT32 HandleMapUI( )
04571 {
04572       UINT32 uiNewEvent = MAP_EVENT_NONE;
04573       INT16 sMapX = 0, sMapY = 0;
04574       INT8 bMapZ = 0;
04575       INT16 sX, sY;
04576       UINT8 ubCount=0;
04577       PathStPtr pNode=NULL;
04578       BOOLEAN fVehicle=FALSE;
04579       POINT MousePos;
04580       UINT32 uiNewScreen = MAP_SCREEN;
04581       BOOLEAN fWasAlreadySelected;
04582 
04583 
04584       // Get Input from keyboard
04585       GetMapKeyboardInput( &uiNewEvent );
04586 
04587 
04588       CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
04589 
04590       // Get mouse
04591       PollLeftButtonInMapView( &uiNewEvent );
04592       PollRightButtonInMapView( &uiNewEvent );
04593 
04594       // Switch on event
04595       switch( uiNewEvent )
04596       {
04597             case MAP_EVENT_NONE:
04598                   break;
04599 
04600             case MAP_EVENT_PLOT_PATH:
04601                      GetMouseMapXY(&sMapX, &sMapY);
04602 
04603 /*
04604                                      // translate screen values to map grid values for zoomed in 
04605                                      if(fZoomFlag)
04606                                      {
04607                                                  sMapX=(UINT16)iZoomX/MAP_GRID_X+sMapX;
04608                                                  sMapX=sMapX/2;
04609                                                  sMapY=(UINT16)iZoomY/MAP_GRID_Y+sMapY;
04610                                                  sMapY=sMapY/2;
04611                                      }
04612 */
04613 
04614 
04615                                      // plotting for the chopper?
04616                                      if( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
04617                                      {
04618 /*
04619                                            if( IsSectorOutOfTheWay( sMapX, sMapY ) == TRUE )
04620                                            {
04621                                                  if( gfAllowSkyriderTooFarQuote == TRUE )
04622                                                  {
04623                                                        SkyRiderTalk( DESTINATION_TOO_FAR );
04624                                                  }
04625 
04626                                                  return( MAP_SCREEN );
04627                                            }
04628 */
04629 
04630                                            PlotPathForHelicopter( sMapX, sMapY );
04631                                            fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04632                                      }
04633                                      else
04634                                      {
04635                                            // plot for character
04636 
04637                                            // check for valid character
04638                                            Assert ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 );
04639                                            if ( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
04640                                                  break;
04641 
04642                                            // check if last sector in character's path is same as where mouse is
04643                                            if( GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID] ) != ( sMapX + ( sMapY * MAP_WORLD_X ) ) )
04644                                            {
04645                                                  sX = ( GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID]  ) % MAP_WORLD_X );
04646                                                  sY = ( GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID]  ) / MAP_WORLD_X );
04647                                                  GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
04648                                                  RestoreBackgroundForMapGrid( sX, sY );
04649                                                 // fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04650                                            }
04651 
04652                                           //SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, 640, 480, FALSE );
04653 
04654                                           if( ( IsTheCursorAllowedToHighLightThisSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == TRUE ) &&
04655                                                       ( SectorInfo[ ( SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ) ].ubTraversability[ THROUGH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != GROUNDBARRIER ) )
04656                                           {
04657                                                 // Can we get go there?  (NULL temp character path)
04658                                                 if ( GetLengthOfPath( pTempCharacterPath ) > 0 )
04659                                                 {
04660                                                       PlotPathForCharacter( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID], sMapX, sMapY, FALSE );
04661 
04662                                                       // copy the path to every other selected character
04663                                                       CopyPathToAllSelectedCharacters( GetSoldierMercPathPtr( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] ) );
04664 
04665                                                       StartConfirmMapMoveMode( sMapY );
04666                                                       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04667                                                       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE; // update team panel desinations
04668                                                 }
04669                                                 else
04670                                                 {
04671                                                       // means it's a vehicle and we've clicked an off-road sector
04672                                                       MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pMapErrorString[ 40 ] );
04673                                                 }
04674                                           }
04675                                     }       
04676                   break;
04677 
04678 
04679             case MAP_EVENT_CANCEL_PATH:
04680                   CancelOrShortenPlottedPath( );
04681                   break;
04682 
04683 
04684 /*
04685     case MAP_EVENT_SELECT_SECTOR:
04686                   // will select the sector the selected merc is in
04687 
04688                   sMapX=Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID].sSectorX;
04689                   sMapY=Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID].sSectorY;
04690                   bMapZ=Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID].bSectorZ;
04691 
04692                   if( ( sSelMapX != sMapX || sSelMapY != sMapY || iCurrentMapSectorZ != bMapZ ) && 
04693                               ( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart == FALSE ) && ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == FALSE ) )
04694                   {
04695                         ChangeSelectedMapSector( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
04696 
04697                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04698 
04699                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
04700         bSelectedDestChar=-1;
04701                   } 
04702 
04703                   break;
04704 */
04705 
04706             case MAP_EVENT_CLICK_SECTOR:
04707 
04708                   // Get Current mouse position
04709                   if ( GetMouseMapXY( &sMapX, &sMapY) )
04710                   {
04711 /*
04712                         if( fZoomFlag == TRUE )
04713                         {
04714                               // convert to zoom out coords from screen coords
04715                   sMapX = ( INT16 )( iZoomX / MAP_GRID_X + sMapX ) / 2;
04716                   sMapY = ( INT16 )( iZoomY / MAP_GRID_Y + sMapY ) / 2;
04717                               //sMapX = ( INT16 ) ( ( ( iZoomX ) / ( MAP_GRID_X * 2) ) + sMapX / 2 );
04718                               //sMapX = ( INT16 ) ( ( ( iZoomY ) / ( MAP_GRID_Y * 2) ) + sMapY / 2 );
04719                         }
04720 */
04721 
04722                         // not zoomed out, make sure this is a valid sector
04723         if( IsTheCursorAllowedToHighLightThisSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == FALSE )
04724                         {
04725           // do nothing, return
04726                               return( MAP_SCREEN );
04727                         }
04728 
04729 
04730                         // while item in hand
04731                         if ( fMapInventoryItem )
04732                         {
04733                               // if not showing item counts on the map
04734                               if ( !fShowItemsFlag )
04735                               {
04736                                     // turn that on
04737                                     ToggleItemsFilter( );
04738                               }
04739 
04740                               // if item's owner is known
04741                               if ( gpItemPointerSoldier != NULL )
04742                               {
04743                                     // make sure it's the owner's sector that's selected
04744                                     if ( ( gpItemPointerSoldier->sSectorX != sSelMapX ) ||
04745                                                  ( gpItemPointerSoldier->sSectorY != sSelMapY ) ||
04746                                                  ( gpItemPointerSoldier->bSectorZ != iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
04747                                     {
04748                                           ChangeSelectedMapSector( gpItemPointerSoldier->sSectorX, gpItemPointerSoldier->sSectorY, gpItemPointerSoldier->bSectorZ );
04749                                     }
04750                               }
04751 
04752                               // if not already in sector inventory
04753                               if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
04754                               {
04755                                     // start it up ( NOTE: for the item OWNER'S sector, regardless of which sector player clicks )
04756                                     fShowMapInventoryPool = TRUE;
04757                                     CreateDestroyMapInventoryPoolButtons( TRUE );
04758                               }
04759 
04760                               return( MAP_SCREEN );
04761                         }
04762 
04763 
04764                         // don't permit other click handling while item is in cursor (entering PBI would permit item teleports, etc.)
04765                         Assert( !fMapInventoryItem );
04766 
04767 
04768                         // this doesn't change selected sector
04769                         if ( gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode )
04770                         {
04771                               if( SectorInfo[ ( SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ) ].ubTraversability[ THROUGH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != GROUNDBARRIER )
04772                               {
04773                                     // if it's not enemy air controlled
04774                                     if ( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sMapX, sMapY ) ].fEnemyAirControlled == FALSE )
04775                                     {
04776                                           CHAR16 sMsgString[ 128 ], sMsgSubString[ 64 ];
04777 
04778                                           // move the landing zone over here
04779                                           gsMercArriveSectorX = sMapX;
04780                                           gsMercArriveSectorY = sMapY;
04781 
04782                                           // change arrival sector for all mercs currently in transit who are showing up at the landing zone
04783                                           UpdateAnyInTransitMercsWithGlobalArrivalSector();
04784 
04785                                           // we're done, cancel this mode
04786                                           CancelChangeArrivalSectorMode();
04787 
04788                                           // get the name of the sector
04789                                           GetSectorIDString( sMapX, sMapY, 0, sMsgSubString, FALSE );
04790 
04791                                           // now build the string
04792                                           swprintf( sMsgString, pBullseyeStrings[ 1 ], sMsgSubString );
04793 
04794                                           // confirm the change with overlay message
04795                                           MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, sMsgString );
04796 
04797                                           // update destination column for any mercs in transit
04798                                           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04799                                     }
04800                                     else
04801                                     {
04802                                           // message: not allowed, don't have airspace secured
04803                                           MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pBullseyeStrings[ 2 ] );
04804                                     }
04805                               }
04806 
04807                               return( MAP_SCREEN );
04808                         }
04809                         else  // not already changing arrival sector
04810                         {
04811                               if ( CanMoveBullseyeAndClickedOnIt( sMapX, sMapY ) )
04812                               {
04813                                     // if the click is ALSO over the helicopter icon
04814                                     // NOTE: The helicopter icon is NOT necessarily directly over the helicopter's current sector!!!
04815                                     if( CheckForClickOverHelicopterIcon( sMapX, sMapY ) == TRUE )
04816                                     {
04817                                           CreateBullsEyeOrChopperSelectionPopup();
04818                                     }
04819                                     else
04820                                     {
04821                                           StartChangeSectorArrivalMode();
04822                                     }
04823 
04824                                     return( MAP_SCREEN );
04825                               }
04826                         }
04827 
04828 
04829                         // if new map sector was clicked on
04830                         if( ( sSelMapX != sMapX ) || ( sSelMapY != sMapY ) )
04831                         {
04832                               fWasAlreadySelected = FALSE;
04833 
04834                               // select the clicked sector, retaining the same sublevel depth
04835                               ChangeSelectedMapSector( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ );
04836                         }
04837                         else
04838                         {
04839                               fWasAlreadySelected = TRUE;
04840                         }
04841 
04842 
04843                         // if showing item counts on the map, and not already in sector inventory
04844                         if ( fShowItemsFlag && !fShowMapInventoryPool )
04845                         {
04846                               // show sector inventory for this clicked sector
04847                               ChangeSelectedMapSector( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 ) iCurrentMapSectorZ );
04848 
04849                               fShowMapInventoryPool = TRUE;
04850                               CreateDestroyMapInventoryPoolButtons( TRUE );
04851 
04852                               return( MAP_SCREEN );
04853                         }
04854 
04855 
04856                         if( gfBlitBattleSectorLocator &&
04857                                     sMapX == gubPBSectorX && sMapY == gubPBSectorY && iCurrentMapSectorZ == gubPBSectorZ )
04858                         { //Bring up a non-persistant version of mapscreen if the user clicks on the sector where a 
04859                               //battle is taking place.
04860                               InitPreBattleInterface( NULL, FALSE );
04861                               return( MAP_SCREEN );
04862                         }
04863 
04864 
04865                         // if we're in airspace mode
04866                         if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
04867                         {
04868                               // if not moving soldiers, and not yet plotting the helicopter
04869                               if ( ( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) )
04870                               {
04871                                     // if we're on the surface level, and the click is over the helicopter icon
04872                                     // NOTE: The helicopter icon is NOT necessarily directly over the helicopter's current sector!!!
04873                                     if( ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 ) && CheckForClickOverHelicopterIcon( sMapX, sMapY ) == TRUE )
04874                                     {
04875                                           RequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination( );
04876                                           return( MAP_SCREEN );
04877                                     }
04878                               }
04879                         }
04880                         else  // not in airspace mode
04881                         {
04882                               // sector must be already selected to initiate movement plotting!  This is to allow selecting sectors with
04883                               // mercs in them without necessarily initiating movement right away.
04884                               if( fWasAlreadySelected )
04885                               {
04886                                     // if there are any movable characters here
04887                                     if ( AnyMovableCharsInOrBetweenThisSector( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
04888                                     {
04889                                           // if showing the surface level map
04890                                           if( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 )
04891                                           {
04892                                                 TurnOnShowTeamsMode( );
04893 
04894                                                 // NOTE: must allow move box to come up, since there may be movable characters between sectors which are
04895                                                 // unaffected by combat / hostiles / air raid in the sector proper itself!!
04896                                                 // This also allows all strategic movement error handling to be centralized in CanCharacterMoveInStrategic()
04897 
04898                                                 // start the move box menu
04899                                                 SetUpMovingListsForSector( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT16 )iCurrentMapSectorZ );
04900                                           }
04901                                           else
04902                                           {
04903                                                 // no strategic movement is possible from underground sectors
04904                                                 DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapErrorString[ 1 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
04905                                                 return( MAP_SCREEN );
04906                                           }
04907                                     }
04908                               }
04909                         }
04910                   }
04911                   break;
04912 
04913 //Kris -- added hook so I can access AIView in non-release mode.
04914 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04915             case MAP_EVENT_VIEWAI: 
04916                   SetPendingNewScreen( AIVIEWER_SCREEN );
04917                   CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
04918                   break;
04919 #endif
04920       }
04921 
04922 
04923       // if we pressed something that will cause a screen change
04924       if ( guiPendingScreen != NO_PENDING_SCREEN )
04925       {
04926             uiNewScreen = guiPendingScreen;
04927       }
04928 
04929       return( uiNewScreen );
04930 }
04931 
04932 
04933 void GetMapKeyboardInput( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
04934 {
04935   InputAtom                         InputEvent;
04936       POINT  MousePos;
04937       INT8 bSquadNumber;
04938       UINT8 ubGroupId = 0;
04939       BOOLEAN fCtrl, fAlt;
04940 
04941       INT16 sMapX, sMapY;
04942 
04943       fCtrl = _KeyDown( CTRL );
04944       fAlt = _KeyDown( ALT );
04945 
04946   while( DequeueEvent( &InputEvent ) )
04947 //          while( DequeueSpecificEvent( &InputEvent, KEY_DOWN ) )            // doesn't work for some reason
04948   {
04949             GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
04950 
04951             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
04952             switch(InputEvent.usEvent)
04953         {
04954                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
04955                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
04956                         break;
04957                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
04958                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);               
04959                         break;
04960                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
04961                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
04962                         break;
04963                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
04964                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);   
04965                         break;
04966                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
04967                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                 
04968                         break;
04969                   case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
04970                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                        
04971                         break;
04972         }
04973 
04974 
04975             if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
04976             {
04977                   // if game is paused because of player, unpause with any key
04978                   if ( gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause )
04979                   {
04980                         HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( );
04981                         continue;
04982                   }
04983 
04984                   if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
04985                   {
04986                         // stop mapscreen text
04987                         StopMapScreenHelpText( );
04988                         continue;
04989                   }
04990 
04991                   // handle for fast help text for interface stuff
04992                   if( IsTheInterfaceFastHelpTextActive() )
04993                   {
04994                         ShutDownUserDefineHelpTextRegions( );
04995                   }
04996 
04997 
04998                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
04999                   {
05000                         case ESC:
05001                               gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop = TRUE;
05002 
05003 
05004                               if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive && !gfPersistantPBI )
05005                               { //Non persistant PBI.  Allow ESC to close it and return to mapscreen.
05006                                     KillPreBattleInterface();
05007                                     gpBattleGroup = NULL;
05008                                     return;
05009                               }
05010 
05011                               if ( gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode )
05012                               {
05013                                     CancelChangeArrivalSectorMode( );
05014                                     MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pBullseyeStrings[ 3 ] );
05015                               }
05016                               // ESC cancels MAP UI messages, unless we're in confirm map move mode
05017                               else if( ( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 ) && !gfInConfirmMapMoveMode )
05018                               {
05019                                     CancelMapUIMessage( );
05020                               }
05021                               else if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp( ) )
05022                               {
05023                                     StopMapScreenHelpText( );
05024                               }
05025             else if ( gpCurrentTalkingFace != NULL && gpCurrentTalkingFace->fTalking )
05026           {
05027             // ATE: We want to stop speech if somebody is talking...
05028             StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
05029           }
05030                               else if( fShowUpdateBox )
05031                               {
05032                                     if( fShowUpdateBox )
05033                                     {
05034                                           EndUpdateBox( FALSE );  // stop time compression
05035                                     }
05036                               }
05037                               else if(fShowDescriptionFlag) 
05038                               {
05039                                     DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
05040                               }
05041                               // plotting movement?
05042                               else if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
05043                               {
05044                                     AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
05045                               }
05046                               else if( fShowAssignmentMenu )
05047                               {
05048                                     // dirty region
05049                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05050                                     fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05051                                     fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05052 
05053                                     // stop showing current assignment box
05054                                     if( fShowAttributeMenu == TRUE )
05055                                     {
05056                                           fShowAttributeMenu = FALSE;
05057                                           fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05058                                     }
05059                                     else if( fShowTrainingMenu == TRUE )
05060                                     {
05061                                           fShowTrainingMenu = FALSE;
05062                                     }
05063                                     else if( fShowSquadMenu == TRUE )
05064                                     {
05065                                           fShowSquadMenu = FALSE;
05066                                     }
05067                                     else if( fShowRepairMenu == TRUE )
05068                                     {
05069                                           fShowRepairMenu = FALSE;
05070                                     }
05071                                     else
05072                                     {
05073                                           fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
05074                                     }
05075                                     giAssignHighLine = -1;
05076                                     // restore background to glow region
05077                                     RestoreBackgroundForAssignmentGlowRegionList( );
05078                               }
05079                               else if( fShowContractMenu == TRUE )
05080                               {
05081                                     fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
05082 
05083                                     // restore contract glow region
05084                                     RestoreBackgroundForContractGlowRegionList( );
05085                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05086                                     fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05087                                     giContractHighLine = -1;
05088                               }
05089                               // in militia popup?
05090                               else if( ( sSelectedMilitiaTown != 0 ) && ( sGreensOnCursor == 0 ) && ( sRegularsOnCursor == 0 ) && ( sElitesOnCursor == 0 ) )
05091                               {
05092                                     sSelectedMilitiaTown = 0;
05093                                     fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05094                               }
05095                               else if( fShowTownInfo == TRUE )
05096                               {
05097                                     fShowTownInfo = FALSE;
05098                                     CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( );
05099                               }
05100                               else if(  fShowDescriptionFlag )
05101                               {
05102                                     if( gMPanelRegion.Cursor != EXTERN_CURSOR )
05103                                     {
05104                                           DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
05105                                     }
05106                               }
05107                               else if( InKeyRingPopup( ) == TRUE )
05108                               {
05109                                     DeleteKeyRingPopup( );
05110                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05111                               }
05112                               else if( fShowInventoryFlag == TRUE )
05113                               {
05114                                     if ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor != EXTERN_CURSOR && !InItemStackPopup() )
05115                                     {
05116                                           fEndShowInventoryFlag = TRUE;
05117                                     }
05118                               }
05119                               else if( MultipleCharacterListEntriesSelected( ) )
05120                               {
05121                                     ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
05122                                     if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05123                                     {
05124                                           SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( bSelectedInfoChar );
05125                                     }
05126                                     fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05127                                     fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05128                               }
05129                               else
05130                               {
05131                                     RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL );
05132                               }
05133                               break; // end of ESC
05134 
05135 
05136                         case PAUSE:
05137                               // Pause game!
05138                               HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( );
05139                               break;
05140 
05141                         case LEFTARROW:
05142                               // previous character
05143                               GoToPrevCharacterInList( );
05144                               break;
05145                         case RIGHTARROW:
05146                               // next character
05147                               GoToNextCharacterInList( );
05148                               break;
05149 
05150                         case UPARROW:
05151                               // up a line
05152                               MapScreenMsgScrollUp( 1 );
05153                               break;
05154                         case DNARROW:
05155                               // down a line
05156                               MapScreenMsgScrollDown( 1 );
05157                               break;
05158 
05159                         case PGUP:
05160                               // up a page
05161                               MapScreenMsgScrollUp( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
05162                               break;
05163                         case PGDN:
05164                               // down a page
05165                               MapScreenMsgScrollDown( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
05166                               break;
05167 
05168                         case HOME:
05169                               // jump to top of message list
05170                               ChangeCurrentMapscreenMessageIndex( 0 );
05171                               break;
05172 
05173                         case END:
05174                               // jump to bottom of message list
05175                               MoveToEndOfMapScreenMessageList();
05176                               break;
05177 
05178                         case INSERT:
05179                               // up one sublevel
05180                               GoUpOneLevelInMap( );
05181                               break;
05182 
05183                         case DEL:
05184                               // down one sublevel
05185                               GoDownOneLevelInMap( );
05186                               break;
05187 
05188                         case ENTER:
05189                               RequestToggleMercInventoryPanel();
05190                               break;
05191 
05192                         case BACKSPACE:
05193           StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
05194                               break;
05195 
05196                         case F1:
05197                         case F2:
05198                         case F3:
05199                         case F4:
05200                         case F5:
05201                         case F6:
05202                               ChangeCharacterListSortMethod( InputEvent.usParam - F1 );
05203                               break;
05204 
05205                         case F7:
05206                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05207                                     if( fAlt )
05208                                     {
05209                                           if ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05210                                           {
05211                                                 SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
05212                                                 if ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem != 0 )
05213                                                 {
05214                                                       pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].bStatus[ 0 ] = 2;
05215                                                 }
05216                                           }
05217                                     }
05218                                     if( fCtrl )
05219                                     {
05220                                           if ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05221                                           {
05222                                                 SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
05223                                                 if ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem != 0 )
05224                                                 {
05225                                                       pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem = GUN_BARREL_EXTENDER;
05226                                                 }
05227                                           }
05228                                     }
05229                               #endif
05230                               break;
05231 
05232                         case F8:
05233                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05234                                     if( fAlt )
05235                                     {
05236                                           // reduce balance to $500
05237                                           AddTransactionToPlayersBook( PAYMENT_TO_NPC, SKYRIDER, GetWorldTotalMin( ), - ( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance - 500 ) );
05238                                     }
05239                               #endif
05240                               break;
05241 
05242                         case F9:
05243                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05244                                     if( fAlt )
05245                                     {
05246                                           UINT8 ubSamIndex;
05247 
05248                                           // ALT-F9: Reveal all SAM sites
05249                                           for( ubSamIndex = 0; ubSamIndex < NUMBER_OF_SAM_SITES; ubSamIndex++ )
05250                                           {
05251                                                 SetSAMSiteAsFound( ubSamIndex );
05252                                           }
05253                                     }
05254                               #endif
05255                               break;
05256 
05257                         case F10:
05258                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05259                                     if( fAlt )
05260                                     {
05261                                           if ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05262                                           {
05263                                                 // ALT-F10: force selected character asleep (ignores breathmax)
05264                                                 PutMercInAsleepState( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] );
05265                                           }
05266                                     }
05267                               #endif
05268                               break;
05269 
05270 /*
05271                         case F11:
05272                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05273                                     if( fAlt )
05274                                     {
05275                                           // ALT-F11: make all sectors player controlled
05276                                           ClearMapControlledFlags( );
05277                                           fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05278                                     }
05279                               #endif
05280                               break;
05281 */
05282 
05283                         case F12:
05284                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
05285                                     *puiNewEvent = MAP_EVENT_VIEWAI;
05286                               #endif
05287                               break;
05288 
05289                         case '+':
05290                         case '=':
05291                               if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == FALSE )
05292                                     RequestIncreaseInTimeCompression();
05293                               break;
05294 
05295                         case '-':
05296                         case '_':
05297                               if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == FALSE )
05298                                     RequestDecreaseInTimeCompression();
05299                               break;
05300 
05301                         case SPACE:
05302                                     if( fShowUpdateBox )
05303                                     {
05304                                           EndUpdateBox( TRUE );  // restart time compression
05305                                     }
05306                                     else
05307                                     {
05308                                           // toggle time compression
05309                                           if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == FALSE )
05310                                                 RequestToggleTimeCompression();
05311                                     }
05312                               break;
05313 
05314                         case '`':
05315                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05316                                     if( fCtrl )
05317                                     {
05318                                           if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05319                                           {
05320                                                 TownMilitiaTrainingCompleted( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], sSelMapX, sSelMapY );
05321                                           }
05322                                     }
05323                               #endif
05324                               break;
05325 
05326                         case '\\':
05327                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05328                                     if( fCtrl )
05329                                     {
05330                                           DumpItemsList();
05331                                     }
05332                               #endif
05333                               break;
05334 
05335                         case '>':
05336                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05337                                     if( fCtrl )
05338                                     {
05339                                           // free
05340                                     }
05341                               #endif
05342                               break;
05343 
05344                         case '?':
05345                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05346                                     if( fCtrl )
05347                                      MapScreenMessage( 0, MSG_DEBUG, L"JA2Clock = %d", GetJA2Clock() );
05348                                     else
05349                                      MapScreenMessage( 0, MSG_DEBUG, L"Mouse X,Y = %d,%d", MSYS_CurrentMX, MSYS_CurrentMY );
05350                               #endif
05351                               break;
05352 
05353                         case '/':
05354                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05355                                     if( fAlt )
05356                                     {
05357                                           if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05358                                           {
05359                                                 StatChange( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], EXPERAMT, 1000, FROM_SUCCESS );
05360                                           }
05361                                     }
05362                               #endif
05363                               break;
05364 
05365 
05366                         case '1':
05367                         case '2':
05368                         case '3':
05369                         case '4':
05370                         case '5':
05371                         case '6':
05372                         case '7':
05373                         case '8':
05374                         case '9':
05375                               // multi-selects all characters in that squad.  SHIFT key and 1-0 for squads 11-20
05376                               bSquadNumber = ( INT8 ) ( InputEvent.usParam - '1' ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05377                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( bSquadNumber );
05378                               break;
05379 
05380                         case '0':
05381                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 9 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05382                               break;
05383 
05384                         case '!':
05385                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 10 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05386                               break;
05387                         case '@':
05388                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 11 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05389                               break;
05390                         case '#':
05391                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 12 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05392                               break;
05393                         case '$':
05394                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 13 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05395                               break;
05396                         case '%':
05397                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 14 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05398                               break;
05399                         case '^':
05400                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 15 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05401                               break;
05402                         case '&':
05403                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 16 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05404                               break;
05405                         case '*':
05406                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 17 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05407                               break;
05408                         case '(':
05409                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 18 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05410                               break;
05411                         case ')':
05412                               SelectAllCharactersInSquad( 19 ); // internal squad #s start at 0
05413                               break;
05414 
05415 
05416                         case 'a':
05417                                     if( fAlt )
05418                                     {
05419                                           if( giHighLine != -1 )
05420                                           {
05421                                                 if( gCharactersList[ giHighLine ].fValid == TRUE )
05422                                                 {
05423                                                       bSelectedAssignChar = ( INT8 )giHighLine;
05424                                                       RebuildAssignmentsBox( );
05425                                                       ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) giHighLine, FALSE );
05426                                                       fShowAssignmentMenu = TRUE;
05427                                                 }
05428                                           }
05429                                           else if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
05430                                           {
05431                                                 if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
05432                                                 {
05433                                                       bSelectedAssignChar = ( INT8 )bSelectedInfoChar;
05434                                                       RebuildAssignmentsBox( );
05435                                                       fShowAssignmentMenu = TRUE;
05436                                                 }
05437                                           }
05438                                     }
05439                                     else if( fCtrl )
05440                                     {
05441                                           if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05442                                           {
05443                                                 if(   gfAutoAmbush ^= 1 )
05444                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Enemy ambush test mode enabled." );
05445                                                 else
05446                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Enemy ambush test mode disabled." );
05447                                           }
05448                                     }
05449                                     else
05450                                     {
05451                                           if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
05452                                           {
05453                                                 //activate autoresolve in prebattle interface.
05454                                                 ActivatePreBattleAutoresolveAction();
05455                                           }
05456                                           else
05457                                           {
05458                                                 // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05459                                                 if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05460                                                 {
05461                                                       ToggleAirspaceMode();
05462                                                 }
05463                                           }
05464                                     }
05465                               break;
05466                               
05467 
05468                         case 'b':
05469 /*
05470                                     // CTRL-B: make player's perception of all sectors correct!
05471                                     if( ( fCtrl )&&( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) ) )
05472                                     {
05473                                           for ( sMapX = 1; sMapX <= 16; sMapX++ )
05474                                           {
05475                                                 for ( sMapY = 1; sMapY <= 16; sMapY++ )
05476                                                 {
05477                                                       MakePlayerPerceptionOfSectorControlCorrect( sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
