05478                                                 }
05479                                           }
05480                                     }
05481 */
05482                               break;
05483 
05484                         case 'c':
05485                               RequestContractMenu();
05486                               break;
05487 
05488                         case 'd':
05489                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05490                                     if( fAlt )
05491                                     {
05492                                           // prints out a text file in C:\TEMP telling you how many stat change chances/successes each profile merc got
05493                                           TestDumpStatChanges();
05494                                     }
05495                               #endif
05496                               break;
05497 
05498                         case 'e':
05499                               if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
05500                               { //activate enter sector in prebattle interface.
05501                                     gfHotKeyEnterSector = TRUE;
05502                               }
05503                               break;
05504                         case 'f':
05505                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05506                               // CTRL-F: Refuel vehicle
05507                               if( ( fCtrl ) && ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) )
05508                               {
05509                                     SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
05510 
05511                                     if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05512                                     {
05513                                           pSoldier->sBreathRed = 10000;
05514                                           pSoldier->bBreath = 100;
05515                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Vehicle refueled" );
05516 
05517                                           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05518                                           fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05519                                     }
05520                               }
05521                               #endif
05522                               if( fAlt )
05523                               {
05524                                     if ( INFORMATION_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05525                                     {
05526                                       //Toggle Frame Rate Display
05527                                       gbFPSDisplay = !gbFPSDisplay;
05528                                       DisableFPSOverlay( (BOOLEAN)!gbFPSDisplay );
05529             }
05530                               }
05531                               break;
05532                         case 'h':
05533                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05534                                     if( fAlt )
05535                                     {
05536                                           // set up the helicopter over Omerta (if it's not already set up)
05537                                           SetUpHelicopterForPlayer( 9,1 );
05538                                           // raise Drassen loyalty to minimum that will allow Skyrider to fly
05539                                           if ( gTownLoyalty[ DRASSEN ].fStarted && ( gTownLoyalty[ DRASSEN ].ubRating < LOYALTY_LOW_THRESHOLD ) )
05540                                           {
05541                                                 SetTownLoyalty( DRASSEN, LOYALTY_LOW_THRESHOLD );
05542                                           }
05543                                           TurnOnAirSpaceMode( );
05544                                     }
05545                                     else
05546                               #endif
05547                                     {
05548                                           // ARM: Feb01/98 - Cancel out of mapscreen movement plotting if Help subscreen is coming up
05549                                           if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
05550                                           {
05551                                                 AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
05552                                           }
05553 
05554                                           ShouldTheHelpScreenComeUp( HELP_SCREEN_MAPSCREEN, TRUE );
05555                                     }
05556 
05557 //                            fShowMapScreenHelpText = TRUE;
05558                               break;
05559 
05560                         case 'i':
05561                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05562 /*
05563                                     if( fAlt )
05564                                     {
05565                                           InitializeMines();
05566                                           fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05567                                     }
05568                                     else
05569 */
05570                                     if( fCtrl )
05571                                     {
05572                                           fDisableJustForIan = ! fDisableJustForIan;
05573                                     }
05574                                     else
05575                                     {
05576                                           // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05577                                           if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05578                                           {
05579                                                 ToggleItemsFilter();
05580                                           }
05581                                     }
05582                               #else
05583                                     // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05584                                     if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05585                                     {
05586                                           ToggleItemsFilter();
05587                                     }
05588                               #endif
05589 
05590                               break;
05591                         case 'l':
05592                               if( fAlt )
05593                               {
05594                                     // although we're not actually going anywhere, we must still be in a state where this is permitted
05595                                     if ( AllowedToExitFromMapscreenTo( MAP_EXIT_TO_LOAD ) )
05596                                     {
05597                                           DoQuickLoad();
05598                                     }
05599                               }
05600                               else if( fCtrl )
05601                               {
05602                                     // go to LOAD screen
05603                                     gfSaveGame = FALSE;
05604                                     RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_LOAD );
05605                               }
05606                               else
05607                               {
05608                                     // go to LAPTOP
05609                                     RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP );
05610                               }
05611                               break;
05612                         case 'm':
05613                               // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05614                               if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05615                               {
05616                                     // toggle show mines flag
05617                                     ToggleShowMinesMode();
05618                               }
05619 
05620                               break;
05621                         case 'n':
05622                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05623                                     if( fAlt )
05624                                     {
05625                                           static UINT16 gQuoteNum = 0;
05626                                           // Get Soldier
05627                                           TacticalCharacterDialogue( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], gQuoteNum );
05628                                           gQuoteNum++;
05629                                     }
05630                                     else if( fCtrl )
05631                                     {
05632                                           static UINT16 gQuoteNum = 0;
05633                                           // Get Soldier
05634                                           if ( giHighLine != -1 )
05635                                           {
05636                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ giHighLine ].usSolID ], gQuoteNum );
05637                                                 gQuoteNum++;
05638                                           }
05639                                     }
05640                               #endif
05641                               break;
05642                         case 'o':
05643                               if( fAlt )
05644                               {     // toggle if Orta & Tixa have been found
05645                                     #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05646                                           fFoundOrta = !fFoundOrta;
05647                                           fFoundTixa = !fFoundTixa;
05648                                           fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05649                                     #endif
05650                               }
05651                               else
05652                               {
05653                                     // go to OPTIONS screen
05654                                     RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_OPTIONS );
05655                               }
05656                               break;
05657 
05658                               case 'p':
05659                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05660                                           if( fCtrl )
05661                                           {
05662                                                 // CTRL-P: Display player's highest progress percentage
05663                                                 DumpSectorDifficultyInfo();
05664                                           }
05665                               #endif
05666 
05667                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05668                                     // ALT-P: Make the selected character a POW!
05669                                     if( ( fAlt ) && ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) )
05670                                     {
05671                                           SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
05672 
05673                                           EnemyCapturesPlayerSoldier( pSoldier );
05674 
05675                                           if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
05676                                           {
05677                                                 RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pSoldier, TRUE );
05678                                           }
05679 
05680                                           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
05681                                           fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
05682                                           fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05683                                     }
05684                               #endif
05685                               break;
05686 
05687                         case 'q':
05688                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05689                                     if( fAlt )
05690                                     {
05691                                           // initialize miners if not already done so (fakes entering Drassen mine first)
05692                                           HandleQuestCodeOnSectorEntry( 13, 4, 0);
05693                                           // test miner quote system
05694                                           IssueHeadMinerQuote( (INT8) (1 + Random(MAX_NUMBER_OF_MINES - 1)), (UINT8) (1 + Random(2)));
05695                                     }
05696                               #endif
05697                               break;
05698                         case 'r':
05699                               if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
05700                               { //activate autoresolve in prebattle interface.
05701                                     ActivatePreBattleRetreatAction();
05702                               }
05703                               break;
05704                         case 's':
05705                               if( fAlt )
05706                               {
05707                                     // although we're not actually going anywhere, we must still be in a state where this is permitted
05708                                     if ( AllowedToExitFromMapscreenTo( MAP_EXIT_TO_SAVE ) )
05709                                     {
05710                                           //if the game CAN be saved
05711                                           if( CanGameBeSaved() )
05712                                           {
05713                                                 guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
05714                                                 DoQuickSave();
05715                                           }
05716                                           else
05717                                           {
05718                                                 //Display a message saying the player cant save now
05719                                                 DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__IRON_MAN_CANT_SAVE_NOW ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
05720                                           }
05721                                     }
05722                               }
05723                               else if( fCtrl )
05724                               {
05725                                     // go to SAVE screen
05726                                     gfSaveGame = TRUE;
05727                                     RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_SAVE );
05728                               }
05729                               break;
05730                         case 't':
05731                               // Teleport: CTRL-T
05732                               if( ( fCtrl )&&( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) ) )
05733                               {
05734                                     // check if selected dest char, 
05735                                     if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) && ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 ) && ( GetMouseMapXY( &sMapX, &sMapY ) ) )
05736                                     {
05737                                           INT16 sDeltaX, sDeltaY;
05738                                           INT16 sPrevX, sPrevY;
05739                                           SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ];
05740 
05741                                           // can't teleport to where we already are
05742                                           if ( ( sMapX == pSoldier->sSectorX ) && ( sMapY == pSoldier->sSectorY ) )
05743                                                 break;
05744 
05745 /*
05746                                           if( fZoomFlag == TRUE )
05747                                           {
05748                                                 // convert to zoom out coords from screen coords
05749                                                 sMapX = ( INT16 )( iZoomX / MAP_GRID_X + sMapX ) / 2;
05750                                                 sMapY = ( INT16 )( iZoomY / MAP_GRID_Y + sMapY ) / 2;
05751                                           }
05752 */
05753 
05754                                           // cancel movement plotting
05755                                           AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
05756 
05757                                           // nuke the UI message generated by this
05758                                           CancelMapUIMessage( );
05759 
05760                                           // clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
05761                                           ClearMvtForThisSoldierAndGang( pSoldier );
05762 
05763                                           // select this sector
05764                                           ChangeSelectedMapSector( sMapX, sMapY, 0 );
05765 
05766                                           // check to see if this person is moving, if not...then assign them to mvt group
05767                                           if( pSoldier->ubGroupID  == 0 )
05768                                           {
05769                                                 ubGroupId = CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( ( INT8 ) ( pSoldier->sSectorX ) , ( INT8 ) ( pSoldier->sSectorY ) );
05770                                                 // assign to a group
05771                                                 AddPlayerToGroup( ubGroupId, pSoldier );              
05772                                           }
05773 
05774                                           // figure out where they would've come from
05775                                           sDeltaX = sMapX - pSoldier->sSectorX;
05776                                           sDeltaY = sMapY - pSoldier->sSectorY;
05777 
05778                                           if ( abs( sDeltaX ) >= abs( sDeltaY ) )
05779                                           {
05780                                                 // use East or West
05781                                                 if( sDeltaX > 0 )
05782                                                 {
05783                                                       // came in from the West
05784                                                       sPrevX = sMapX - 1;
05785                                                       sPrevY = sMapY;
05786                                                 }
05787                                                 else
05788                                                 {     
05789                                                       // came in from the East
05790                                                       sPrevX = sMapX + 1;
05791                                                       sPrevY = sMapY;
05792                                                 }
05793                                           }
05794                                           else
05795                                           {
05796                                                 // use North or South
05797                                                 if( sDeltaY > 0 )
05798                                                 {
05799                                                       // came in from the North
05800                                                       sPrevX = sMapX;
05801                                                       sPrevY = sMapY - 1;
05802                                                 }
05803                                                 else
05804                                                 {     
05805                                                       // came in from the South
05806                                                       sPrevX = sMapX;
05807                                                       sPrevY = sMapY + 1;
05808                                                 }
05809                                           }
05810 
05811                                           // set where they are, were/are going, then make them arrive there and check for battle
05812                                           PlaceGroupInSector( pSoldier->ubGroupID, sPrevX, sPrevY, sMapX, sMapY, 0, TRUE );
05813 
05814                                           // unload the sector they teleported out of
05815                                           CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
05816                                     }
05817                               }
05818                               else 
05819                               {     
05820                                     // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05821                                     if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05822                                     {
05823                                           // Toggle show teams flag
05824                                           ToggleShowTeamsMode();
05825                                     }
05826                               }
05827                               break;
05828                         case 'u':
05829                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05830                               {
05831                                     if( fAlt )
05832                                     {
05833                                           UINT32 uiCnt;
05834                                           // initialize miners if not already done so (fakes entering Drassen mine first)
05835                                           HandleQuestCodeOnSectorEntry( 13, 4, 0);
05836                                           // test running out
05837                                           for (uiCnt = 0; uiCnt < 10; uiCnt++)
05838                                           {
05839                                                 HandleIncomeFromMines();
05840                                           }
05841                                     }
05842                               }
05843                               #endif
05844                               break;
05845                         case 'v':
05846                               if( fCtrl )
05847                               {
05848                                     #ifdef SGP_VIDEO_DEBUGGING
05849                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"VObjects:  %d", guiVObjectSize );
05850                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"VSurfaces:  %d", guiVSurfaceSize );
05851                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"SGPVideoDump.txt updated..." );
05852                                           PerformVideoInfoDumpIntoFile( "SGPVideoDump.txt", TRUE );
05853                                     #endif
05854                               }
05855                               else
05856                               {
05857                                     DisplayGameSettings( );
05858                               }
05859                               break;
05860                         case 'w':
05861                               // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05862                               if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05863                               {
05864                                     // toggle show towns filter
05865                                     ToggleShowTownsMode();
05866                               }
05867                               break;
05868                         case 'x':
05869                               if( fAlt )
05870                               {
05871                                     HandleShortCutExitState( );
05872                               }
05873                               break;
05874 
05875                         case 'y':
05876                               // ALT-Y: toggles SAM sites disable
05877                               if( fAlt )
05878                               {
05879                                     #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05880                                           fSAMSitesDisabledFromAttackingPlayer = !fSAMSitesDisabledFromAttackingPlayer;
05881                                     #endif
05882                               }
05883                               break;
05884 
05885                         case 'z':
05886                               // only handle border button keyboard equivalents if the button is visible!
05887                               if( fCtrl )
05888                               {
05889                                     if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05890                                     {
05891                                           if(   gfAutoAIAware ^= 1 )
05892                                                 ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Strategic AI awareness maxed." );
05893                                           else
05894                                                 ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Strategic AI awareness normal." );
05895                                     }
05896                               }
05897                               else if ( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
05898                               {
05899                                     // Toggle Show Militia ON/OFF
05900                                     ToggleShowMilitiaMode();
05901                               }
05902                               break;
05903                   }
05904             }
05905             else if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_REPEAT )
05906             {
05907                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
05908                   {
05909                         case LEFTARROW:
05910                               // previous character
05911                               GoToPrevCharacterInList( );
05912                               break;
05913                         case RIGHTARROW:
05914                               // next character
05915                               GoToNextCharacterInList( );
05916                               break;
05917 
05918                         case UPARROW:
05919                               // up a line
05920                               MapScreenMsgScrollUp( 1 );
05921                               break;
05922                         case DNARROW:
05923                               // down a line
05924                               MapScreenMsgScrollDown( 1 );
05925                               break;
05926 
05927                         case PGUP:
05928                               // up a page
05929                               MapScreenMsgScrollUp( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
05930                               break;
05931                         case PGDN:
05932                               // down a page
05933                               MapScreenMsgScrollDown( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
05934                               break;
05935 
05936                   }
05937             }
05938       }
05939 }
05940 
05941 
05942 
05943 
05944 void EndMapScreen( BOOLEAN fDuringFade )
05945 {
05946       if ( fInMapMode == FALSE )
05947       {
05948             // shouldn't be here
05949             return;
05950       }
05951 
05952 /*
05953       // exit is called due to message box, leave
05954       if( fMapExitDueToMessageBox )
05955       {
05956             fMapExitDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
05957             return;
05958       }
05959 */
05960 
05961       fLeavingMapScreen = FALSE;
05962 
05963       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
05964   //MSYS_EnableRegion( &gViewportRegion );
05965   //MSYS_EnableRegion( &gRadarRegion );
05966       // ATE: Shutdown tactical interface panel
05967 //    ShutdownCurrentPanel( );
05968 
05969       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
05970       {
05971             // stop mapscreen text
05972             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
05973 
05974             return;
05975       }
05976       
05977       
05978       // still plotting movement?
05979       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
05980       {
05981             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
05982       }
05983 
05984       DestroyMouseRegionsForTeamList( );
05985   
05986       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMapViewRegion );
05987   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gCharInfoFaceRegion);
05988       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gCharInfoHandRegion );
05989       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMPanelRegion);
05990       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMapScreenMaskRegion );
05991       fInMapMode = FALSE;
05992 
05993       // remove team panel sort button
05994       RemoveTeamPanelSortButtonsForMapScreen( );
05995 
05996       // for th merc insurance help text
05997       CreateDestroyInsuranceMouseRegionForMercs( FALSE );
05998 
05999       // gonna need to remove the screen mask regions
06000       CreateDestroyMouseRegionMasksForTimeCompressionButtons( );
06001 
06002       UnloadButtonImage( giMapContractButtonImage );
06003       RemoveButton( giMapContractButton );
06004       
06005       HandleShutDownOfMapScreenWhileExternfaceIsTalking( );
06006 
06007   fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
06008       CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
06009 
06010       // no longer can we show assignments menu
06011       fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
06012 
06013       // clear out mouse regions for pop up boxes
06014       DetermineWhichAssignmentMenusCanBeShown( );
06015 
06016       DetermineWhichMilitiaControlMenusCanBeShown( ); //lal
06017       sSelectedMilitiaTown = 0;
06018       CreateDestroyMilitiaPopUPRegions( );
06019       CreateDestroyMilitiaSectorButtons( );
06020 
06021       // stop showing contract menu
06022       fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
06023       // clear out contract menu
06024       DetermineIfContractMenuCanBeShown( );
06025       // remove contract pop up box (always created upon mapscreen entry)
06026       RemoveBox(ghContractBox);
06027       ghContractBox = -1;
06028 
06029   CreateDestroyAssignmentPopUpBoxes( );
06030   CreateDestroyMilitiaControlPopUpBoxes( ); //lal
06031 
06032       // shutdown movement box
06033       if ( fShowMapScreenMovementList )
06034       {
06035             fShowMapScreenMovementList = FALSE;
06036             CreateDestroyMovementBox( 0, 0, 0 );
06037       }
06038 
06039       // the remove merc from team box
06040       RemoveBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
06041       ghRemoveMercAssignBox = -1;
06042 
06043       // clear screen mask if needed
06044       ClearScreenMaskForMapScreenExit( );
06045 
06046       // get rid of pause clock area
06047       RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( );
06048 
06049       // get rid of pop up for town info, if being shown
06050       fShowTownInfo = FALSE;
06051       CreateDestroyTownInfoBox( );
06052 
06053       // build squad list
06054       RebuildCurrentSquad( ); 
06055 
06056       DeleteMouseRegionsForLevelMarkers( );
06057 
06058       // WANNE 2 <scroll>
06059       //DeleteButtonsForScrolling();
06060 
06061       if( fShowMapInventoryPool == FALSE )
06062       {
06063             // delete buttons
06064             DeleteMapBorderButtons( );
06065       }
06066       
06067       if(fShowDescriptionFlag)
06068       {
06069     DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
06070       }
06071 
06072 
06073       fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
06074       CreateDestroyTrashCanRegion( );
06075 
06076   if ( !fDuringFade )
06077   {
06078     MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(SCREEN_CURSOR);
06079   }
06080 
06081       if(fPreLoadedMapGraphics == FALSE )
06082       {
06083             DeleteMapBottomGraphics( );
06084 
06085             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSubLevel1);
06086             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSubLevel2);
06087             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSubLevel3);
06088             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSleepIcon );
06089             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPCURSORS);
06090             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPBORDER);
06091             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCHARLIST);
06092             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCORNERADDONS);
06093             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPCORNER);
06094             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPOPUPBORDERS);
06095             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCHARINFO);
06096             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCHARICONS);
06097             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCROSS);
06098             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiBIGMAP);
06099       //    DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiPOPUPTEX);
06100             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSAMICON);
06101             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPINV);
06102             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMapInvSecondHandBlockout);
06103             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiULICONS);
06104             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiORTAICON);
06105             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiTIXAICON);
06106             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCHARBETWEENSECTORICONS );
06107             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCHARBETWEENSECTORICONSCLOSE );
06108             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiLEVELMARKER );
06109             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapBorderEtaPopUp );
06110             
06111             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSecItemHiddenVO );
06112             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSelectedCharArrow );
06113             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapBorderHeliSectors );
06114             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiHelicopterIcon );
06115             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMINEICON );
06116             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSectorLocatorGraphicID );
06117 
06118             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBULLSEYE );
06119       
06120             // remove the militia pop up box
06121             RemoveMilitiaPopUpBox( );
06122 
06123             // remove inventory pool graphic
06124             RemoveInventoryPoolGraphic( );
06125 
06126             // get rid of border stuff
06127             DeleteMapBorderGraphics( );
06128 
06129             //Kris:  Remove the email icons.
06130             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiNewMailIcons );
06131       }
06132 
06133       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBrownBackgroundForTeamPanel );
06134 
06135       RemoveMapStatusBarsRegion( );
06136       
06137       fShowUpdateBox = FALSE;
06138       CreateDestroyTheUpdateBox( );
06139 
06140 
06141       // get rid of mapscreen bottom
06142       DeleteMapScreenInterfaceBottom( );
06143 
06144 
06145       // shutdown any mapscreen UI overlay message
06146       CancelMapUIMessage( );
06147 
06148 
06149       CreateDestroyMapCharacterScrollButtons( );
06150 
06151       // if time was ever compressed while we were in mapscreen
06152       if ( HasTimeCompressOccured( ) )
06153       {
06154             // make sure everything tactical got cleared out
06155             ClearTacticalStuffDueToTimeCompression();
06156       }
06157 
06158 
06159       CancelSectorInventoryDisplayIfOn( TRUE );
06160 
06161 
06162       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
06163       if(fLapTop)
06164       {
06165             StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
06166         guiCurrentScreen=LAPTOP_SCREEN;
06167       }
06168       else
06169       {
06170         guiCurrentScreen = GAME_SCREEN;
06171 
06172             // remove the progress bar
06173             RemoveProgressBar( 0 );
06174 
06175             // enable scroll string video overlays
06176             EnableDisableScrollStringVideoOverlay( TRUE );
06177       }
06178 
06179       // if going to tactical next
06180       if ( guiPendingScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
06181       {
06182             // set compressed mode to Normal (X1)
06183             SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_X1 );
06184       }
06185       else  // going to another screen (options, laptop, save/load)
06186       {
06187             StopTimeCompression();
06188       }
06189 
06190       // update paused states, we are exiting...need to reset for any pathing or menus displayed
06191       UnLockPauseState( );
06192       UpdatePausedStatesDueToTimeCompression( );
06193 
06194       if( !gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop )
06195       {
06196             VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
06197             UINT32 uiLaptopOn;
06198 
06199             //Load a tiny graphic of the on screen and draw it to the buffer.
06200             PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "SOUNDS\\Initial Power Up (8-11).wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
06201             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
06202             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\LaptopOn.sti" );
06203             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiLaptopOn ) )
06204                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\Interface\\LaptopOn.sti" );
06205             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiLaptopOn, 0, 465, 417, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
06206             InvalidateRegion( 465, 417, 480, 427 );
06207             ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
06208             EndFrameBufferRender( );
06209             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiLaptopOn );
06210             RefreshScreen( NULL );
06211       }
06212       
06213 
06214       //Kris:  Removes the pre battle interface, but only if it exists.
06215       //             It is internally considered.
06216       KillPreBattleInterface();
06217 
06218       // cancel request if we somehow leave first
06219       gfRequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination = FALSE;
06220 }
06221  
06222 
06223 BOOLEAN GetMouseMapXY( INT16 *psMapWorldX, INT16 *psMapWorldY )
06224 {
06225       POINT  MousePos;
06226 
06227       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp( ) )
06228       {
06229             // don't show highlight while global help text is up
06230             return( FALSE );
06231       }
06232 
06233 
06234       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
06235 
06236   if(fZoomFlag)
06237       {
06238    if(MousePos.x >MAP_GRID_X+MAP_VIEW_START_X)
06239         MousePos.x-=MAP_GRID_X;
06240        if(MousePos.x >MAP_VIEW_START_X+MAP_VIEW_WIDTH)
06241             MousePos.x=-1;
06242        if(MousePos.y > MAP_GRID_Y+MAP_VIEW_START_Y)
06243         MousePos.y-=MAP_GRID_Y;
06244    if(MousePos.y >MAP_VIEW_START_Y+MAP_VIEW_HEIGHT-11)
06245             MousePos.y=-11; 
06246    if(MousePos.y < MAP_VIEW_START_Y)
06247              MousePos.y=-1;
06248       }
06249 
06250       return( GetMapXY( (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y, psMapWorldX, psMapWorldY ) );
06251 }
06252 
06253 
06254 
06255 
06256 BOOLEAN GetMapXY( INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 *psMapWorldX, INT16 *psMapWorldY )
06257 {
06258       INT16 sMapX, sMapY;
06259 
06260       // Subtract start of map view
06261       sMapX = sX - MAP_VIEW_START_X;//+2*MAP_GRID_X;
06262       sMapY = sY - MAP_VIEW_START_Y;
06263 
06264       if(!fZoomFlag)
06265       {
06266       if ( sMapX < MAP_GRID_X || sMapY < MAP_GRID_Y )
06267       {
06268             return( FALSE );
06269       }
06270       }
06271       if ( sMapX < 0 || sMapY < 0 )
06272       {
06273             return( FALSE );
06274       }
06275 
06276       if ( sMapX > MAP_VIEW_WIDTH+MAP_GRID_X-1 || sMapY > MAP_VIEW_HEIGHT+7/* +MAP_VIEW_HEIGHT */ )
06277       {
06278             return( FALSE );
06279       }
06280       if(sMapX < 1 || sMapY <1)
06281       {
06282             return (FALSE);
06283       }
06284   
06285       *psMapWorldX = ( sMapX / MAP_GRID_X );
06286       *psMapWorldY = ( sMapY / MAP_GRID_Y );
06287   
06288       return( TRUE );
06289 }
06290 
06291 
06292 
06293 void RenderMapHighlight( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, UINT16 usLineColor, BOOLEAN fStationary )
06294 {
06295       INT16                                                                   sScreenX, sScreenY;
06296       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
06297       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
06298 
06299 
06300       Assert( ( sMapX >= 1 ) && ( sMapX <= 16 ) );
06301       Assert( ( sMapY >= 1 ) && ( sMapY <= 16 ) );
06302 
06303 /*
06304       if((fZoomFlag)&&((sMapX > MAP_WORLD_X-1)||(sMapY> MAP_WORLD_Y-1)))
06305    return;
06306 */
06307 
06308       // if we are not allowed to highlight, leave
06309       if( ( IsTheCursorAllowedToHighLightThisSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == FALSE )&&( fZoomFlag == FALSE ) )
06310       {
06311             return;
06312       }
06313 /*
06314       else if( ( IsTheCursorAllowedToHighLightThisSector( sMapX , sMapY ) == FALSE )&&( fZoomFlag == TRUE ) && ( fStationary == TRUE ) )
06315       {
06316             return;
06317       }
06318       else if( ( IsTheCursorAllowedToHighLightThisSector( ( INT16 ) ( ( ( iZoomX ) / ( MAP_GRID_X * 2 ) ) + sMapX / 2 ) ,( INT16 ) ( ( ( iZoomY ) / ( MAP_GRID_Y * 2 ) ) + sMapY / 2 ) ) == FALSE ) && ( fZoomFlag == TRUE ) &&( fStationary == FALSE ) )
06319   {
06320             return;
06321       }
06322 */
06323 
06324 
06325 //    if((!fStationary)||(!fZoomFlag))
06326       {
06327         GetScreenXYFromMapXY( sMapX, sMapY, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
06328       }
06329 /*
06330   else
06331       {
06332     GetScreenXYFromMapXYStationary( sMapX, sMapY, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
06333       }
06334 */
06335 
06336       // blit in the highlighted sector
06337       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
06338 
06339       // clip to view region
06340       ClipBlitsToMapViewRegionForRectangleAndABit( uiDestPitchBYTES );
06341 
06342       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
06343       {
06344             // DB Need to add a radar color for 8-bit 
06345 /*
06346             if (fZoomFlag)
06347             {
06348                   // draw rectangle for zoom in
06349               RectangleDraw( TRUE, sScreenX-MAP_GRID_X,     sScreenY-MAP_GRID_Y - 1, sScreenX +  MAP_GRID_ZOOM_X - MAP_GRID_X, sScreenY +  MAP_GRID_ZOOM_Y - MAP_GRID_Y - 1, usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
06350               InvalidateRegion(    sScreenX-MAP_GRID_X - 3, sScreenY-MAP_GRID_Y - 4, sScreenX + DMAP_GRID_ZOOM_X - MAP_GRID_X, sScreenY + DMAP_GRID_ZOOM_Y - MAP_GRID_Y - 1 );
06351             }
06352         else
06353 */
06354             {
06355                   // draw rectangle for zoom out
06356               RectangleDraw( TRUE, sScreenX, sScreenY - 1, sScreenX +  MAP_GRID_X, sScreenY +  MAP_GRID_Y - 1, usLineColor, pDestBuf );   
06357               InvalidateRegion(    sScreenX, sScreenY - 2, sScreenX + DMAP_GRID_X + 1, sScreenY + DMAP_GRID_Y - 1 );
06358             }
06359       }
06360 
06361       RestoreClipRegionToFullScreenForRectangle( uiDestPitchBYTES );
06362       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
06363 }
06364 
06365 
06366 
06367 void PollLeftButtonInMapView( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
06368 {
06369       static BOOLEAN    fLBBeenPressedInMapView = FALSE;
06370   INT16 sMapX, sMapY;
06371 
06372 
06373       // if the mouse is currently over the MAP area
06374   if ( gMapViewRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
06375       {
06376             // if L-button is down at the moment
06377             if ( gMapViewRegion.ButtonState & MSYS_LEFT_BUTTON )
06378             {
06379                   if ( !fLBBeenPressedInMapView )
06380                   {
06381                         fLBBeenPressedInMapView = TRUE;
06382                         RESETCOUNTER( LMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
06383 
06384                         gfAllowSkyriderTooFarQuote = FALSE;
06385                   }
06386             }
06387             else  // L-button is NOT down at the moment
06388             {
06389                   if ( fLBBeenPressedInMapView  )
06390                   {
06391                         fLBBeenPressedInMapView = FALSE;
06392                         RESETCOUNTER( LMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
06393 
06394                         // if we are showing help text in mapscreen
06395                         if( fShowMapScreenHelpText )
06396                         {
06397                               fShowMapScreenHelpText = FALSE;
06398                               fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
06399                               fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06400                               return;
06401                         }
06402 
06403                         // if in militia redistribution popup
06404                         if ( sSelectedMilitiaTown != 0 )
06405                         {
06406                               // ignore clicks outside the box
06407                               return;
06408                         }
06409 
06410                         // left click cancels MAP UI messages, unless we're in confirm map move mode
06411                         if( ( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 ) && !gfInConfirmMapMoveMode )
06412                         {
06413                               CancelMapUIMessage( );
06414 
06415                               // return unless moving the bullseye
06416                               if ( !gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode )
06417                                     return;
06418                         }
06419 
06420                         // ignore left clicks in the map screen if:
06421                         // game just started or we're in the prebattle interface or if we are about to hit pre-battle
06422                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart == TRUE ) ||
06423                                      ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE ) ||
06424                                      ( fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle  == TRUE ) )
06425                         {
06426                               return;
06427                         }
06428 
06429 
06430                         // if in "plot route" mode
06431                         if ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) ) 
06432                         {
06433                               fEndPlotting = FALSE;
06434 
06435                               GetMouseMapXY(&sMapX, &sMapY);
06436 
06437 /*
06438                               // translate screen values to map grid values for zoomed in 
06439                               if(fZoomFlag)
06440                               {
06441                                     sMapX=(UINT16)iZoomX/MAP_GRID_X+sMapX;
06442                                     sMapX=sMapX/2;
06443                                     sMapY=(UINT16)iZoomY/MAP_GRID_Y+sMapY;
06444                                     sMapY=sMapY/2;
06445                               }
06446 */
06447 
06448                               // if he clicked on the last sector in his current path
06449                               if( CheckIfClickOnLastSectorInPath( sMapX, sMapY ) )
06450                               {
06451                                     DestinationPlottingCompleted();
06452                               }
06453                               else  // clicked on a new sector
06454                               {
06455                                     gfAllowSkyriderTooFarQuote = TRUE;
06456 
06457                                     // draw new map route
06458                                     *puiNewEvent = MAP_EVENT_PLOT_PATH;
06459                               }
06460                         }
06461             else  // not plotting movement
06462                         {
06463                               // if not plotting a path
06464                               if( ( fEndPlotting == FALSE ) && ( fJustFinishedPlotting == FALSE ) )
06465                               {
06466                                     // make this sector selected / trigger movement box / start helicopter plotting / changing arrival sector
06467                                     *puiNewEvent = MAP_EVENT_CLICK_SECTOR;
06468                               }
06469 
06470                               fEndPlotting = FALSE;
06471                         }
06472 
06473                         // reset town info flag
06474                         fShowTownInfo = FALSE;
06475                   }
06476             }
06477       }
06478 
06479       fJustFinishedPlotting = FALSE;
06480 }
06481 
06482 
06483 void PollRightButtonInMapView( UINT32 *puiNewEvent )
06484 {
06485       static BOOLEAN    fRBBeenPressedInMapView = FALSE;
06486   INT16 sMapX, sMapY;
06487 
06488 
06489       // if the mouse is currently over the MAP area
06490   if ( gMapViewRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
06491       {
06492             // if R-button is down at the moment
06493             if ( gMapViewRegion.ButtonState & MSYS_RIGHT_BUTTON )
06494             {
06495                   if ( !fRBBeenPressedInMapView )
06496                   {
06497                         fRBBeenPressedInMapView = TRUE;
06498                         RESETCOUNTER( RMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
06499                   }
06500             }
06501             else  // R-button is NOT down at the moment
06502             {
06503                   if ( fRBBeenPressedInMapView )
06504                   {
06505                         fRBBeenPressedInMapView = FALSE;
06506                         RESETCOUNTER( RMOUSECLICK_DELAY_COUNTER );
06507 
06508                         // if we are showing help text in mapscreen
06509                         if( fShowMapScreenHelpText )
06510                         {
06511                               fShowMapScreenHelpText = FALSE;
06512                               fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
06513                               fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06514                               return;
06515                         }
06516 
06517                         // if in militia redistribution popup
06518                         if ( sSelectedMilitiaTown != 0 )
06519                         {
06520                               // ignore clicks outside the box
06521                               return;
06522                         }
06523 
06524                         if ( gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode )
06525                         {
06526                               CancelChangeArrivalSectorMode( );
06527                               MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pBullseyeStrings[ 3 ] );
06528                               return;
06529                         }
06530 
06531                         // right click cancels MAP UI messages, unless we're in confirm map move mode
06532                         if( ( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 ) && !gfInConfirmMapMoveMode )
06533                         {
06534                               CancelMapUIMessage( );
06535                               return;
06536                         }
06537 
06538                         // ignore right clicks in the map area if:
06539                         // game just started or we're in the prebattle interface or if we are about to hit pre-battle
06540                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart == TRUE ) ||
06541                                      ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE ) ||
06542                                      ( fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle  == TRUE ) )
06543                         {
06544                               return;
06545                         }
06546 
06547 
06548                         if ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
06549                         {
06550                               // cancel/shorten the path
06551                               *puiNewEvent = MAP_EVENT_CANCEL_PATH;
06552                         }
06553                         else
06554                         {
06555                               if ( GetMouseMapXY( &sMapX, &sMapY ) )
06556                               {
06557 /*
06558                                     if(fZoomFlag)
06559                                     {
06560                                           sMapX=(UINT16)iZoomX/MAP_GRID_X+sMapX;
06561                                           sMapX=sMapX/2;
06562                                           sMapY=(UINT16)iZoomY/MAP_GRID_Y+sMapY;
06563                                           sMapY=sMapY/2;
06564                                     }
06565 */
06566 
06567                                     if( ( sSelMapX != sMapX ) || ( sSelMapY != sMapY ) )
06568                                     {
06569                                           ChangeSelectedMapSector( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ );
06570                                     }
06571                               }
06572 
06573                               // sector must be selected to bring up militia or town info boxes for it
06574                               if ( ( sMapX == sSelMapX ) && ( sSelMapY == sMapY ) )
06575                               {
06576                                     if ( fShowMilitia == TRUE )
06577                                     {
06578                                           HandleMilitiaRedistributionClick();
06579                                     }
06580                                     else // show militia is OFF
06581                                     {
06582                                           // if on the surface, or a real underground sector (we've visited it)
06583                                           if ( ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 ) ||
06584                                                        ( GetSectorFlagStatus( sMapX, sMapY, ( UINT8 ) iCurrentMapSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED ) == TRUE ) )
06585                                           {
06586                                                 // toggle sector info for this sector
06587                                                 fShowTownInfo = !fShowTownInfo;
06588                                                 fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06589                                           }
06590                                     }
06591 
06592 //                                  fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
06593 
06594                                     CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( );
06595                                     if( fShowTownInfo == FALSE )
06596                                     {
06597                                           // destroy town info box
06598                                           CreateDestroyTownInfoBox( );
06599                                     }
06600                               }
06601                         }
06602                   }
06603             }
06604       }
06605 }
06606 
06607 
06608 
06609 void PopupText( UINT16 *pFontString, ...  )
06610 {
06611       UINT8  *pDestBuf;
06612       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
06613       va_list argptr;
06614       INT16 sX, sY;
06615       wchar_t     PopupString[512];
06616 
06617       va_start(argptr, pFontString);            // Set up variable argument pointer
06618       vswprintf(PopupString, pFontString, argptr);    // process gprintf string (get output str)
06619       va_end(argptr);
06620 
06621 
06622       FindFontCenterCoordinates( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, INTERFACE_START_Y, PopupString, LARGEFONT1, &sX, &sY );
06623 
06624       BltVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, guiINTEXT, 0, 85, 160, VS_BLT_FAST | VS_BLT_USECOLORKEY, NULL );
06625 
06626       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
06627 
06628       SetFont( LARGEFONT1 );
06629       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
06630       SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
06631 
06632       mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, LARGEFONT1, sX, sY, PopupString );
06633 
06634       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
06635 
06636       InvalidateScreen( );
06637 
06638 }
06639 
06640 
06641 /*
06642 void BtnINVCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
06643 {
06644       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
06645             return;
06646 
06647       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06648       {
06649             if(fMapInventoryItem)
06650                   return;
06651             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
06652             {
06653              fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
06654             }
06655     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
06656       }
06657       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06658       {
06659             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
06660             {
06661              btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06662 
06663              if(!fMapInventoryItem)
06664              {
06665                fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
06666              }
06667 
06668              // set help text for item glow region
06669              if( fShowInventoryFlag )
06670              {
06671                    SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
06672              }
06673              else
06674              {
06675                    SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
06676              }
06677 
06678              fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06679             }
06680       }
06681 }
06682 */
06683 
06684 
06685 void CreateDestroyMapInvButton()
06686 {
06687  static BOOLEAN fOldShowInventoryFlag=FALSE; 
06688 
06689  if( fShowInventoryFlag && !fOldShowInventoryFlag )
06690  {
06691        // create inventory button
06692   fOldShowInventoryFlag=TRUE;
06693   //giMapInvButtonImage=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\mapinv.sti" ,-1,1,-1,2,-1 );
06694   //giMapInvButton= QuickCreateButton( giMapInvButtonImage, INV_BTN_X-1, INV_BTN_Y,
06695                                     //                      BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
06696                                     //                      BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnINVCallback);
06697   // disable allmouse regions in this space
06698   fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
06699 
06700   InitInvSlotInterface( gMapScreenInvPocketXY, &gSCamoXY, MAPInvMoveCallback, MAPInvClickCallback, MAPInvMoveCamoCallback, MAPInvClickCamoCallback, FALSE );
06701   MSYS_EnableRegion(&gMPanelRegion);
06702 
06703       // switch hand region help text to "Exit Inventory"
06704       SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
06705 
06706       // reset inventory item help text
06707       memset( gubMAP_HandInvDispText, 0, sizeof( gubMAP_HandInvDispText ) );
06708 
06709       // dirty character info panel  ( Why? ARM )
06710       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty=TRUE;
06711  }
06712  else if( !fShowInventoryFlag && fOldShowInventoryFlag )
06713  {
06714        // destroy inventory button
06715        ShutdownInvSlotInterface( );
06716        fOldShowInventoryFlag=FALSE;
06717    //RemoveButton( giMapInvButton );
06718    //UnloadButtonImage( giMapInvButtonImage );
06719    fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
06720    MSYS_DisableRegion(&gMPanelRegion);
06721 
06722       // switch hand region help text to "Enter Inventory"
06723       SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
06724 
06725       // force immediate reblit of item in HANDPOS now that it's not blitted while in inventory mode
06726       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty=TRUE;
06727  }
06728 }
06729 
06730 
06731 
06732 void BltCharInvPanel()
06733 {
06734       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
06735       UINT16  *pDestBuf;
06736       HVOBJECT hCharListHandle;
06737       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06738       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
06739       UINT16 usX, usY;
06740       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06741 
06742 
06743       // make sure we're here legally
06744       Assert( MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( bSelectedInfoChar ) );
06745       
06746       GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID );
06747 
06748   
06749   pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface( guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
06750   GetVideoObject(&hCharListHandle, guiMAPINV);
06751   Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferTransparent( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, hCharListHandle, PLAYER_INFO_X, PLAYER_INFO_Y, 0);
06752   UnLockVideoSurface( guiSAVEBUFFER ); 
06753   
06754   Assert( pSoldier );
06755   CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
06756 
06757       if( gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos != -1 )
06758       {
06759             if( HandleCompatibleAmmoUIForMapScreen( pSoldier, (INT32)gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos, TRUE, TRUE ) == TRUE )
06760             {
06761                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
06762             }
06763       }
06764 
06765       if( ( fShowMapInventoryPool ) )
06766       {
06767             if( iCurrentlyHighLightedItem != -1 )
06768             {
06769                   HandleCompatibleAmmoUIForMapScreen( pSoldier, (INT32)( iCurrentlyHighLightedItem + ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) ) , TRUE, FALSE );
06770             }
06771       }
06772 
06773   RenderInvBodyPanel(pSoldier, INV_BODY_X, INV_BODY_Y );
06774       
06775       // reset font destination buffer to the save buffer
06776       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
06777       
06778       // render items in each of chars slots
06779   HandleRenderInvSlots( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
06780       
06781       // reset font destination buffer
06782       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0,0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
06783 
06784       SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
06785 
06786       // Render Values for stats!
06787       // Set font drawing to saved buffer
06788       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
06789 
06790       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
06791       SetFontForeground( MAP_INV_STATS_TITLE_FONT_COLOR );
06792 
06793       // print armor/weight/camo labels
06794   mprintf( MAP_ARMOR_LABEL_X, MAP_ARMOR_LABEL_Y, pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 0 ] );
06795   mprintf( MAP_ARMOR_PERCENT_X, MAP_ARMOR_PERCENT_Y, L"%%" );
06796 
06797   mprintf( MAP_WEIGHT_LABEL_X, MAP_WEIGHT_LABEL_Y, pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 1 ]  );
06798   mprintf( MAP_WEIGHT_PERCENT_X, MAP_WEIGHT_PERCENT_Y, L"%%" );
06799  
06800       mprintf( MAP_CAMMO_LABEL_X, MAP_CAMMO_LABEL_Y, pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 2 ]  );
06801   mprintf( MAP_CAMMO_PERCENT_X, MAP_CAMMO_PERCENT_Y, L"%%" );
06802 
06803       // display armor value
06804       swprintf( sString, L"%3d", ArmourPercent( pSoldier ) );
06805       FindFontRightCoordinates(MAP_ARMOR_X, MAP_ARMOR_Y, MAP_PERCENT_WIDTH, MAP_PERCENT_HEIGHT, sString, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
06806       mprintf( usX, usY, sString ); 
06807 
06808       // Display weight value
06809       swprintf( sString, L"%3d", CalculateCarriedWeight( pSoldier ) );
06810       FindFontRightCoordinates(MAP_WEIGHT_X, MAP_WEIGHT_Y, MAP_PERCENT_WIDTH, MAP_PERCENT_HEIGHT, sString, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
06811       mprintf( usX, usY, sString ); 
06812 
06813       // Display camo value
06814       swprintf( sString, L"%3d", max(0, min ((pSoldier->bCamo + pSoldier->wornCamo + pSoldier->urbanCamo+pSoldier->wornUrbanCamo+pSoldier->desertCamo+pSoldier->wornDesertCamo+pSoldier->snowCamo+pSoldier->wornSnowCamo ),100 )) );
06815       FindFontRightCoordinates(MAP_CAMMO_X, MAP_CAMMO_Y, MAP_PERCENT_WIDTH, MAP_PERCENT_HEIGHT, sString, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
06816       mprintf( usX, usY, sString ); 
06817 
06818       if( InKeyRingPopup( ) )
06819       {
06820             // shade the background
06821             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( guiSAVEBUFFER , PLAYER_INFO_X, PLAYER_INFO_Y, PLAYER_INFO_X + 261,  PLAYER_INFO_Y + ( 359 - 107 ));
06822       }
06823       else
06824       {
06825             // blit gold key on top of key ring if key ring is not empty
06826       }
06827 
06828       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
06829 }
06830 
06831 // check for and highlight any ammo 
06832 void HandleCursorOverRifleAmmo( )
06833 {
06834       if( fShowInventoryFlag == FALSE )
06835       {
06836             return;
06837       }
06838 
06839       if( gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos == -1 )
06840       {
06841             return;
06842       }
06843 
06844       if ( gfCheckForMouseOverItem )
06845       {     
06846             if ( HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], (INT8)gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos, TRUE ) )
06847             {
06848                   if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiMouseOverItemTime ) > 100 )
06849                   {
06850                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06851                   }
06852             }
06853       }
06854 }
06855 
06856 void MAPInvClickCamoCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06857 {
06858 
06859 
06860 }
06861 
06862 void MAPInvMoveCamoCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06863 {
06864 
06865 
06866 }
06867 
06868 
06869 // this is Map Screen's version of SMInvMoveCallback()
06870 void MAPInvMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06871 {
06872       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06873       UINT32 uiHandPos;
06874 
06875 
06876       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
06877       {
06878             return;
06879       }
06880 
06881       // make sure we're here legally
06882       Assert( MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( bSelectedInfoChar ) );
06883 
06884       GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID );
06885 
06886       uiHandPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06887 
06888       //gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = -1;
06889 
06890       if ( pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
06891             return;
06892 
06893       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
06894       {
06895       }
06896       else if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
06897 //  if( ( iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE ) || ( iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE ) )
06898       {
06899             gubMAP_HandInvDispText[ uiHandPos ] = 2;
06900             guiMouseOverItemTime = GetJA2Clock( );
06901             gfCheckForMouseOverItem = TRUE;
06902             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( pSoldier, (INT8)uiHandPos, FALSE );
06903             gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = (INT8)uiHandPos;
06904       }
06905       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06906       {
06907             gubMAP_HandInvDispText[ uiHandPos ] = 1;
06908             HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( pSoldier, (INT8)uiHandPos, FALSE );
06909             gfCheckForMouseOverItem = FALSE;
06910             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06911         gbCheckForMouseOverItemPos = -1;
06912       }     
06913 }
06914 
06915 // mapscreen wrapper to init the item description box
06916 BOOLEAN MAPInternalInitItemDescriptionBox( OBJECTTYPE *pObject, UINT8 ubStatusIndex, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06917 {
06918       BOOLEAN fRet;
06919 
06920       fRet = InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( pObject, MAP_ITEMDESC_START_X, MAP_ITEMDESC_START_Y, ubStatusIndex, pSoldier );
06921 
06922       fShowDescriptionFlag=TRUE;
06923       fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
06924       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
06925 
06926       return( fRet );
06927 }
06928 
06929 // this is Map Screen's version of SMInvClickCallback()
06930 void MAPInvClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06931 {
06932       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06933       UINT32 uiHandPos;
06934       UINT16      usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex;
06935       static BOOLEAN    fRightDown = FALSE;
06936 
06937 
06938       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
06939       {
06940             return;
06941       }
06942 
06943       // make sure we're here legally
06944       Assert( MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( bSelectedInfoChar ) );
06945 
06946       GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID );
06947 
06948       uiHandPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06949 
06950       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
06951       {
06952             // If we do not have an item in hand, start moving it
06953             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
06954             {
06955                   // Return if empty
06956                   if ( pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
06957                   {
06958                         return;
06959                   }
06960 
06961                   //ATE: Put this here to handle Nails refusal....
06962                   if ( HandleNailsVestFetish( pSoldier, uiHandPos, NOTHING ) )
06963                   {
06964                         return;
06965                   }
06966 
06967                   if ( _KeyDown(CTRL) )
06968                   {
06969                         CleanUpStack( &( pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ] ), NULL );
06970                   }
06971 
06972                   // remember what it was
06973                   usOldItemIndex = pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem;
06974 
06975                   // pick it up
06976                   MAPBeginItemPointer( pSoldier, (UINT8)uiHandPos );
06977 
06978                   // remember which gridno the object came from
06979                   sObjectSourceGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
06980 
06981                   HandleTacticalEffectsOfEquipmentChange( pSoldier, uiHandPos, usOldItemIndex, NOTHING );
06982 
06983               fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
06984                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
06985             }
06986             else  // item in cursor
06987             {
06988                   // can we pass this part due to booby traps
06989                   if( ContinuePastBoobyTrapInMapScreen( gpItemPointer, pSoldier ) == FALSE )
06990                   {
06991                         return;
06992                   }
06993 
06994                   usOldItemIndex = pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem;
06995                   usNewItemIndex = gpItemPointer->usItem;
06996 
06997                   //ATE: Put this here to handle Nails refusal....
06998                   if ( HandleNailsVestFetish( pSoldier, uiHandPos, usNewItemIndex ) )
06999                   {
07000                         return;
07001                   }
07002 
07003                   if ( _KeyDown(CTRL) )
07004                   {
07005                         CleanUpStack( &( pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ] ), gpItemPointer );
07006                         if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
07007                         {
07008                               MAPEndItemPointer( );
07009                         }
07010                         return;
07011                   }
07012 
07013                   // !!! ATTACHING/MERGING ITEMS IN MAP SCREEN IS NOT SUPPORTED !!!
07014                   if ( uiHandPos == HANDPOS || uiHandPos == SECONDHANDPOS || uiHandPos == HELMETPOS || uiHandPos == VESTPOS || uiHandPos == LEGPOS )
07015                   {
07016                         //if ( ValidAttachmentClass( usNewItemIndex, usOldItemIndex ) )
07017                         if ( ValidAttachment( usNewItemIndex, usOldItemIndex ) )
07018                         {
07019                               // it's an attempt to attach; bring up the inventory panel
07020                               if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
07021                               {
07022                                     MAPInternalInitItemDescriptionBox( &(pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ]), 0, pSoldier );
07023                               }
07024                               return;
07025                         }
07026                         else if ( ValidMerge( usNewItemIndex, usOldItemIndex ) )
07027                         {
07028                               // bring up merge requestor
07029                               // TOO PAINFUL TO DO!! --CC
07030                               if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
07031                               {
07032                                     MAPInternalInitItemDescriptionBox( &(pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ]), 0, pSoldier );
07033                               }
07034 
07035                               /*
07036                               gubHandPos = (UINT8) uiHandPos;
07037                               gusOldItemIndex = usOldItemIndex;
07038                               gusNewItemIndex = usNewItemIndex;
07039                               gfDeductPoints = fDeductPoints;
07040 
07041                               DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( Message[ STR_MERGE_ITEMS ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, MergeMessageBoxCallBack );
07042                               return;
07043                               */
07044                         }
07045                         // else handle normally
07046                   }
07047 
07048                   // Else, try to place here
07049                   if ( PlaceObject( pSoldier, (UINT8)uiHandPos, gpItemPointer ) )
07050                   {
07051 
07052                         HandleTacticalEffectsOfEquipmentChange( pSoldier, uiHandPos, usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex );
07053 
07054                         // Dirty
07055                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
07056                         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
07057                         fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07058 
07059                         // Check if cursor is empty now
07060                         if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
07061                         {
07062                               MAPEndItemPointer( );
07063                         }
07064                         else  // items swapped
07065                         {
07066                               // Update mouse cursor
07067                               guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
07068                               gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
07069 
07070                               MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
07071                               MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
07072                               fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
07073                               fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07074 
07075                               // remember which gridno the object came from
07076                               sObjectSourceGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
07077                               // and who owned it last
07078                               gpItemPointerSoldier = pSoldier;
07079 
07080                               ReevaluateItemHatches( pSoldier, FALSE );
07081                         }
07082 
07083                         // re-evaluate repairs
07084                         gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
07085 
07086                         // if item came from another merc
07087                         if ( gpItemPointerSoldier != pSoldier )
07088                         {
07089                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ITEM_PASSED_TO_MERC ], ShortItemNames[ usNewItemIndex ], pSoldier->name );
07090                         }
07091 
07092                   }
07093             }
07094       }
07095       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
07096       {
07097             // if there is a map UI message being displayed
07098             if( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 )
07099             {
07100                   CancelMapUIMessage( );
07101                   return;
07102             }
07103 
07104             fRightDown = TRUE;
07105       }
07106       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP && fRightDown )
07107       {
07108             fRightDown = FALSE;
07109 
07110             // Return if empty
07111             if (pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem == NOTHING )
07112             {
07113                   return;
07114             }
07115 
07116             // Some global stuff here - for esc, etc
07117             // Check for # of slots in item
07118             if ( ( pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].ubNumberOfObjects > 1 ) && ( ItemSlotLimit( pSoldier->inv[ uiHandPos ].usItem, (UINT8)uiHandPos ) > 0 ) )
07119             {
07120                   if ( !InItemStackPopup( ) )
07121                   {
07122                         InitItemStackPopup( pSoldier, (UINT8)uiHandPos, 0, INV_REGION_Y, 261, 248 );
07123                     fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07124                     fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
07125                   }
07126             }
07127             else
07128             {
07129                   if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
07130                   {
07131                         InitItemDescriptionBox( pSoldier, (UINT8)uiHandPos, MAP_ITEMDESC_START_X, MAP_ITEMDESC_START_Y, 0 );
07132                     fShowDescriptionFlag=TRUE;
07133                         fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07134                     fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
07135                   }
07136             }
07137       }
07138       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
07139       {
07140             fRightDown = FALSE;
07141       }
07142 
07143 }
07144 
07145 
07146 void InternalMAPBeginItemPointer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07147 {
07148       // If not null return
07149       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
07150       {
07151             return;
07152       }
07153 
07154       // Set global indicator
07155       gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
07156       gpItemPointerSoldier = pSoldier;
07157 
07158       // Set mouse
07159       guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
07160       gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
07161 
07162       MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
07163       MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
07164       fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
07165       fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07166 
07167       // hatch out incompatible inventory slots
07168       ReevaluateItemHatches( pSoldier, FALSE );
07169 
07170       // re-evaluate repairs
07171       gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
07172 }
07173 
07174 
07175 void MAPBeginItemPointer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandPos )
07176 {
07177       BOOLEAN     fOk;
07178 
07179       // If not null return
07180       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
07181       {
07182             return;
07183       }
07184 
07185       if (_KeyDown( SHIFT ))
07186       {
07187             // Remove all from soldier's slot
07188             fOk = RemoveObjectFromSlot( pSoldier, ubHandPos, &gItemPointer );
07189       }
07190       else
07191       {
07192             GetObjFrom( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), 0, &gItemPointer );
07193             fOk = (gItemPointer.ubNumberOfObjects == 1);
07194       }
07195 
07196       if ( fOk )
07197       {
07198     InternalMAPBeginItemPointer( pSoldier );
07199       }
07200 }
07201 
07202 
07203 void MAPBeginKeyRingItemPointer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 uiKeySlot )
07204 {
07205       // If not null return
07206       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
07207       {
07208             return;
07209       }
07210 
07211       // Set mouse
07212       guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
07213       gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
07214 
07215       MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
07216       MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
07217   fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
07218       fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07219 }
07220 
07221 void MAPEndItemPointer( )
07222 {
07223       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
07224       {
07225             gpItemPointer = NULL;
07226             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , CURSOR_NORMAL );  
07227             MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
07228             fMapInventoryItem=FALSE;
07229             fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07230 
07231             if ( fShowMapInventoryPool )
07232             {
