07233                   HandleButtonStatesWhileMapInventoryActive();
07234             }
07235 
07236             if ( fShowInventoryFlag && bSelectedInfoChar >= 0 )
07237             {
07238                   ReevaluateItemHatches( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], FALSE );
07239             }
07240       }
07241 }
07242 
07243 
07244 void HandleMapInventoryCursor()
07245 {
07246       if(fMapInventoryItem)
07247    MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
07248       return;
07249 }
07250 
07251 
07252 // will place down the upper left hand corner attribute strings
07253 void RenderAttributeStringsForUpperLeftHandCorner( UINT32 uiBufferToRenderTo )
07254 {
07255       INT32 iCounter = 0;
07256       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
07257 
07258       
07259       if ( ( bSelectedInfoChar != - 1) && ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid ) )
07260       {
07261             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
07262       }
07263 
07264       SetFont( CHAR_FONT );
07265       SetFontForeground( CHAR_TITLE_FONT_COLOR );
07266       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
07267       SetFontDestBuffer( uiBufferToRenderTo, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE ); 
07268 
07269 
07270       // assignment strings
07271       DrawString( pUpperLeftMapScreenStrings[ 0 ], (UINT16)(220 - StringPixLength( pUpperLeftMapScreenStrings[0], CHAR_FONT)/2), 6, CHAR_FONT);
07272 
07273       // vehicles and robot don't have attributes, contracts, or morale
07274       if ( ( pSoldier == NULL ) || ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) ) )
07275       {
07276             // health
07277             DrawString(pUpperLeftMapScreenStrings[ 2 ], 87, 80, CHAR_FONT);
07278 
07279             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 5; iCounter++ )
07280             {
07281                   DrawString(pShortAttributeStrings[ iCounter  ], 88, ( INT16 )( 22 + iCounter * 10 ) ,CHAR_FONT );
07282                   DrawString(pShortAttributeStrings[ iCounter + 5 ] ,133, ( INT16 )( 22 + iCounter * 10 ), CHAR_FONT );
07283             }
07284 
07285             // contract 
07286             //DrawString(pUpperLeftMapScreenStrings[ 1 ], 194, 52,  CHAR_FONT);
07287 
07288             // morale
07289             DrawString(pUpperLeftMapScreenStrings[ 3 ], 87, 94,  CHAR_FONT);
07290       }
07291       else
07292       {
07293             // condition
07294             DrawString(pUpperLeftMapScreenStrings[ 4 ], 96, 80, CHAR_FONT);
07295       }
07296 
07297 
07298       // restore buffer
07299       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE ); 
07300 }
07301 
07302 
07303 void DisplayThePotentialPathForCurrentDestinationCharacterForMapScreenInterface(INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
07304 {
07305       // simply check if we want to refresh the screen to display path
07306       static INT8 bOldDestChar = -1;
07307   static INT16  sPrevMapX, sPrevMapY;
07308       INT32 iDifference = 0;
07309 
07310 
07311       if( bOldDestChar != bSelectedDestChar )
07312       {
07313             bOldDestChar = bSelectedDestChar;
07314         giPotCharPathBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
07315             
07316             sPrevMapX = sMapX;
07317             sPrevMapY = sMapY;
07318             fTempPathAlreadyDrawn = FALSE;
07319             fDrawTempPath = FALSE;
07320 
07321       }
07322 
07323       if( ( sMapX != sPrevMapX) || ( sMapY != sPrevMapY ) )
07324       {
07325             giPotCharPathBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
07326             
07327             sPrevMapX = sMapX;
07328             sPrevMapY = sMapY;
07329             
07330             // path was plotted and we moved, re draw map..to clean up mess
07331             if( fTempPathAlreadyDrawn == TRUE )
07332             {
07333                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07334             }
07335 
07336             fTempPathAlreadyDrawn = FALSE;
07337             fDrawTempPath = FALSE;
07338       }
07339 
07340       iDifference = GetJA2Clock( ) - giPotCharPathBaseTime ;
07341       
07342       if( fTempPathAlreadyDrawn == TRUE )
07343       {
07344             return;
07345       }
07346 
07347       if( iDifference > MIN_WAIT_TIME_FOR_TEMP_PATH )
07348       {
07349             fDrawTempPath = TRUE;
07350             giPotCharPathBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );   
07351             fTempPathAlreadyDrawn = TRUE;
07352       }
07353 
07354       return;
07355 }
07356 
07357 
07358 
07359 void SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( void )
07360 {
07361       if ( gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode == FALSE )
07362       {
07363             // check if character is in destination plotting mode
07364             if( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE )
07365             {
07366                   if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
07367                   {
07368                         // no plot mode, reset cursor to normal
07369                         ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
07370                   }
07371                   else  // yes - by character
07372                   {
07373                         // set cursor based on foot or vehicle
07374                         if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].bAssignment != VEHICLE ) && !( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
07375                         {
07376                               ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_STRATEGIC_FOOT );
07377                         }
07378                         else
07379                         {
07380                               ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_STRATEGIC_VEHICLE );
07381                         }
07382                   }
07383             }
07384             else  // yes - by helicopter
07385             {
07386                   // set cursor to chopper
07387                   ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_CHOPPER );
07388             }
07389       }
07390       else
07391       {
07392             // set cursor to bullseye
07393             ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_STRATEGIC_BULLSEYE );
07394       }
07395 }
07396 
07397 
07398 
07399 void HandleAnimatedCursorsForMapScreen( )
07400 {
07401 
07402       if ( COUNTERDONE( CURSORCOUNTER ) )
07403       {
07404             RESETCOUNTER( CURSORCOUNTER );      
07405         UpdateAnimatedCursorFrames( gMapScreenMaskRegion.Cursor );
07406             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase(  gMapScreenMaskRegion.Cursor  );
07407       }
07408 
07409 }
07410 
07411 
07412 void AbortMovementPlottingMode( void )
07413 {
07414       // invalid if we're not plotting movement
07415       Assert( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) );
07416 
07417       // make everybody go back to where they were going before this plotting session started
07418       RestorePreviousPaths();
07419 
07420       // don't need the previous paths any more
07421       ClearPreviousPaths();
07422 
07423       // clear the character's temporary path (this is the route being constantly updated on the map)
07424       if( pTempCharacterPath )
07425       {
07426             // make sure we're at the beginning
07427             pTempCharacterPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pTempCharacterPath );
07428             pTempCharacterPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pTempCharacterPath, 0 );
07429       }
07430 
07431       // clear the helicopter's temporary path (this is the route being constantly updated on the map)
07432       if( pTempHelicopterPath )
07433       {
07434             // make sure we're at the beginning
07435             pTempHelicopterPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pTempHelicopterPath );
07436             pTempHelicopterPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pTempHelicopterPath, 0 );
07437       }
07438 
07439 
07440       EndConfirmMapMoveMode( );
07441 
07442       // cancel destination line highlight
07443       giDestHighLine = -1;
07444 
07445       // cancel movement mode
07446       bSelectedDestChar = -1;
07447       fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
07448 
07449       // tell player the route was UNCHANGED
07450       MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pMapPlotStrings[ 2 ] );
07451 
07452 
07453       // reset cursors
07454       ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
07455       SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
07456 
07457       // restore glow region
07458       RestoreBackgroundForDestinationGlowRegionList( );
07459 
07460       // we might be on the map, redraw to remove old path stuff
07461       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07462       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07463 
07464       gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07465 }
07466 
07467 
07468 
07469 void CheckToSeeIfMouseHasLeftMapRegionDuringPathPlotting(  )
07470 {
07471       static BOOLEAN fInArea = FALSE;
07472       
07473       if ( ( gMapViewRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA ) == 0 )
07474       {
07475             
07476             if( fInArea == TRUE )
07477             {
07478                   fInArea = FALSE;
07479                   
07480                   // plotting path, clean up
07481                   if( ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) || ( fDrawTempHeliPath == TRUE ) ) && ( fTempPathAlreadyDrawn == TRUE ) )
07482                   {
07483                         fDrawTempHeliPath = FALSE;
07484                     fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07485                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07486 
07487                         // clear the temp path
07488                         if( pTempCharacterPath )
07489                         {
07490                               pTempCharacterPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pTempCharacterPath, 0 );
07491                         }
07492                   }
07493 
07494                   // reset fact temp path has been drawn
07495                   fTempPathAlreadyDrawn = FALSE;
07496             }
07497       }
07498       else
07499       {
07500             fInArea = TRUE;
07501       }
07502 
07503       return;
07504 }
07505 
07506 
07507 
07508 
07509 
07510 void BlitBackgroundToSaveBuffer( void )
07511 {
07512       INT8 bTempDestChar = -1;
07513 
07514       // render map
07515   RenderMapRegionBackground( );
07516       
07517       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE )
07518       {
07519         // render team
07520         RenderTeamRegionBackground( );
07521 
07522         // render character info
07523         RenderCharacterInfoBackground( );
07524       }
07525       else if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
07526       {
07527             // WANNE 2 <scroll>
07528             //DeleteButtonsForScrolling();
07529 
07530             ForceButtonUnDirty( giMapContractButton );
07531             ForceButtonUnDirty( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
07532             ForceButtonUnDirty( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
07533             RenderPreBattleInterface();
07534       }
07535 
07536       // now render lower panel
07537       RenderMapScreenInterfaceBottom( );
07538 }
07539 
07540 // WANNE 2
07541 void CreateMouseRegionsForTeamList( void )
07542 {
07543       // will create mouse regions for assignments, path plotting, character info selection
07544       INT16 sCounter = 0;
07545       //INT16 sYAdd = 0;
07546 
07547       INT16 sYStart = 0;
07548       INT16 sOffsetCounter = 0;
07549 
07550       // the info region...is the background for the list itself
07551 
07552       for( sCounter = 0; sCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; sCounter++ )
07553       {
07554             if( sCounter >= FIRST_VEHICLE )
07555             {
07556                   //sYAdd = 6;
07557                   sOffsetCounter = sCounter - FIRST_VEHICLE;
07558                   sYStart = usVehicleY;
07559             }
07560             else
07561             {
07562                   sOffsetCounter = sCounter;
07563                   sYStart = Y_START;
07564                   //sYAdd = 0;
07565             }
07566 
07567             // WANNE 2
07568             // name region
07569             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListNameRegion[ sCounter ] , NAME_X, ( INT16 )( sYStart + ( sOffsetCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), NAME_X + NAME_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( (sYStart + 10) + ( sOffsetCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
07570                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListInfoRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListInfoRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07571 
07572             // assignment region
07573             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ sCounter ] ,ASSIGN_X , ( INT16 )( sYStart + ( sOffsetCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), ASSIGN_X + ASSIGN_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( (sYStart + 10) + ( sOffsetCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07574                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListAssignmentRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListAssignmentRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07575 
07576             // location region (same function as name regions, so uses the same callbacks)
07577             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListLocationRegion[ sCounter ] , LOC_X, ( INT16 )( sYStart + ( sOffsetCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), LOC_X + LOC_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( (sYStart + 10) + ( sOffsetCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07578                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListInfoRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListInfoRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07579 
07580             // destination region
07581             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ sCounter ] ,DEST_ETA_X , ( INT16 )( sYStart + ( sOffsetCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), DEST_ETA_X + DEST_ETA_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( (sYStart + 10) + ( sOffsetCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07582                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListDestinationRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListDestinationRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07583 
07584             // contract region
07585             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListContractRegion[ sCounter ] ,TIME_REMAINING_X , ( INT16 )( sYStart + ( sOffsetCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), TIME_REMAINING_X + TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( (sYStart + 10) + ( sOffsetCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07586                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListContractRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListContractRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07587 
07588             // contract region
07589             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListSleepRegion[ sCounter ] ,SLEEP_X, ( INT16 )( sYStart + ( sOffsetCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), SLEEP_X + SLEEP_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( (sYStart + 10) + ( sOffsetCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 )), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07590                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListSleepRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListSleepRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07591 
07592             
07593             
07594             //// name region
07595             //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListNameRegion[ sCounter ] , NAME_X, ( INT16 )( Y_START + ( sCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), NAME_X + NAME_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( 145 + ( sCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
07596             //                             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListInfoRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListInfoRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07597 
07598             //// assignment region
07599             //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ sCounter ] ,ASSIGN_X , ( INT16 )( Y_START + ( sCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd), ASSIGN_X + ASSIGN_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( 145 + ( sCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07600             //                             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListAssignmentRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListAssignmentRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07601 
07602             //// location region (same function as name regions, so uses the same callbacks)
07603             //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListLocationRegion[ sCounter ] , LOC_X, ( INT16 )( Y_START + ( sCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), LOC_X + LOC_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( 145 + ( sCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07604             //                             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListInfoRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListInfoRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07605 
07606             //// destination region
07607             //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ sCounter ] ,DEST_ETA_X , ( INT16 )( Y_START + ( sCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), DEST_ETA_X + DEST_ETA_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( 145 + ( sCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07608             //                             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListDestinationRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListDestinationRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07609 
07610             //// contract region
07611             //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListContractRegion[ sCounter ] ,TIME_REMAINING_X , ( INT16 )( Y_START + ( sCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd), TIME_REMAINING_X + TIME_REMAINING_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( 145 + ( sCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07612             //                             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListContractRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListContractRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07613 
07614             //// contract region
07615             //MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTeamListSleepRegion[ sCounter ] ,SLEEP_X, ( INT16 )( Y_START + ( sCounter ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd), SLEEP_X + SLEEP_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( 145 + ( sCounter + 1 ) * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) + sYAdd ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL + 1,
07616             //                             MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TeamListSleepRegionMvtCallBack, TeamListSleepRegionBtnCallBack ); 
07617 
07618 
07619             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gTeamListNameRegion[sCounter],0,sCounter);
07620             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gTeamListAssignmentRegion[sCounter],0,sCounter);
07621             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gTeamListSleepRegion[sCounter],0,sCounter);
07622             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gTeamListLocationRegion[sCounter],0,sCounter);
07623             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gTeamListDestinationRegion[sCounter],0,sCounter);
07624             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gTeamListContractRegion[sCounter],0,sCounter);
07625 
07626 
07627             // set up help boxes
07628             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListNameRegion[sCounter], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
07629             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[sCounter], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 1 ] );
07630             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListSleepRegion[sCounter], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 5 ] );
07631             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListLocationRegion[sCounter], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 4 ] );
07632             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[sCounter], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
07633             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListContractRegion[sCounter], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 3 ] );
07634       }
07635 
07636       return;
07637 }
07638 
07639 
07640 void DestroyMouseRegionsForTeamList( void )
07641 {
07642       // will destroy mouse regions overlaying the team list area
07643       INT32 sCounter = 0;
07644 
07645       for( sCounter = 0; sCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; sCounter++ )
07646       {
07647         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTeamListNameRegion[ sCounter ]);
07648             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ sCounter ]);
07649             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTeamListSleepRegion[ sCounter ]);
07650             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ sCounter ]);
07651             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTeamListLocationRegion[ sCounter ]);
07652             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTeamListContractRegion[ sCounter ]);
07653       }
07654 }
07655 
07656 
07657 // mask for mapscreen region
07658 void MapScreenMarkRegionBtnCallback(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07659 {
07660       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07661       {
07662             // reset selected characters
07663             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
07664       }
07665       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
07666       {
07667             // reset selected characters
07668             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
07669       }
07670 }
07671 
07672 
07673 
07674 void ContractButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
07675 {
07676       if( ( iDialogueBox != -1 ) )
07677       {
07678             return;
07679       }
07680 
07681       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
07682       {
07683             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
07684             {
07685                   // stop mapscreen text
07686                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
07687             }
07688 
07689 /*
07690             if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
07691             {
07692                   AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
07693                   return;
07694             }
07695 */
07696 
07697             // redraw region
07698             if( btn->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
07699             {
07700                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
07701             }
07702 
07703         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
07704       }
07705       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
07706   {
07707             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
07708             {
07709                   // stop mapscreen text
07710                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
07711             }
07712 
07713     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
07714             {
07715                   btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
07716 
07717                   RequestContractMenu( );
07718         }
07719       }
07720       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
07721       {
07722             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
07723             {
07724                   // stop mapscreen text
07725                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
07726             }
07727       }
07728 }
07729 
07730 
07731 
07732 void TeamListInfoRegionBtnCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07733 {
07734       INT32 iValue = 0;
07735       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
07736 
07737 
07738       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
07739       {
07740             return;
07741       }
07742 
07743       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07744 
07745       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07746       {
07747             // set to new info character...make sure is valid
07748             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
07749             {
07750                   // stop mapscreen text
07751                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
07752                   return;
07753             }
07754 
07755             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
07756             {
07757                   if ( HandleCtrlOrShiftInTeamPanel( ( INT8 ) iValue ) )
07758                   {
07759                         return;
07760                   }
07761 
07762                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, TRUE );
07763 
07764                   pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ];
07765 
07766                   // highlight
07767                   giDestHighLine = -1;
07768 
07769                   // reset character 
07770                   bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
07771                   bSelectedDestChar = -1;
07772                   bSelectedContractChar = -1;
07773                   fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
07774 
07775                   // if not dead or POW, select his sector
07776                   if( ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
07777                   {
07778                         ChangeSelectedMapSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
07779                   }
07780 
07781                   // unhilight contract line
07782                   giContractHighLine = -1;
07783 
07784                   // can't assign highlight line
07785                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
07786 
07787                   // dirty team and map regions
07788                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07789                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07790                   //fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07791                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07792             }
07793             else
07794             {
07795                   // reset selected characters
07796                   ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
07797             }
07798       }
07799 
07800       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
07801       {
07802             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
07803             {
07804                   // stop mapscreen text
07805                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
07806                   return;
07807             }
07808 
07809             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
07810             {
07811                   pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ];
07812 
07813                   // select this character
07814                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, TRUE );
07815                   
07816 
07817                   RequestToggleMercInventoryPanel();
07818 
07819 
07820                   // highlight
07821                   giDestHighLine = -1;
07822 
07823                   // reset character 
07824                   bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
07825                   bSelectedDestChar = -1;
07826                   bSelectedContractChar = -1;
07827                   fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
07828 
07829                   // if not dead or POW, select his sector
07830                   if( ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
07831                   {
07832                         ChangeSelectedMapSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
07833                   }
07834 
07835                   // unhilight contract line
07836                   giContractHighLine = -1;
07837 
07838                   // can't assign highlight line
07839                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
07840 
07841                   // dirty team and map regions
07842                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07843                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07844 //                fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
07845                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07846             }
07847       }
07848 }
07849 
07850 
07851 void TeamListInfoRegionMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07852 {
07853       INT32 iValue = 0;
07854 
07855 
07856       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
07857       {
07858             return;
07859       }
07860 
07861       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07862 
07863       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
07864       {
07865             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
07866             {
07867                   giHighLine = iValue;
07868             }
07869             else
07870             {
07871                   giHighLine = -1;
07872             }
07873       }
07874       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
07875       {
07876             giHighLine = -1;
07877       }
07878 }
07879 
07880 
07881 
07882 void TeamListAssignmentRegionBtnCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07883 {
07884       INT32 iValue = 0;
07885       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
07886 
07887 
07888       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
07889       {
07890             return;
07891       }
07892 
07893       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07894 
07895       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07896       {
07897             // set to new info character...make sure is valid
07898             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
07899             {
07900                   // stop mapscreen text
07901                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
07902                   return;
07903             }
07904 
07905             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
07906             {
07907                   if ( HandleCtrlOrShiftInTeamPanel( ( INT8 ) iValue ) )
07908                   {
07909                         return;
07910                   }
07911 
07912                   // reset list if the clicked character isn't also selected
07913                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, ( BOOLEAN )( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 ) iValue ) == FALSE ) );
07914 
07915                   pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ];
07916 
07917                   // if alive (dead guys keep going, use remove menu instead),
07918                   // and it's between sectors and it can be reassigned (non-vehicles)
07919                   if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) && ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
07920                   {
07921                         // can't reassign mercs while between sectors
07922                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pMapErrorString[ 41 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
07923                         return;
07924                   }
07925 
07926                   bSelectedAssignChar = ( INT8 ) iValue;
07927                   RebuildAssignmentsBox( );
07928 
07929                   // reset dest character
07930                   bSelectedDestChar = -1;
07931                   fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
07932 
07933                   // reset contract char
07934                   bSelectedContractChar = -1;
07935                   giContractHighLine = -1;
07936 
07937                   // can't highlight line, anymore..if we were
07938               giDestHighLine = -1;
07939 
07940                   // dirty team and map regions
07941                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
07942                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
07943                   gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
07944 
07945                   // if this thing can be re-assigned
07946                   if( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
07947                   {
07948                         giAssignHighLine = iValue;
07949 
07950                         fShowAssignmentMenu = TRUE;
07951 
07952                         if( ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
07953                         {
07954                               fShowRemoveMenu = TRUE;
07955                         }
07956                   }
07957                   else
07958                   {
07959                         // can't highlight line
07960                         giAssignHighLine = -1;
07961 
07962                         // we can't highlight this line
07963 //                      giHighLine = -1;
07964                   }
07965             }
07966             else
07967             {
07968                   // reset selected characters
07969                   ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
07970             }
07971       }
07972 
07973       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
07974       {
07975             // reset selected characters
07976             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
07977       }
07978 }
07979 
07980 
07981 void TeamListAssignmentRegionMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07982 {
07983       INT32 iValue = 0;
07984 
07985 
07986       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
07987       {
07988             return;
07989       }
07990 
07991       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07992 
07993       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
07994       {
07995             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
07996             {
07997                   giHighLine = iValue;
07998 
07999                   if( !( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
08000                   {
08001                         giAssignHighLine = iValue;
08002                   }
08003                   else
08004                   {
08005                         giAssignHighLine = -1;
08006                   }
08007             }
08008             else
08009             {
08010                   // can't highlight line
08011                   giHighLine = -1;
08012                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
08013             }
08014       }
08015       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
08016       {
08017             giHighLine = -1;
08018 
08019             if( bSelectedAssignChar == -1 )
08020             {
08021                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
08022             }
08023 
08024             // restore background
08025             RestoreBackgroundForAssignmentGlowRegionList( );
08026       }
08027       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
08028       {
08029             if( ( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE ) && 
08030                !( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
08031             {
08032                   // play click
08033               PlayGlowRegionSound( );
08034             }
08035       }
08036 }
08037 
08038 
08039 
08040 void TeamListDestinationRegionBtnCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08041 {
08042       INT32 iValue = 0;
08043 
08044 
08045       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive || fShowMapInventoryPool )
08046       {
08047             return;
08048       }
08049 
08050       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
08051 
08052       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
08053       {
08054             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
08055             {
08056                   // stop mapscreen text
08057                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
08058                   return;
08059             }
08060 
08061             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
08062             {
08063                   if ( HandleCtrlOrShiftInTeamPanel( ( INT8 ) iValue ) )
08064                   {
08065                         return;
08066                   }
08067 
08068                   // reset list if the clicked character isn't also selected
08069                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, ( BOOLEAN )( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 ) iValue ) == FALSE ) );
08070 
08071                   // deselect any characters/vehicles that can't accompany the clicked merc
08072                   DeselectSelectedListMercsWhoCantMoveWithThisGuy( &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ] ) );
08073 
08074                   // select all characters/vehicles that MUST accompany the clicked merc (same squad/vehicle)
08075                   SelectUnselectedMercsWhoMustMoveWithThisGuy( );
08076 
08077                   // Find out if this guy and everyone travelling with him is allowed to move strategically
08078                   // NOTE: errors are reported within...
08079                   if ( CanChangeDestinationForCharSlot( ( INT8 ) iValue, TRUE ) )
08080                   {
08081                         // turn off sector inventory, turn on show teams filter, etc.
08082                         MakeMapModesSuitableForDestPlotting( ( INT8 ) iValue );
08083 
08084                         // check if person is in a vehicle
08085                         if( Menptr[gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID].bAssignment == VEHICLE )
08086                         {
08087                               // if he's in the helicopter
08088                               if( Menptr[gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID].iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId )
08089                               {
08090                                     TurnOnAirSpaceMode( );
08091                                     if( RequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination( ) == FALSE )
08092                                     {
08093                                           // not allowed to change destination of the helicopter
08094                                           return;
08095                                     }
08096                               }
08097                         }
08098 
08099 
08100                         // select this character as the one plotting strategic movement
08101                         bSelectedDestChar = ( INT8 )iValue;
08102 
08103                         // remember the current paths for all selected characters so we can restore them if need be
08104                         RememberPreviousPathForAllSelectedChars();
08105 
08106                         // check each person in this mvt group, if any bleeding, have them complain
08107                         //CheckMembersOfMvtGroupAndComplainAboutBleeding( &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] ) );
08108 
08109                         // highlight
08110                         giDestHighLine = iValue;
08111 
08112                         // can't assign highlight line
08113                         giAssignHighLine = -1;
08114 
08115                         // reset assign character
08116                         bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
08117 
08118                         // reset contract char
08119                         bSelectedContractChar = -1;
08120                         giContractHighLine = -1;
08121 
08122                         // dirty team and map regions
08123                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
08124                         fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
08125                         gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
08126 
08127 
08128                         // set cursor
08129                         SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
08130                   }
08131                   else  // problem - this guy can't move
08132                   {
08133                         // cancel destination highlight
08134                         giDestHighLine = -1;
08135                   }
08136             }
08137             else  // empty char list slot
08138             {
08139                   // reset selected characters
08140                   ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08141             }
08142       }
08143 
08144 
08145       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
08146       {
08147             MakeMapModesSuitableForDestPlotting( ( INT8 ) iValue );
08148 
08149             // reset list if the clicked character isn't also selected
08150             ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, ( BOOLEAN )( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 ) iValue ) == FALSE ) );
08151 
08152             CancelPathsOfAllSelectedCharacters();
08153 
08154             // reset selected characters
08155             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08156       }
08157 }
08158 
08159 
08160 void TeamListDestinationRegionMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08161 {
08162       INT32 iValue = -1;
08163 
08164 
08165       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
08166       {
08167             return;
08168       }
08169 
08170       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
08171 
08172       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
08173       {
08174             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
08175             {
08176                   giHighLine = iValue;
08177                   giDestHighLine = iValue;
08178             }
08179             else
08180             {
08181                   // can't highlight line
08182                   giHighLine = -1;
08183                   giDestHighLine = -1;
08184             }
08185       }
08186       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
08187       {
08188             giHighLine = -1;
08189 
08190             if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
08191             {
08192               giDestHighLine = -1;
08193             }     
08194 
08195             // restore background
08196             RestoreBackgroundForDestinationGlowRegionList( );
08197       }
08198       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
08199       {
08200             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
08201             {
08202                   // play click
08203                   PlayGlowRegionSound( );
08204             }
08205       }
08206 }
08207 
08208 
08209 
08210 void TeamListSleepRegionBtnCallBack( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08211 {
08212       INT32 iValue = 0;
08213       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
08214 
08215 
08216       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
08217       {
08218             return;
08219       }
08220 
08221       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
08222 
08223       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
08224       {
08225             // set to new info character...make sure is valid.. not in transit and alive and concious
08226 
08227             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
08228             {
08229                   // stop mapscreen text
08230                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
08231                   return;
08232             }
08233 
08234             if( ( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE ) )
08235             {
08236                   if ( HandleCtrlOrShiftInTeamPanel( ( INT8 ) iValue ) )
08237                   {
08238                         return;
08239                   }
08240 
08241                   // reset list if the clicked character isn't also selected
08242                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, ( BOOLEAN )( IsEntryInSelectedListSet( ( INT8 ) iValue ) == FALSE ) );
08243 
08244                   // if this slot's sleep status can be changed
08245                   if ( CanChangeSleepStatusForCharSlot( (INT8) iValue ) )
08246                   {
08247                         pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iValue ].usSolID ];
08248 
08249                         if( pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE )
08250                         {
08251                               // try to wake him up
08252                               if( SetMercAwake( pSoldier, TRUE, FALSE ) )
08253                               {
08254                                     // propagate
08255                                     HandleSelectedMercsBeingPutAsleep( TRUE, TRUE );
08256                                     return;
08257                               }
08258                               else
08259                               {
08260                                     HandleSelectedMercsBeingPutAsleep( TRUE, FALSE );
08261                               }
08262                         }
08263                         else  // awake
08264                         {
08265                               // try to put him to sleep
08266                               if( SetMercAsleep( pSoldier, TRUE ) )
08267                               {
08268                                     // propagate
08269                                     HandleSelectedMercsBeingPutAsleep( FALSE, TRUE );
08270                                     return;
08271                               }
08272                               else
08273                               {
08274                                     HandleSelectedMercsBeingPutAsleep( FALSE, FALSE );
08275                               }
08276                         }
08277                   }
08278             }
08279             else
08280             {
08281                   // reset selected characters
08282                   ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08283             }
08284       }
08285 
08286       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
08287       {
08288             // reset selected characters
08289             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08290       }
08291 }
08292 
08293 
08294 void TeamListSleepRegionMvtCallBack( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08295 {
08296       INT32 iValue = -1;
08297 
08298 
08299       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
08300       {
08301             return;
08302       }
08303 
08304       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
08305 
08306       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
08307       {
08308             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
08309             {
08310                   giHighLine = iValue;
08311 
08312                   if ( CanChangeSleepStatusForCharSlot( (INT8) iValue ) )
08313                   {
08314                         giSleepHighLine = iValue;
08315                   }
08316                   else
08317                   {
08318                         giSleepHighLine = -1;
08319                   }
08320             }
08321             else
08322             {
08323                   // can't highlight line
08324                   giHighLine = -1;
08325                   giSleepHighLine = -1;
08326             }
08327       }
08328       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
08329       {
08330             giHighLine = -1;
08331             giSleepHighLine = -1;
08332 
08333             // restore background
08334             RestoreBackgroundForSleepGlowRegionList( );
08335       }
08336       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
08337       {
08338             if ( CanChangeSleepStatusForCharSlot( (INT8) iValue ) )
08339             {
08340                   // play click
08341                   PlayGlowRegionSound( );
08342             }
08343       }
08344 }
08345 
08346 
08347 
08348 void TeamListContractRegionBtnCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08349 {
08350       INT32 iValue = 0;
08351 
08352 
08353       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
08354       {
08355             return;
08356       }
08357 
08358       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
08359 
08360       if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
08361       {
08362             if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
08363             {
08364                   // select ONLY this dude
08365                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iValue, TRUE );
08366 
08367                   // reset character
08368                   giDestHighLine = -1;
08369                   bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
08370                   bSelectedDestChar = -1;
08371                   bSelectedContractChar = -1;
08372                   fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
08373 
08374                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
08375             }
08376 
08377             ContractRegionBtnCallback( pRegion, iReason );
08378       }
08379 
08380       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
08381       {
08382             // reset selected characters
08383             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08384       }
08385 }
08386 
08387 
08388 void TeamListContractRegionMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08389 {
08390       INT32 iValue = -1;
08391 
08392 
08393       if( fLockOutMapScreenInterface || gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
08394       {
08395             return;
08396       }
08397 
08398       iValue = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
08399 
08400       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
08401       {
08402             if( gCharactersList[ iValue ].fValid == TRUE )
08403             {
08404                   giHighLine = iValue;
08405 
08406                   if( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( (INT8) iValue ) )
08407                   {
08408                         giContractHighLine = iValue;
08409                   }
08410                   else
08411                   {
08412                         giContractHighLine = -1;
08413                   }
08414             }
08415             else
08416             {
08417                   // can't highlight line
08418                   giHighLine = -1;
08419                   giContractHighLine = -1;
08420             }
08421       }
08422       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
08423       {
08424             giHighLine = -1;
08425 
08426             // no longer valid char?...reset display of highlight boxes
08427             if( fShowContractMenu == FALSE )
08428             {
08429                   giContractHighLine  = -1;
08430             }
08431 
08432             // restore background
08433             RestoreBackgroundForContractGlowRegionList( );
08434       }
08435       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
08436       {
08437             if( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( (INT8) iValue ) )
08438             {
08439                   // play click
08440                   PlayGlowRegionSound( );
08441             }
08442       }
08443 }
08444 
08445 
08446 
08447 INT32 GetIndexForThisSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08448 {
08449       INT32 iLastGuy;
08450       INT32 iIndex = 0;
08451       INT32 iCounter = 0;
08452 
08453       // get the index into the characters list for this soldier type
08454       iLastGuy = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
08455 
08456       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iLastGuy; iCounter++ )
08457       {
08458             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
08459             {
08460                   if( ( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] ) == pSoldier )
08461                   {
08462                         iIndex = iCounter;
08463                         iCounter = iLastGuy;
08464                   }
08465             }
08466       }
08467       return( iIndex );
08468 }
08469 
08470 
08471 
08472 BOOLEAN IsCursorWithInRegion(INT16 sLeft, INT16 sRight, INT16 sTop, INT16 sBottom )
08473 {
08474       POINT MousePos;
08475 
08476       // get cursor position
08477       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
08478 
08479       // is it within region?
08480 
08481       if( ( sLeft < MousePos.x ) && ( sRight > MousePos.x) && (sTop < MousePos.y ) && ( sBottom > MousePos.y ) )
08482       {
08483             return ( TRUE );
08484       }
08485       else
08486       {
08487             return ( FALSE );
08488       }
08489 }
08490 
08491 
08492 void HandleHighLightingOfLinesInTeamPanel( void )
08493 {
08494       if ( fShowInventoryFlag )
08495       {
08496             return;
08497       }
08498 
08499       // will highlight or restore backgrounds to highlighted lines
08500 
08501       // restore backgrounds, if need be
08502       RestoreBackgroundForAssignmentGlowRegionList( );
08503       RestoreBackgroundForDestinationGlowRegionList( );
08504       RestoreBackgroundForContractGlowRegionList( );
08505       RestoreBackgroundForSleepGlowRegionList( );
08506 
08507       HighLightAssignLine( /*(UINT16)giAssignHighLine*/ ); // doesn't take parameters (jonathanl)
08508       HighLightDestLine(  /*(UINT16)giDestHighLine  */); // doesn't take parameters (jonathanl)
08509       HighLightSleepLine( /*(UINT16)giSleepHighLine */); // doesn't take parameters (jonathanl)
08510 
08511       // contracts?
08512       if( giContractHighLine != -1 )
08513       {
08514         ContractListRegionBoxGlow( ( UINT16 ) giContractHighLine );
08515       }
08516 }
08517 
08518 
08519 void PlotPermanentPaths( void )
08520 {
08521       if( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
08522       {
08523             DisplayHelicopterPath( );
08524       }
08525       else if( bSelectedDestChar != -1 )
08526       {
08527         DisplaySoldierPath( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] );
08528       }
08529 }
08530 
08531 
08532 void PlotTemporaryPaths( void )
08533 {
08534       INT16 sMapX, sMapY;
08535 
08536 
08537       // check to see if we have in fact moved are are plotting a path?
08538       if ( GetMouseMapXY( &sMapX, &sMapY ) )
08539       {
08540             if ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
08541             {
08542                   Assert( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE );
08543 /*
08544                   if( fZoomFlag )
08545                   {
08546                         sMapX =  ( INT16 )( ( ( iZoomX ) / ( WORLD_MAP_X ) ) + sMapX );
08547                         sMapX /= 2;
08548 
08549                         sMapY =  ( INT16 )( ( ( iZoomY ) / ( WORLD_MAP_X ) ) + sMapY );
08550                         sMapY /= 2;
08551                   }
08552 */
08553 
08554                   // plot temp path
08555                   PlotATemporaryPathForHelicopter( sMapX, sMapY);
08556 
08557                   // check if potential path is allowed
08558                   DisplayThePotentialPathForHelicopter( sMapX, sMapY );
08559 
08560                   if( fDrawTempHeliPath == TRUE )
08561                   {
08562                         // clip region
08563                         ClipBlitsToMapViewRegion( );
08564                         // display heli temp path
08565                         DisplayHelicopterTempPath( );
08566                         //restore
08567                         RestoreClipRegionToFullScreen( );
08568                   }
08569             }
08570             else
08571             // dest char has been selected, 
08572             if( bSelectedDestChar != -1 )
08573             {
08574 /*
08575                   if( fZoomFlag )
08576                   {
08577                         sMapX =  ( INT16 )( ( ( iZoomX ) / ( MAP_GRID_X ) ) + sMapX );
08578                         sMapX /= 2;
08579 
08580                         sMapY =  ( INT16 )( ( ( iZoomY ) / ( MAP_GRID_Y ) ) + sMapY );
08581                         sMapY /= 2;
08582                   }
08583 */
08584 
08585                   PlotATemporaryPathForCharacter( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ], sMapX, sMapY );
08586 
08587                   // check to see if we are drawing path
08588               DisplayThePotentialPathForCurrentDestinationCharacterForMapScreenInterface( sMapX, sMapY );
08589 
08590                   // if we need to draw path, do it
08591                   if( fDrawTempPath == TRUE )
08592                   {
08593                         // clip region
08594                         ClipBlitsToMapViewRegion( );
08595                         // blit
08596                         DisplaySoldierTempPath( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] );
08597                         // restore
08598                         RestoreClipRegionToFullScreen( );
08599                   }
08600             }
08601       }
08602 }
08603 
08604 
08605 
08606 void RenderMapRegionBackground( void )
08607 {
08608       // renders to save buffer when dirty flag set
08609 
08610       if( fMapPanelDirty == FALSE )
08611       {
08612             gfMapPanelWasRedrawn = FALSE;
08613 
08614             // not dirty, leave
08615             return;
08616       }
08617 
08618       // don't bother if showing sector inventory instead of the map!!!
08619       if( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
08620       {
08621             // draw map
08622             DrawMap( );
08623       }
08624 
08625 
08626       // blit in border
08627       RenderMapBorder( );
08628 
08629       if ( ghAttributeBox != - 1 )
08630       {
08631             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghAttributeBox );
08632       }
08633 
08634       if ( ghTownMineBox != - 1 )
08635       {
08636             // force update of town mine info boxes
08637             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghTownMineBox );
08638       }
08639 
08640 
08641       MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
08642 
08643       // WANNE 2
08644       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 261, 0, 379, 359 );
08645 
08646       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 261, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH - 261, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 121 );
08647 
08648       // don't bother if showing sector inventory instead of the map!!!
08649       if( !fShowMapInventoryPool )
08650       {
08651             // if Skyrider can and wants to talk to us
08652             if( IsHelicopterPilotAvailable( ) )
08653             {
08654                   // see if Skyrider has anything new to tell us
08655                   CheckAndHandleSkyriderMonologues( );
08656             }
08657       }
08658 
08659       // reset dirty flag
08660       fMapPanelDirty = FALSE;
08661 
08662       gfMapPanelWasRedrawn = TRUE;
08663 
08664       return;
08665 }
08666 
08667 
08668 void RenderTeamRegionBackground( void )
08669 {
08670       HVOBJECT hHandle;
08671 
08672 
08673       // renders to save buffer when dirty flag set
08674       if( fTeamPanelDirty == FALSE )
08675       {
08676             // not dirty, leave
08677             return;
08678       }           
08679             
08680       // show inventory or the team list?
08681       if(fShowInventoryFlag == FALSE )
08682       {
08683             GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiCHARLIST);
08684             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0,PLAYER_INFO_X, PLAYER_INFO_Y , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
08685       }
08686       else
08687       {
08688             BltCharInvPanel();
08689       }
08690       
08691 
08692       if ( !fShowInventoryFlag )
08693       {
08694             // if we are not in inventory mode, show character list
08695             HandleHighLightingOfLinesInTeamPanel( );
08696 
08697             DisplayCharacterList();
08698       }
08699 
08700       fDrawCharacterList = FALSE;
08701 
08702       
08703       // display arrows by selected people
08704       HandleDisplayOfSelectedMercArrows( );
08705   DisplayIconsForMercsAsleep(  );
08706 
08707 
08708       // reset dirty flag
08709       fTeamPanelDirty = FALSE;
08710       gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
08711 
08712       // mark all pop ups as dirty
08713       MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
08714       
08715       // restore background for area
08716       
08717       // WANNE 2
08718       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 0, 107, 261, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 106 - 121 );
08719 
08720       MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
08721 
08722       return;
08723 }
08724 
08725 
08726 void RenderCharacterInfoBackground( void )
08727 {
08728       HVOBJECT hHandle;
08729 
08730 
08731       // will render the background for the character info panel
08732 
08733       if( fCharacterInfoPanelDirty == FALSE )
08734       {
08735             // not dirty, leave
08736             return;
08737       }
08738 
08739 
08740       // the upleft hand corner character info panel
08741       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiCHARINFO);
08742       BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0,TOWN_INFO_X, TOWN_INFO_Y , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
08743       
08744       UpdateHelpTextForMapScreenMercIcons( );
08745 
08746       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1) && ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE ) ) 
08747       {
08748             // valid char to display
08749             DisplayCharacterInfo();
08750       }
08751 
08752       if( ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE ) )
08753       {
08754             // draw attributes
08755             RenderAttributeStringsForUpperLeftHandCorner( guiSAVEBUFFER );
08756       }
08757 
08758       // reset dirty flag
08759       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = FALSE;
08760 
08761       // redraw face
08762       fReDrawFace = TRUE;
08763 
08764       MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
08765 
08766       // mark all pop ups as dirty
08767       MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
08768       
08769       // restore background for area
08770       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 0, 0, 261, 107 );
08771 
08772 }
08773 
08774 void DetermineIfContractMenuCanBeShown( void )
08775 {
08776       if( fShowContractMenu == FALSE )
08777       {
08778 
08779             // destroy menus for contract region
08780             CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForContractMenu( );
08781 
08782                   // hide all boxes
08783             HideBox( ghContractBox );
08784 
08785             // make sure, absolutly sure we want to hide this box
08786             if( fShowAssignmentMenu == FALSE )
08787             {
08788                   HideBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
08789             }
08790 
08791             
08792             return;
08793       }
08794 
08795       // create mask, if needed
08796       CreateDestroyScreenMaskForAssignmentAndContractMenus( );
08797 
08798       // create mouse regions for contract region
08799       CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForContractMenu( );
08800 
08801       // determine which lines selectable
08802       HandleShadingOfLinesForContractMenu( );
08803 
08804       if( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].bLife == 0 )
08805       {
08806             // show basic assignment menu
08807             ShowBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
08808       }
08809       else
08810       {
08811             // show basic contract menu
08812             ShowBox( ghContractBox );
08813       }
08814 }
08815 
08816 
08817 void CheckIfPlottingForCharacterWhileAirCraft( void )
08818 {
08819       // if we are in aircraft mode and plotting for character, reset plotting character
08820 
08821       if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
08822       {
08823             // if plotting, but not for heli
08824             if ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) )
08825             {
08826                   // abort
08827                   AbortMovementPlottingMode();
08828             }
08829       }
08830       else  // not in airspace mode
08831       {
08832             if( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
08833             {
08834                   // abort
08835                   AbortMovementPlottingMode();
08836             }
08837       }
08838 }
08839 
08840 
08841 void ContractRegionBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08842 {
08843       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
08844 
08845 
08846       // btn callback handler for contract region
08847 
08848       if( ( iDialogueBox != -1 ) )
08849       {
08850             return;
08851       }
08852 
08853       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
08854       {
08855 
08856             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
08857             {
08858                   // stop mapscreen text
08859                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
08860                   return;
08861             }
08862 
08863             if( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( bSelectedInfoChar ) )
08864             {
08865                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
08866 
08867                   // create
08868                   RebuildContractBoxForMerc( pSoldier );
08869                   
08870                   // reset selected characters
08871                   ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08872 
08873                   bSelectedContractChar = bSelectedInfoChar;
08874                   giContractHighLine = bSelectedContractChar;
08875 
08876 
08877                   // if not triggered internally
08878                   if ( CheckIfSalaryIncreasedAndSayQuote( pSoldier, TRUE ) == FALSE )
08879                   {
08880                         // show contract box
08881                         fShowContractMenu = TRUE;
08882 
08883                         // stop any active dialogue
08884                         StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
08885                   }
08886 
08887                   //fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
08888             }
08889             else
08890             {
08891                   // reset selected characters
08892                   ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08893             }
08894       }
08895 
08896       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
08897       {
08898             // reset selected characters
08899             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
08900       }
08901 }
08902 
08903 
08904 void ContractRegionMvtCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
08905 {
08906       // mvt callback handler for contract region
08907       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
08908       {
08909             if( fGlowContractRegion == TRUE )
08910             {
08911                   // not showing box and lost mouse?..stop glowing
08912                   if( fShowContractMenu == FALSE )
08913                   {
08914                 fGlowContractRegion = FALSE;
08915                     fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
08916                     giContractHighLine = -1;
08917                   
08918                     // reset glow
08919                     fResetContractGlow = TRUE;
08920                   }
08921             }
08922 
08923       }
08924       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
08925       {
08926             if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
08927             {
08928                   if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
08929                   {
08930                         if( fShowContractMenu == FALSE )
08931                         {
08932                               // glow region
08933                               fGlowContractRegion = TRUE;
08934 
08935                               giContractHighLine = bSelectedInfoChar;
08936 
08937                               PlayGlowRegionSound( );
08938                         }
08939                   }
08940             }
08941       }
08942 }
08943 
08944 
08945 
08946 void HandleShadingOfLinesForContractMenu( void )
08947 {
08948       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
08949       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile;
08950 
08951 
08952       if( ( fShowContractMenu == FALSE ) || ( ghContractBox == - 1 ) )
08953       {
08954             return;
08955       }
08956 
08957       // error check, return if not a valid character
08958       if( bSelectedContractChar == -1 )
08959       {
08960             return;
08961       }
08962 
08963       // check if this character is a valid character
08964       if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedContractChar ].fValid == FALSE )
08965       {
08966             return;
08967       }
08968 
08969       Assert( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( bSelectedContractChar ) );
08970 
08971       // grab the character
08972       pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedContractChar ].usSolID ];
08973 
08974 
08975       // is guy in AIM? and well enough to talk and make such decisions?
08976       if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC ) && ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
08977       {
08978             pProfile = &( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ] );
08979 
08980             // one day
08981             if( pProfile->sSalary > LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
08982             {
08983                   ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_DAY );
08984             }
08985             else
08986             {
08987                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_DAY );
08988             }
08989 
08990             // one week
08991             if( ( INT32 )( pProfile->uiWeeklySalary ) > LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
08992             {
08993                   ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_WEEK );
08994             }
08995             else
08996             {
08997                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_WEEK );
08998             }
08999 
09000             // two weeks
09001             if( ( INT32 )( pProfile->uiBiWeeklySalary ) > LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
09002             {
09003                   ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_TWO_WEEKS );
09004             }
09005             else
09006             {
09007                   UnShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_TWO_WEEKS );
09008             }
09009       }
09010       else
09011       {
09012             // can't extend contract duration
09013             ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_DAY );
09014             ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_WEEK );
09015             ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_TWO_WEEKS );
09016       }
09017 
09018       // if THIS soldier is involved in a fight (dismissing in a hostile sector IS ok...)
09019       if( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && pSoldier->bInSector )
09020       {
09021             ShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_TERMINATE );
09022       }
09023       else
09024       {
09025             UnShadeStringInBox( ghContractBox, CONTRACT_MENU_TERMINATE );
09026       }
09027 }
09028 
09029 
09030 
09031 void ReBuildCharactersList( void )
09032 {
09033       // rebuild character's list
09034       INT16 sCount = 0;
09035 
09036 
09037       // add in characters
09038   for ( sCount = 0; sCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; sCount++)
09039   {
09040             // clear this slot
09041             gCharactersList[ sCount ].fValid = FALSE;
09042             gCharactersList[ sCount ].usSolID = 0;
09043       }
09044 
09045       for ( sCount = 0; sCount < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; sCount++)
09046       {
09047         // add character into the cleared slot
09048         AddCharacter( &Menptr[ gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID + sCount ] );
09049       }
09050 
09051 
09052       // sort them according to current sorting method
09053       SortListOfMercsInTeamPanel( FALSE );
09054 
09055 
09056       // if nobody is selected, or the selected merc has somehow become invalid
09057       if ( ( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 ) || ( !gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid ) )
09058       {
09059             // is the first character in the list valid?
09060             if ( gCharactersList[ 0 ].fValid )
09061             {
09062                   // select him
09063                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( 0, TRUE );
09064             }
09065             else
09066             {
09067                   // select no one
09068                   ChangeSelectedInfoChar( -1, TRUE );
09069             }
09070       }
09071 
09072       // exit inventory mode
09073       fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
09074       // switch hand region help text to "Enter Inventory"
09075       SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
09076 }
09077 
09078 
09079 void HandleChangeOfInfoChar( void )
09080 {
09081       static INT8 bOldInfoChar = -1;
09082 
09083       if( bSelectedInfoChar != bOldInfoChar )
09084       {
09085             // set auto faces inactive
09086 
09087             // valid character?
09088             if( bOldInfoChar != -1 )
09089             {
09090                   if( gCharactersList[ bOldInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
09091                   {
09092                         // set face in active
09093                         SetAutoFaceInActiveFromSoldier( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bOldInfoChar ].usSolID ].ubID );
09094                   }
09095             }
09096 
09097             // stop showing contract box
09098             //fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
09099 
09100             // update old info char value
09101             bOldInfoChar = bSelectedInfoChar;
09102       }
09103 }
09104 
09105 
09106 void RebuildContractBoxForMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pCharacter )
09107 {
09108       // rebuild contractbox for this merc
09109       RemoveBox( ghContractBox );
09110       ghContractBox = -1;
09111 
09112       // recreate
09113       CreateContractBox( pCharacter );
09114 
09115       return;
09116 }
09117 
09118 
09119 void TestMessageSystem( void )
09120 {
09121       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09122 
09123       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 300; iCounter++ )
09124       {
09125         MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%d", iCounter );
09126       }
09127       MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, L"%d", iCounter );
09128 
09129       return;
09130 }
09131 
09132 
09133 
09134 void EnableDisableTeamListRegionsAndHelpText( void )
09135 {
09136       // check if valid character here, if so, then do nothing..other wise set help text timer to a gazillion
09137       INT8 bCharNum;
09138 
09139 
09140       for( bCharNum = 0; bCharNum < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; bCharNum++ )
09141       {
09142             if( gCharactersList[ bCharNum ].fValid == FALSE )
09143             {
09144                   // disable regions in all team list columns
09145                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListNameRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09146                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09147                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListLocationRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09148                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListSleepRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09149                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09150                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListContractRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09151             }
09152             else
09153             {
09154                   // always enable Name and Location regions
09155                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTeamListNameRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09156                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTeamListLocationRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09157 
09158                   // valid character.  If it's a vehicle, however
09159                   if ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharNum ].usSolID ].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
09160                   {
09161                         // Can't change assignment for vehicles
09162                         MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09163                   }
09164                   else
09165                   {
09166                         MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09167 
09168                         // POW or dead ?
09169                         if ( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharNum ].usSolID ].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
09170                                      ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bCharNum ].usSolID ].bLife == 0 ) )
09171                         {
09172                               // "Remove Merc"
09173                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ bCharNum ], pRemoveMercStrings[ 0 ] );
09174 
09175                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ bCharNum ], L"" );
09176                         }
09177                         else
09178                         {
09179                               // "Assign Merc"
09180                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListAssignmentRegion[ bCharNum ], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 1 ] );
09181                               // "Plot Travel Route"
09182                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ bCharNum ], pMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
09183                         }
09184                   }
09185 
09186 
09187                   if ( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( bCharNum ) )
09188                   {
09189                         MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTeamListContractRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09190                   }
09191                   else
09192                   {
09193                         MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListContractRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09194                   }
09195 
09196 
09197                   if ( CanChangeSleepStatusForCharSlot( bCharNum ) )
09198                   {
09199                         MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTeamListSleepRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09200                   }
09201                   else
09202                   {
09203                         MSYS_DisableRegion( &gTeamListSleepRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09204                   }
09205 
09206                   // destination region is always enabled for all valid character slots.
09207                   // if the character can't move at this time, then the region handler must be able to tell the player why not
09208                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gTeamListDestinationRegion[ bCharNum ] );
09209             }
09210       }
09211 }
09212 
09213 
09214 void ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( void )
09215 {
09216       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
09217       {
09218             // stop mapscreen text
09219             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
09220             return;
09221       }
09222 
09223       // if in militia redistribution popup
09224       if ( sSelectedMilitiaTown != 0 )
09225       {
09226             sSelectedMilitiaTown = 0;
09227       }
09228 
09229 
09230       // cancel destination line highlight
09231       giDestHighLine = -1;
09232 
09233       // cancel assign line highlight
09234       giAssignHighLine = -1;
09235 
09236       // unhilight contract line
09237       giContractHighLine = -1;
09238 
09239 
09240       // if we were plotting movement
09241       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
09242       {
09243             AbortMovementPlottingMode();
09244       }
09245 
09246       // reset assign character 
09247       bSelectedAssignChar = -1;
09248 
09249       // reset contract character
09250       bSelectedContractChar = -1;
09251 
09252 
09253       // reset map cursor to normal
09254   if ( !gfFadeOutDone && !gfFadeIn )
09255   {
09256         SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
09257   }
09258 
09259       return;
09260 }
09261 
09262 
09263 
09264 void UpdatePausedStatesDueToTimeCompression( void )
09265 {
09266       // this executes every frame, so keep it optimized for speed!
09267 
09268       // if time is being compressed
09269       if( IsTimeBeingCompressed() )
09270       {
09271             // but it shouldn't be
09272             if ( !AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
09273             {
09274                   // pause game to (temporarily) stop time compression
09275                   PauseGame( );
09276             }
09277       }
09278       else  // time is NOT being compressed
09279       {
09280             // but the player would like it to be compressing
09281             if ( IsTimeCompressionOn() && !gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause )
09282             {
09283                   // so check if it's legal to start time compressing again
09284                   if ( AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
09285                   {
09286                         // unpause game to restart time compresssion
09287                         UnPauseGame( );
09288                   }
09289             }
09290       }
09291 
09292       return;
09293 }
09294 
09295 
09296 BOOLEAN ContinueDialogue(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fDone )
09297 {
09298       // continue this grunts dialogue, restore when done
09299       static INT8 bOldSelectedInfoChar = -1;
09300       static BOOLEAN fTalkingingGuy = FALSE;
09301 
09302       INT8 bCounter = 0;
09303 
09304       
09305 
09306 
09307       if( fDone == TRUE )
09308       {
09309             if( fTalkingingGuy == TRUE )
09310             {
09311                   /*
09312                   // done, restore
09313                   if( bOldSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
09314                   {
09315                         ChangeSelectedInfoChar( bOldSelectedInfoChar, TRUE );
09316 
09317                         SetAutoFaceInActive( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ]->iFaceIndex );
09318                   }
09319 
09320       */
09321                   fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
09322                   fTalkingingGuy = FALSE;
09323             }
09324 
09325             return( TRUE );
09326       }
09327 
09328       // check if valid character talking?
09329       if( pSoldier == NULL )
09330       {
09331             return FALSE;
09332       }
09333 
09334       // otherwise, find this character
09335       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; bCounter++ )
09336       {
09337             if( gCharactersList[bCounter].fValid == TRUE )
09338             {
09339                   if( ( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bCounter].usSolID]) == pSoldier )
09340                   {
09341                         if( bSelectedInfoChar != bCounter )
09342                         {
09343                               bOldSelectedInfoChar = bSelectedInfoChar;
09344                               ChangeSelectedInfoChar( bCounter, TRUE );
09345                         }
09346                         fTalkingingGuy = TRUE;
09347                         return ( FALSE );
09348                   }
09349             }
09350       }
09351 
09352       return ( FALSE );
09353 }
09354 
09355 
09356 void HandleSpontanousTalking(  )
09357 {
09358       // simply polls if the talking guy is done, if so...send an end command to continue dialogue
09359 
09360       if( DialogueActive() == FALSE )
09361       {
