09362             if( ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) && ( bSelectedInfoChar < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) )
09363             {
09364                   ContinueDialogue( ( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID] ), TRUE );
09365             }
09366       }
09367 
09368       return;
09369 }
09370 
09371 
09372 BOOLEAN CheckIfClickOnLastSectorInPath( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
09373 {
09374       PathStPtr *ppMovePath = NULL;
09375       BOOLEAN fLastSectorInPath = FALSE;
09376       INT32 iVehicleId = -1;
09377       PathStPtr pPreviousMercPath = NULL;
09378 
09379 
09380       // see if we have clicked on the last sector in the characters path
09381 
09382       // check if helicopter
09383       if( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
09384       {
09385             if( sX + ( sY * MAP_WORLD_X ) == GetLastSectorOfHelicoptersPath( ) )
09386             {
09387                   // helicopter route confirmed - take off
09388                   TakeOffHelicopter( );
09389 
09390                   // rebuild waypoints - helicopter
09391                   ppMovePath = &( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath );
09392                   RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath( *ppMovePath, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
09393 
09394                   // pointer to previous helicopter path
09395                   pPreviousMercPath = gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath;
09396 
09397                   fLastSectorInPath = TRUE;
09398             }
09399       }
09400       else  // not doing helicopter movement
09401       {
09402             // if not doing a soldier either, we shouldn't be here!
09403             if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
09404             {
09405                   return( FALSE );
09406             }
09407 
09408             // invalid soldier?  we shouldn't be here!
09409             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].fValid == FALSE )
09410             {
09411                   bSelectedDestChar = -1;
09412                   return( FALSE );
09413             }
09414 
09415             if( sX + ( sY * MAP_WORLD_X ) == GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( ( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] ) ) )
09416             {
09417                   // clicked on last sector, reset plotting mode
09418 
09419                   // if he's IN a vehicle or IS a vehicle
09420                   if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].bAssignment == VEHICLE ) || ( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
09421                   {
09422                         if( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].bAssignment == VEHICLE )
09423                         {
09424                               // IN a vehicle
09425                               iVehicleId = Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].iVehicleId;
09426                         }
09427                         else
09428                         {
09429                               // IS a vehicle
09430                               iVehicleId = Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].bVehicleID;
09431                         }
09432 
09433                         // rebuild waypoints - vehicles
09434                         ppMovePath = &( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].pMercPath );
09435                   }
09436                   else
09437                   {
09438                         // rebuild waypoints - mercs on foot
09439                         ppMovePath = &( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].pMercPath );
09440                   }
09441 
09442                   RebuildWayPointsForAllSelectedCharsGroups( );
09443 
09444                   // pointer to previous character path
09445                   pPreviousMercPath = gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ bSelectedDestChar ];
09446 
09447                   fLastSectorInPath = TRUE;
09448             }
09449       }
09450 
09451 
09452       // if the click was over the last sector
09453       if ( fLastSectorInPath )
09454       {
09455             // route has been confirmed
09456             EndConfirmMapMoveMode( );
09457 
09458             // if we really did plot a path (this will skip message if left click on current sector with no path)
09459             if ( GetLengthOfPath( *ppMovePath ) > 0 )
09460             {
09461                   // then verbally confirm this destination!
09462                   HandleNewDestConfirmation( sX, sY );
09463             }
09464             else  // NULL path confirmed
09465             {
09466                   // if previously there was a path
09467                   if ( pPreviousMercPath != NULL )
09468                   {
09469                         // then this means we've CANCELED it
09470                         MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pMapPlotStrings[ 3 ] );
09471                   }
09472                   else  // no previous path
09473                   {
09474                         // then it means the route was UNCHANGED
09475                         MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pMapPlotStrings[ 2 ] );
09476                   }
09477             }
09478       }
09479 
09480 
09481       return( fLastSectorInPath );
09482 }
09483 
09484 
09485 void RebuildWayPointsForAllSelectedCharsGroups( void )
09486 {
09487       // rebuild the waypoints for everyone in the selected character list
09488       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09489       BOOLEAN fGroupIDRebuilt[ 256 ];
09490       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
09491       INT32 iVehicleId;
09492       PathStPtr *ppMovePath = NULL;
09493       UINT8 ubGroupId;
09494 
09495 
09496       memset( fGroupIDRebuilt, FALSE, sizeof( fGroupIDRebuilt ) );
09497 
09498       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
09499       {
09500             if( ( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE ) )
09501             {
09502                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
09503 
09504 
09505                   // if he's IN a vehicle or IS a vehicle
09506                   if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) || ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
09507                   {
09508                         if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
09509                         {
09510                               // IN a vehicle
09511                               iVehicleId = pSoldier->iVehicleId;
09512                         }
09513                         else
09514                         {
09515                               // IS a vehicle
09516                               iVehicleId = pSoldier->bVehicleID;
09517                         }
09518 
09519                         // vehicles
09520                         ppMovePath = &( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].pMercPath );
09521                         ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
09522                   }
09523                   else
09524                   {
09525                         // mercs on foot
09526                         ppMovePath = &( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID].pMercPath );
09527                         ubGroupId = pSoldier->ubGroupID;
09528                   }
09529 
09530                   // if we haven't already rebuilt this group
09531                   if ( !fGroupIDRebuilt[ ubGroupId ] )
09532                   {
09533                         // rebuild it now
09534                         RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
09535 
09536                         // mark it as rebuilt
09537                         fGroupIDRebuilt[ ubGroupId ] = TRUE;
09538                   }
09539             }
09540       }
09541 }
09542 
09543 
09544 void UpdateCursorIfInLastSector( void )
09545 {
09546 
09547       INT16 sMapX = 0, sMapY = 0;
09548 
09549       // check to see if we are plotting a path, if so, see if we are highlighting the last sector int he path, if so, change the cursor
09550       if ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) ) 
09551       {                             
09552             GetMouseMapXY(&sMapX, &sMapY);
09553 
09554             // translate screen values to map grid values for zoomed in 
09555             if(fZoomFlag)
09556             {
09557                   sMapX=(UINT16)iZoomX/MAP_GRID_X+sMapX;
09558                   sMapX=sMapX/2;
09559                   sMapY=(UINT16)iZoomY/MAP_GRID_Y+sMapY;
09560                   sMapY=sMapY/2;
09561             }
09562 
09563             if( fShowAircraftFlag == FALSE )
09564             {
09565                   if( bSelectedDestChar != -1 )
09566                   {
09567                         //c heck if we are in the last sector of the characters path?
09568                         if( sMapX + ( sMapY * MAP_WORLD_X ) == GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( ( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedDestChar ].usSolID ] ) ) )
09569                         {
09570                               // set cursor to checkmark
09571                               ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_CHECKMARK );
09572                         }
09573                         else if( fCheckCursorWasSet )
09574                         {
09575                               // reset to walking guy/vehicle
09576                               SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
09577                         }
09578                   }
09579             }
09580             else
09581             {
09582                   // check for helicopter
09583                   if( fPlotForHelicopter )
09584                   {
09585                         if( sMapX + ( sMapY * MAP_WORLD_X ) == GetLastSectorOfHelicoptersPath( ) )
09586                         {
09587                               // set cursor to checkmark
09588                               ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( CURSOR_CHECKMARK );
09589                         }
09590                         else if( fCheckCursorWasSet )
09591                         {
09592                               // reset to walking guy/vehicle
09593                               SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
09594                         }
09595                   }
09596                   else
09597                   {
09598                         // reset to walking guy/vehicle
09599                         SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
09600                   }
09601             }
09602       }
09603 
09604       return;
09605 
09606 }
09607 
09608 
09609 
09610 void FaceRegionBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
09611 {
09612       // error checking, make sure someone is there
09613       if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
09614       {           
09615             return;
09616       }
09617       else if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == FALSE )
09618       {
09619             return;
09620       }
09621 
09622       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
09623       {
09624             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
09625             {
09626                   // stop mapscreen text
09627                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
09628                   return;
09629             }
09630 
09631             if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE )
09632             {
09633                   return;
09634             }
09635 
09636             // now stop any dialogue in progress
09637             StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
09638       }
09639 
09640       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
09641       {
09642             RequestToggleMercInventoryPanel();
09643       }
09644 }
09645 
09646 
09647 void FaceRegionMvtCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
09648 {
09649       if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
09650       {
09651             fShowFaceHightLight = FALSE;
09652             return;
09653       }
09654       else if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == FALSE )
09655       {
09656             fShowFaceHightLight = FALSE;
09657             return;
09658       }
09659 
09660       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE ) )
09661       {
09662             fShowFaceHightLight = TRUE;
09663       }
09664       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE ) 
09665       {
09666             fShowFaceHightLight = FALSE;
09667       }
09668 }
09669 
09670 
09671 
09672 void ItemRegionBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
09673 {
09674       // left AND right button are handled the same way
09675       if (iReason & ( MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP | MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) )
09676       {
09677             RequestToggleMercInventoryPanel();
09678       }
09679 }
09680 
09681 
09682 void ItemRegionMvtCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
09683 {
09684       if ( !CanToggleSelectedCharInventory() )
09685       {           
09686             fShowItemHighLight = FALSE;
09687             return;
09688       }
09689 
09690       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE ) )
09691       {
09692             fShowItemHighLight = TRUE;
09693       }
09694       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE ) 
09695       {
09696             fShowItemHighLight = FALSE;
09697       }
09698 }
09699 
09700 
09701 
09702 void HandleChangeOfHighLightedLine( void )
09703 {
09704       static INT32 iOldHighLine;
09705 
09706       if ( fShowInventoryFlag )
09707       {
09708             return;
09709       }
09710 
09711       // check if change in highlight line
09712       if( giHighLine != iOldHighLine )
09713       {
09714             iOldHighLine = giHighLine;
09715 
09716             if( giHighLine == -1 )
09717             {
09718                   giSleepHighLine = -1;
09719                   giAssignHighLine = -1;
09720                   giContractHighLine = -1;
09721                   giSleepHighLine = -1;
09722 
09723                   // don't do during plotting, allowing selected character to remain highlighted and their destination column to glow!
09724                   if( ( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) )
09725                   {
09726                         giDestHighLine = -1;
09727                   }
09728             }
09729 
09730             fDrawCharacterList = TRUE;
09731       }
09732 }
09733 
09734 
09735 void UpdateTownMinePopUpDisplay( void )
09736 {
09737       if ( gMapViewRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
09738       {
09739             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghTownMineBox );
09740             MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty();
09741       }
09742 }
09743 
09744 
09745 void HandleCharBarRender( void )
09746 {
09747        // check if the panel is disbled, if so, do not render
09748       if( ( bSelectedInfoChar !=-1) && ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster == FALSE ) )
09749       {
09750             // valid character?...render
09751             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
09752             {
09753                   //if( !( ( fShowContractMenu)||( fShowAssignmentMenu ) ) )
09754                   //{
09755                         // draw bars for them
09756                         DrawCharBars( );
09757 
09758                         UpdateCharRegionHelpText( );
09759                   //}
09760             }
09761       }
09762 }
09763 
09764 
09765 
09766 // update the status of the contract box
09767 void UpDateStatusOfContractBox( void )
09768 {
09769       if( fShowContractMenu == TRUE )
09770       {
09771             ForceUpDateOfBox( ghContractBox );
09772 
09773             if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID].bLife == 0 )||( Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedInfoChar].usSolID].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
09774             {
09775                   ForceUpDateOfBox( ghRemoveMercAssignBox );
09776             }
09777       }
09778       
09779       return;
09780 }
09781 
09782 
09783 
09784 void DestroyTheItemInCursor( )
09785 {
09786       // actually destroy this item
09787       // End Item pickup
09788       MAPEndItemPointer( );           
09789       gpItemPointer = NULL;
09790 }
09791 
09792 
09793 void TrashItemMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
09794 {
09795       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
09796       {
09797             // find the item and get rid of it
09798 
09799             DestroyTheItemInCursor( );
09800 
09801             // reset cursor
09802             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion , CURSOR_NORMAL ); 
09803             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
09804 
09805             HandleButtonStatesWhileMapInventoryActive( );
09806       }
09807 }
09808 
09809 
09810 void TrashCanBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason)
09811 {
09812       
09813       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
09814       {
09815             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
09816             {
09817                   // stop mapscreen text
09818                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
09819                   return;
09820             }
09821 
09822             // check if an item is in the cursor, if so, warn player
09823             if( gpItemPointer != NULL )
09824             {
09825               // set up for mapscreen
09826                   if( gpItemPointer -> ubMission )
09827                   {
09828                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pTrashItemText[ 1 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, TrashItemMessageBoxCallBack );
09829                   }
09830                   else
09831                   {
09832                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pTrashItemText[ 0 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, TrashItemMessageBoxCallBack );
09833                   }
09834             }
09835       }
09836 }
09837 
09838 
09839 void TrashCanMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason)
09840 {
09841       
09842       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
09843       {
09844             if( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR )
09845             {
09846                   fShowTrashCanHighLight = TRUE; 
09847             }
09848       }
09849       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
09850       {
09851             fShowTrashCanHighLight = FALSE; 
09852       }
09853 }
09854 
09855 
09856 void MapInvDoneButtonfastHelpCall( )
09857 {
09858       SetPendingNewScreen( LAPTOP_SCREEN );
09859 }
09860 
09861 
09862 void UpdateStatusOfMapSortButtons( void )
09863 {
09864       INT32 iCounter = 0;
09865       static BOOLEAN fShownLastTime = FALSE;
09866 
09867 
09868       if( ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive ) || fShowInventoryFlag )
09869       {
09870             if ( fShownLastTime )
09871             {
09872                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_SORT_METHODS; iCounter++ )
09873                   {
09874                         HideButton( giMapSortButton[ iCounter ] );
09875                   }
09876                   if ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive ) 
09877                   {
09878                         HideButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
09879                         HideButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
09880                   }
09881 
09882                   fShownLastTime = FALSE;
09883             }
09884       }
09885       else
09886       {
09887             if ( !fShownLastTime )
09888             {
09889                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_SORT_METHODS; iCounter++ )
09890                   {
09891                         ShowButton( giMapSortButton[ iCounter ] );
09892                   }
09893 
09894                   ShowButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
09895                   ShowButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
09896 
09897                   fShownLastTime = TRUE;
09898             }
09899       }
09900 }
09901 
09902 
09903 
09904 INT8 GetLastValidCharacterInTeamPanelList( void )
09905 {
09906       INT8 iCounter = 0, iValue = 0;
09907 
09908       // run through the list and find the last valid guy in the list
09909       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
09910       {
09911             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
09912             {
09913                   if(( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
09914                   {
09915                         if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
09916                         {
09917                               if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorX == sSelMapX && Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorY == sSelMapY && Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bSectorZ == ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
09918                               {
09919                                     iValue = iCounter;
09920                               }
09921                         }
09922                         else
09923                         {
09924                               if( fShowInventoryFlag && ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) )
09925                               {
09926                                     if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
09927                                     {
09928                                           if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
09929                                           {
09930                                                 if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorX == Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorX &&  Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorY == Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorY && Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bSectorZ ==Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].bSectorZ )
09931                                                 {
09932                                                       iValue = iCounter;
09933                                                 }
09934                                           }
09935                                     }
09936                               }
09937                               else
09938                               {
09939                                     iValue = iCounter;
09940                               }
09941                         }
09942                   }
09943             }
09944       }
09945 
09946       // return the character
09947       return( iValue );
09948 }
09949 
09950 /*

09952 INT8 GetPrevValidCharacterInTeamPanelList( INT8 bCurrentIndex )

09954       INT8 iCounter = bCurrentIndex, iValue = 0;
09955 
09956       // run through the list and find the last valid guy in the list
09957       for( iCounter = bCurrentIndex; iCounter > 0; iCounter-- )
09958       {
09959             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
09960             {
09961                   if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
09962                   {
09963                         if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
09964                         {
09965                               if(  Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorX == sSelMapX &&  Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorY == sSelMapY && Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bSectorZ == ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
09966                               {
09967                                     iValue = iCounter;
09968                               }
09969                         }
09970                         else
09971                         {
09972                               if( fShowInventoryFlag && ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) )
09973                               {
09974                                     if( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 )
09975                                     {
09976                                           if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == TRUE )
09977                                           {
09978                                                 if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorX == Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorX &&  Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].sSectorY == Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorY && Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bSectorZ ==Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].bSectorZ )
09979                                                 {
09980                                                       iValue = iCounter;
09981                                                       iCounter = 0;
09982                                                 }
09983                                           }
09984                                     }
09985                               }
09986                               else
09987                               {
09988                                     iValue = iCounter;
09989                               }
09990                         }
09991                   }
09992             }
09993       }
09994 
09995       // return the character
09996       return( iValue );

10049 
10050 
10051 
10052 void CreateDestroyTrashCanRegion( void )
10053 {
10054       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
10055 
10056       if( fShowInventoryFlag && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
10057       {
10058 
10059             fCreated = TRUE;
10060 
10061             // trash can 
10062             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gTrashCanRegion,      TRASH_CAN_X, TRASH_CAN_Y, TRASH_CAN_X + TRASH_CAN_WIDTH, TRASH_CAN_Y + TRASH_CAN_HEIGHT , MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 4 ,
10063                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, TrashCanMoveCallback, TrashCanBtnCallback );
10064       
10065             // done inventory button define
10066             giMapInvButtonDoneImage = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\done_button2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
10067     giMapInvDoneButton = QuickCreateButton( giMapInvButtonDoneImage, INV_BTN_X, INV_BTN_Y,
10068                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
10069                                                             ( GUI_CALLBACK )BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, ( GUI_CALLBACK)DoneInventoryMapBtnCallback );
10070             
10071             SetButtonFastHelpText( giMapInvDoneButton ,pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
10072             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gTrashCanRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 1 ] );
10073 
10074             InitMapKeyRingInterface( KeyRingItemPanelButtonCallback );
10075 /*
10076             giMapInvNextImage=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\inventory_buttons.sti" ,-1,20,-1,22,-1 );
10077     giMapInvNext= QuickCreateButton( giMapInvNextImage, ( 2 ), ( 79 ) ,
10078                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
10079                                                             ( GUI_CALLBACK )BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, ( GUI_CALLBACK)NextInventoryMapBtnCallback );
10080             
10081       
10082             giMapInvPrevImage=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\inventory_buttons.sti" ,-1,21,-1,23,-1 );
10083     giMapInvPrev= QuickCreateButton( giMapInvPrevImage, ( 30 ) , ( 79 ),
10084                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
10085                                                             ( GUI_CALLBACK )BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, ( GUI_CALLBACK)PrevInventoryMapBtnCallback );
10086             
10087       */
10088 
10089                   // reset the compatable item array at this point
10090             ResetCompatibleItemArray( );
10091 
10092       }
10093       else if( ( fShowInventoryFlag == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
10094       {
10095             // trash can region
10096             fCreated = FALSE;
10097             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTrashCanRegion );
10098 
10099             // map inv done button
10100             RemoveButton( giMapInvDoneButton );
10101     
10102             // get rid of button image
10103             UnloadButtonImage( giMapInvButtonDoneImage );
10104 
10105             ShutdownKeyRingInterface( );
10106 
10107             if( fShowDescriptionFlag == TRUE )
10108             {
10109                   // kill description
10110                   DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
10111             }
10112 
10113       }
10114 }
10115 
10116 void InvmaskRegionBtnCallBack( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
10117 {
10118       // CJC, December 15 1998: do NOTHING for clicks here
10119 }
10120 
10121 
10122 void DoneInventoryMapBtnCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
10123 {
10124       // prevent inventory from being closed while stack popup up!
10125       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
10126       {
10127             btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
10128       }
10129       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
10130       {
10131             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
10132             {
10133                   btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
10134 
10135                   if ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor != EXTERN_CURSOR && !InItemStackPopup() )
10136                   {
10137                         fEndShowInventoryFlag = TRUE;
10138                   }
10139             }
10140       }     
10141 }
10142 
10143 
10144 
10145 void StartConfirmMapMoveMode( INT16 sMapY )
10146 {
10147       UINT8 ubPosition = ( sMapY < 8 ) ? MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_LOWER : MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_UPPER;
10148 
10149 
10150       // tell player what to do - to click again to confirm move
10151       MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, ubPosition, pMapPlotStrings[ 0 ] );
10152 
10153       gfInConfirmMapMoveMode = TRUE;
10154 }
10155 
10156 
10157 void EndConfirmMapMoveMode( void )
10158 {
10159       CancelMapUIMessage( );
10160 
10161       gfInConfirmMapMoveMode = FALSE;
10162 }
10163 
10164 
10165 
10166 void CancelMapUIMessage( void )
10167 {
10168       // and kill the message overlay
10169       EndUIMessage( );
10170 
10171       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
10172 }
10173 
10174 
10175 // automatically turns off mapscreen ui overlay messages when appropriate
10176 void MonitorMapUIMessage( void )
10177 {
10178       // if there is a map UI message being displayed
10179       if( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 )
10180       {
10181             // and if we're not in the middle of the "confirm move" sequence
10182 //          if( !gfInConfirmMapMoveMode || bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
10183             {
10184                   // and we've now exceed its period of maximum persistance (without user input)
10185                   if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiUIMessageTime ) > guiUIMessageTimeDelay )
10186                   {
10187                         // then cancel the message now
10188                         CancelMapUIMessage( );
10189                   }
10190             }
10191       }
10192 }
10193 
10194 
10195 void HandlePreBattleInterfaceWithInventoryPanelUp( void )
10196 {
10197       if( ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE ) && ( fShowInventoryFlag == TRUE ) )
10198       {
10199             if( fShowDescriptionFlag == TRUE )
10200             {
10201                   // kill description
10202                   DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
10203             }
10204 
10205             // kill inventory panel
10206             fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
10207             CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
10208       }
10209 }
10210 
10211 
10212 // this puts anyone who is on NO_ASSIGNMENT onto a free squad
10213 void UpdateBadAssignments( void )
10214 {
10215       UINT32 iCounter;
10216 
10217       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
10218       {
10219             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
10220             {
10221                   CheckIfSoldierUnassigned( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
10222             }
10223       }
10224 
10225       return;
10226 }
10227 
10228 void InterruptTimeForMenus( void )
10229 {
10230       if( ( fShowAssignmentMenu == TRUE )||( fShowContractMenu == TRUE ) )
10231       {
10232             InterruptTime( );
10233             PauseTimeForInterupt( );
10234       }
10235       else if( fOneFrame )
10236       {
10237             InterruptTime( );
10238             PauseTimeForInterupt( );
10239       }
10240 
10241       return;
10242 }
10243 
10244 
10245 void HandleContractTimeFlashForMercThatIsAboutLeave( void )
10246 {
10247       INT32 iCurrentTime;
10248 
10249       // grab the current time
10250       iCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
10251 
10252       // only bother checking once flash interval has elapsed
10253       if( ( iCurrentTime - giFlashContractBaseTime ) >= DELAY_PER_FLASH_FOR_DEPARTING_PERSONNEL )
10254       {
10255             // update timer so that we only run check so often
10256             giFlashContractBaseTime = iCurrentTime;
10257             fFlashContractFlag = !fFlashContractFlag;
10258 
10259             // don't redraw unless we have to!
10260             if ( AnyMercsLeavingRealSoon() )
10261             {
10262                   // redraw character list
10263                   fDrawCharacterList = TRUE;
10264             }
10265       }
10266 }
10267 
10268 
10269 BOOLEAN AnyMercsLeavingRealSoon()
10270 {
10271       UINT32 uiCounter = 0;
10272       UINT32 uiTimeInMin = GetWorldTotalMin();
10273       BOOLEAN fFoundOne = FALSE;
10274 
10275       for( uiCounter = 0; uiCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; uiCounter++ )
10276       {
10277             if( gCharactersList[ uiCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
10278             {
10279                   if( ( Menptr[gCharactersList[uiCounter].usSolID].iEndofContractTime - uiTimeInMin ) <= MINS_TO_FLASH_CONTRACT_TIME )
10280                   {
10281                         fFoundOne = TRUE;
10282                         break;
10283                   }
10284             }
10285       }
10286 
10287       return( fFoundOne );
10288 }
10289 
10290 
10291 
10292 BOOLEAN HandlePreloadOfMapGraphics( void )
10293 {
10294       // check amt of memory, if above required amt...use it
10295       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
10296   VOBJECT_DESC     VObjectDesc;
10297 
10298       fPreLoadedMapGraphics = TRUE;
10299 
10300       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
10301       strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\b_map.pcx");
10302       CHECKF(AddVideoSurface(&vs_desc, &guiBIGMAP));
10303       //strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\popupbackground.pcx");
10304       //CHECKF(AddVideoSurface(&vs_desc, &guiPOPUPTEX));
10305 
10306       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10307       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mapcursr.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10308       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAPCURSORS));
10309 
10310       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10311       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\SAM.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10312       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSAMICON));
10313 
10314       // VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10315       // FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\s_map.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10316       // CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMAP ) );
10317       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10318       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mapcursr.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10319       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAPCURSORS));
10320 
10321       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10322       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\sleepicon.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10323       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSleepIcon));
10324 
10325       //VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10326       //FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\addonslcp.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10327       //CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCORNERADDONS));
10328 
10329       //VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10330       //FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mapborder.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10331       //CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAPBORDER));
10332 
10333       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10334       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\charinfo.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10335       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCHARINFO));
10336       /*strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\playlist3.pcx");
10337       CHECKF(AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiCHARLIST ));*/
10338 
10339       // WANNE 2
10340       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10341       if (iResolution == 0)
10342       {
10343             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\newgoldpiece3.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
10344       }
10345       else if (iResolution == 1)
10346       {
10347             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\newgoldpiece3_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
10348       }
10349       else if (iResolution == 2)
10350       {
10351             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\newgoldpiece3_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
10352       }
10353       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCHARLIST));
10354 
10355       //VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10356       //FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mapbordercorner.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10357       //CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAPCORNER));
10358 
10359       // VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10360       // FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\popup.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10361       // CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPOPUPBORDERS));
10362 
10363       // the sublevels
10364       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10365       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Mine_1.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10366       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSubLevel1));
10367 
10368       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10369       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Mine_2.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10370       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSubLevel2));
10371 
10372       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10373       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Mine_3.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10374       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSubLevel3));
10375 
10376       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10377       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\boxes.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10378       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCHARICONS));
10379 
10380       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10381       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\incross.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10382       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCROSS));
10383 
10384       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10385       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mapinv.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10386       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAPINV));
10387 
10388       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10389       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\map_inv_2nd_gun_cover.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10390       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMapInvSecondHandBlockout));
10391 
10392       // the upper left corner piece icons
10393       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10394       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\top_left_corner_icons.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10395       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiULICONS));
10396 
10397       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10398       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\prison.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10399       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTIXAICON));
10400 
10401       HandleLoadOfMapBottomGraphics( );
10402 
10403       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10404       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\map_item.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10405       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiORTAICON));
10406 
10407       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10408       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mapcursr.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10409       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMAPCURSORS));
10410 
10411       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10412       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\merc_between_sector_icons.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10413       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCHARBETWEENSECTORICONS));
10414 
10415       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10416       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\merc_mvt_green_arrows.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10417       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCHARBETWEENSECTORICONSCLOSE));
10418 
10419 
10420       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10421       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\GreenArr.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10422       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLEVELMARKER));
10423 
10424       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10425       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Helicop.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10426       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiHelicopterIcon));
10427 
10428       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10429       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\eta_pop_up.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10430       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMapBorderEtaPopUp));
10431 
10432       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10433       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\pos2.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10434       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMapBorderHeliSectors));
10435 
10436       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10437       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\secondary_gun_hidden.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10438       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSecItemHiddenVO ) );
10439 
10440       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10441       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\selectedchararrow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10442       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSelectedCharArrow ) );
10443 
10444       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10445       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\mine.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10446       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMINEICON ) );
10447 
10448       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10449       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\hilite.sti" );
10450       AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSectorLocatorGraphicID );
10451 
10452       //Kris:  Added this because I need to blink the icons button.
10453       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10454       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\newemail.sti" );
10455       AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiNewMailIcons );
10456 
10457       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
10458       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\BullsEye.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
10459       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBULLSEYE));
10460 
10461 
10462       // graphic for pool inventory
10463       LoadInventoryPoolGraphic( );
10464 
10465       // load border graphics
10466       LoadMapBorderGraphics( );
10467 
10468       // load the pop up for the militia pop up box
10469       LoadMilitiaPopUpBox( );
10470 
10471       return( TRUE );
10472 }
10473 
10474 
10475 void HandleRemovalOfPreLoadedMapGraphics( void )
10476 {
10477 
10478       if( fPreLoadedMapGraphics == TRUE )
10479       {
10480             DeleteMapBottomGraphics( );
10481             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMAPCURSORS );
10482             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSleepIcon );
10483             
10484             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPBORDER);
10485             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCHARLIST);
10486             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCORNERADDONS);
10487             //DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPCORNER);
10488       //    DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPOPUPBORDERS);
10489             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCHARINFO);
10490             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCHARICONS);
10491             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiCROSS);
10492             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiBIGMAP);
10493             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSubLevel1);
10494             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSubLevel2);
10495             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSubLevel3);
10496 
10497       //    DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiPOPUPTEX);
10498             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiSAMICON);
10499             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMAPINV);
10500             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMapInvSecondHandBlockout);
10501             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiULICONS);
10502             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiORTAICON);
10503             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiTIXAICON);
10504             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCHARBETWEENSECTORICONS );
10505             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCHARBETWEENSECTORICONSCLOSE );
10506             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiLEVELMARKER );
10507             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapBorderEtaPopUp );
10508             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSecItemHiddenVO );
10509             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSelectedCharArrow );
10510             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapBorderHeliSectors );
10511             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiHelicopterIcon );
10512             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMINEICON );
10513             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSectorLocatorGraphicID );
10514 
10515             //Kris:  Remove the email icons.
10516             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiNewMailIcons );
10517 
10518             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBULLSEYE );
10519 
10520 
10521             // remove the graphic for the militia pop up box 
10522             RemoveMilitiaPopUpBox( );
10523 
10524             // remove inventory pool graphic
10525             RemoveInventoryPoolGraphic( );
10526 
10527             // get rid of border stuff
10528             DeleteMapBorderGraphics( );
10529       }
10530 
10531       return;
10532 }
10533 
10534 
10535 BOOLEAN CharacterIsInLoadedSectorAndWantsToMoveInventoryButIsNotAllowed( INT8 bCharId )
10536 {
10537       UINT16 usSoldierId = 0;
10538 
10539       // invalid char id
10540       if( bCharId == -1 )
10541       {
10542             return( FALSE );
10543       }
10544 
10545       // valid char?
10546       if( gCharactersList[ bCharId ].fValid == FALSE )
10547       {
10548             return( FALSE );
10549       }
10550 
10551       // get the soldier id
10552       usSoldierId = gCharactersList[ bCharId ].usSolID;
10553 
10554       // char is in loaded sector
10555       if( Menptr[ usSoldierId ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX || Menptr[ usSoldierId ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY || Menptr[ usSoldierId ].bSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ )
10556       {
10557             return( FALSE );
10558       }
10559 
10560       // not showing inventory?
10561       if( fShowInventoryFlag == FALSE )
10562       {
10563             // nope
10564             return( FALSE );
10565       }
10566 
10567       // picked something up?
10568       if( gMPanelRegion.Cursor != EXTERN_CURSOR )
10569       {
10570             // nope
10571             return( FALSE );
10572       }
10573 
10574       // only disallow when enemies in sector
10575       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
10576       {
10577             return( FALSE );
10578       }
10579 
10580       return( TRUE );
10581 }
10582 
10583 
10584 
10585 void UpdateTheStateOfTheNextPrevMapScreenCharacterButtons( void )
10586 {
10587       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
10588       {
10589             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
10590             {
10591                   // stop mapscreen text
10592                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
10593             }
10594       }
10595       else if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
10596       {
10597             DisableButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
10598             DisableButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
10599             DisableButton( giMapContractButton );
10600       }
10601 /* ARM: Commented out at KM's request, it won't reenabled them when coming back from PBI, on Feb. 22, 99
10602       else if ( fShowInventoryFlag == FALSE ) // make sure that we are in fact showing the mapscreen inventory
10603       {
10604             return;
10605       }
10606 */
10607       else
10608       {
10609             // standard checks
10610             if ( ( GetNumberOfPeopleInCharacterList( ) < 2 ) ||
10611                          ( CharacterIsInLoadedSectorAndWantsToMoveInventoryButIsNotAllowed( bSelectedInfoChar ) ) ||
10612                          ( CharacterIsInTransitAndHasItemPickedUp( bSelectedInfoChar ) ) ||
10613                          ( fShowDescriptionFlag ) )
10614             {
10615                   DisableButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
10616                   DisableButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
10617             }
10618             else
10619             {
10620                   EnableButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
10621                   EnableButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
10622             }
10623       }
10624 }
10625 
10626 
10627 void PrevInventoryMapBtnCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
10628 {
10629       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
10630       {
10631         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
10632       }
10633       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
10634   {
10635     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
10636             {
10637                   btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
10638 
10639                   GoToPrevCharacterInList( );
10640             }
10641       }     
10642 }
10643 
10644 
10645 void NextInventoryMapBtnCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
10646 {
10647       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
10648       {
10649         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
10650       }
10651       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
10652   {
10653     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
10654             {
10655       btn->uiFlags&= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
10656 
10657                   GoToNextCharacterInList( );
10658             }
10659       }     
10660 }

10760 
10761 
10762 void CreateDestroyMapCharacterScrollButtons( void )
10763 {
10764       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
10765 
10766       if( ( fInMapMode == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
10767       {
10768             // set the button image
10769             giCharInfoButtonImage[ 0 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_bottom_arrows.sti" ,11,4,-1,6,-1 );
10770 
10771             // set the button value
10772             giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] = QuickCreateButton( giCharInfoButtonImage[ 0 ], 67, 69,
10773                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 5,
10774                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)PrevInventoryMapBtnCallback );
10775 
10776                   // set the button image
10777             giCharInfoButtonImage[ 1 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_bottom_arrows.sti" ,12,5,-1,7,-1 );
10778 
10779             // set the button value
10780             giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( giCharInfoButtonImage[ 1 ], 67, 87,
10781                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 5,
10782                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)NextInventoryMapBtnCallback );
10783 
10784             
10785             SetButtonFastHelpText( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ], pMapScreenPrevNextCharButtonHelpText[ 0 ] );
10786             SetButtonFastHelpText( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ], pMapScreenPrevNextCharButtonHelpText[ 1 ] );
10787 
10788             fCreated = TRUE;
10789 
10790       }
10791       else if( ( ( fInMapMode == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
10792       {
10793             UnloadButtonImage( giCharInfoButtonImage[ 0 ] );
10794             UnloadButtonImage( giCharInfoButtonImage[ 1 ] );
10795             RemoveButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ]);
10796             RemoveButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ]);
10797 
10798             fCreated = FALSE;
10799       }
10800 }
10801 
10802 
10803 
10804 void TellPlayerWhyHeCantCompressTime( void )
10805 {
10806       // if we're locked into paused time compression by some event that enforces that
10807       if ( PauseStateLocked() )
10808       {
10809 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
10810             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"(BETA) Can't compress time, pause state locked (reason %d). OK unless permanent.", guiLockPauseStateLastReasonId );
10811             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"(BETA) If permanent, take screenshot now, send with *previous* save & describe what happened since.");
10812 #endif
10813       }
10814       else if( gfAtLeastOneMercWasHired == FALSE )
10815       {
10816             // no mercs hired, ever
10817             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapScreenJustStartedHelpText[ 0 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
10818       }
10819       else if ( !AnyUsableRealMercenariesOnTeam() )
10820       {
10821             // no usable mercs left on team
10822             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapErrorString[ 39 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
10823       }
10824       else if ( ActiveTimedBombExists() )
10825       {     
10826             // can't time compress when a bomb is about to go off!
10827             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gzLateLocalizedString[ 2 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
10828       }
10829       else if ( gfContractRenewalSquenceOn )
10830       {
10831 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
10832             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"(BETA) Can't compress time while contract renewal sequence is on.");
10833 #endif
10834       }
10835       else if( fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle )
10836       {
10837 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
10838             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"(BETA) Can't compress time while disabled due to battle.");
10839 #endif
10840       }
10841       else if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster )
10842       {
10843 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
10844             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"(BETA) Can't compress time while in battle roster.");
10845 #endif
10846       }
10847       else if ( fMapInventoryItem )
10848       {
10849 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
10850             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"(BETA) Can't compress time while still holding an inventory item.");
10851 #endif
10852       }
10853       else if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
10854       {
10855             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gzLateLocalizedString[ 55 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
10856       }
10857       // ARM: THIS TEST SHOULD BE THE LAST ONE, BECAUSE IT ACTUALLY RESULTS IN SOMETHING HAPPENING NOW.
10858       // KM:  Except if we are in a creature lair and haven't loaded the sector yet (no battle yet)
10859       else if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT || gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
10860       {
10861             if( OnlyHostileCivsInSector() )
10862             {
10863                   UINT16 str[ 256 ];
10864                   UINT16 pSectorString[ 128 ];
10865                   GetSectorIDString( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, pSectorString, TRUE );
10866                   swprintf( str, gzLateLocalizedString[ 27 ], pSectorString );
10867                   DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)str, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
10868             }
10869             else
10870             {
10871                   //The NEW non-persistant PBI is used instead of a dialog box explaining why we can't compress time.
10872                   InitPreBattleInterface( NULL, FALSE );
10873             }
10874       }
10875       else if( PlayerGroupIsInACreatureInfestedMine() )
10876       {
10877             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gzLateLocalizedString[ 28 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
10878       }
10879 }
10880 
10881 
10882 
10883 void MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback( UINT8 bExitValue )
10884 {
10885       // yes, load the game
10886   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK )
10887       {
10888             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
10889             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
10890             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
10891       }
10892 
10893       return;
10894 }
10895 
10896 
10897 void MapSortBtnCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
10898 {
10899       INT32 iValue = 0;
10900 
10901       // grab the button index value for the sort buttons
10902       iValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
10903 
10904 
10905       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
10906       {
10907             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
10908             {
10909                   // stop mapscreen text
10910                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
10911                   return;
10912             }
10913 
10914         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
10915       }
10916       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
10917   {
10918     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
10919             {
10920       btn->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
10921 
10922                   ChangeCharacterListSortMethod( iValue );
10923             }
10924       }     
10925 }
10926 
10927 
10928 
10929 void AddTeamPanelSortButtonsForMapScreen( void )
10930 {
10931       INT32 iCounter = 0;
10932       SGPFILENAME filename;
10933       INT32 iImageIndex[ MAX_SORT_METHODS ] = { 0, 1, 5, 2, 3, 4 };           // sleep image is out or order (last)
10934 
10935 
10936       GetMLGFilename( filename, MLG_GOLDPIECEBUTTONS );
10937 
10938       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_SORT_METHODS; iCounter++ )
10939       {
10940             giMapSortButtonImage[ iCounter ] = LoadButtonImage( filename, -1, iImageIndex[ iCounter ] , -1, iImageIndex[ iCounter ] + 6 , -1 );
10941 
10942             // buttonmake
10943             giMapSortButton[ iCounter ]= QuickCreateButton( giMapSortButtonImage[ iCounter ], ( INT16 )( gMapSortButtons[ iCounter ].iX ), ( INT16 )( gMapSortButtons[ iCounter ].iY ),
10944                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 5,
10945                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)MapSortBtnCallback );
10946 
10947             MSYS_SetBtnUserData(giMapSortButton[ iCounter ], 0, iCounter );
10948 
10949             SetButtonFastHelpText( giMapSortButton[ iCounter ], wMapScreenSortButtonHelpText[ iCounter ] );
10950       }
10951       return;
10952 }
10953 
10954 
10955 
10956 void SortListOfMercsInTeamPanel( BOOLEAN fRetainSelectedMercs )
10957 {
10958       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCounterA = 0;
10959       INT16 sEndSectorA, sEndSectorB;
10960       INT32 iExpiryTime, iExpiryTimeA;
10961       BOOLEAN fEntrySelected = FALSE;
10962       SOLDIERTYPE *pSelectedSoldier[ MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ];
10963       SOLDIERTYPE *pCurrentSoldier = NULL;
10964       SOLDIERTYPE *pPreviousSelectedInfoChar = NULL;
10965 
10966 
10967       if ( fRetainSelectedMercs )
10968       {
10969             // if we have anyone valid selected
10970             if ( ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) && ( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid ) )
10971             {
10972                   pPreviousSelectedInfoChar = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
10973             }
10974 
10975 
10976             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
10977             {
10978                   // set current entry to null
10979                   pSelectedSoldier[ iCounter ] = NULL;
10980 
10981 
10982                   // is this entry even valid
10983                   if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
10984                   {
10985                         continue;
10986                   }
10987 
10988                   // get soldier assoc. with entry
10989                   pCurrentSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
10990 
10991                   // check if soldier is active
10992                   if( pCurrentSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
10993                   {
10994                         continue;
10995                   }
10996 
10997                   // are they selected?...
10998                   if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
10999                   {
11000                         // yes, store pointer to them
11001                         pSelectedSoldier[ iCounter ] = pCurrentSoldier; 
11002                   }
11003             }
11004       }
11005 
11006 
11007       // do the sort
11008       for( iCounter = 1; iCounter < FIRST_VEHICLE ; iCounter++ )
11009       {
11010             // have we gone too far
11011             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
11012             {
11013                   break;
11014             }
11015 
11016             switch( giSortStateForMapScreenList )
11017             {
11018                   case( 0 ):
11019                         // by name
11020                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < FIRST_VEHICLE; iCounterA++ )
11021                         {
11022                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11023                               {
11024                                     break;
11025                               }
11026 
11027                               if( ( wcscmp( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ].name, Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].name ) > 0 ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11028                               {
11029                                     SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11030                               }
11031                         }
11032                         break;
11033 
11034                   case( 1 ):
11035                         // by assignment
11036                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < FIRST_VEHICLE; iCounterA++ )
11037                         {
11038                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11039                               {
11040                                     break;
11041                               }
11042 
11043                               if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ].bAssignment > Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bAssignment ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11044                               {
11045                                     SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11046                               }
11047                               else if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ].bAssignment == Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].bAssignment ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11048                               {
11049                                     // same assignment
11050 
11051                                     // if it's in a vehicle
11052                                     if( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ].bAssignment == VEHICLE )
11053                                     {
11054                                           // then also compare vehicle IDs
11055                                           if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ].iVehicleId > Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].iVehicleId ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11056                                           {
11057                                                 SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11058                                           }
11059                                     }
11060                               }
11061                         }
11062                         break;
11063 
11064                   case( 2 ):
11065                         // by sleep status
11066                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < FIRST_VEHICLE; iCounterA++ )
11067                         {
11068                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11069                               {
11070                                     break;
11071                               }
11072 
11073                               if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ].fMercAsleep == TRUE ) && ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ].fMercAsleep == FALSE ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11074                               {
11075                                     SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11076                               }
11077                         }
11078                         break;
11079 
11080                   case( 3 ):
11081                         //by location
11082 
11083                         sEndSectorA = CalcLocationValueForChar( iCounter );
11084 
11085                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < FIRST_VEHICLE; iCounterA++ )
11086                         {
11087                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11088                               {
11089                                     break;
11090                               }
11091 
11092                               sEndSectorB = CalcLocationValueForChar( iCounterA );
11093 
11094                               if( ( sEndSectorB > sEndSectorA ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11095                               {
11096                                     SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11097                               }
11098                         }
11099                         break;
11100 
11101                   case( 4 ):
11102                         // by destination sector
11103                         if( GetLengthOfMercPath( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] ) == 0 )
11104                         {
11105                               sEndSectorA = 9999;
11106                         }
11107                         else
11108                         {
11109                               sEndSectorA = GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
11110                         }
11111 
11112                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < FIRST_VEHICLE; iCounterA++ )
11113                         {
11114                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11115                               {
11116                                     break;
11117                               }
11118 
11119                               if( GetLengthOfMercPath( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ] ) == 0 )
11120                               {
11121                                     sEndSectorB = 9999;
11122                               }
11123                               else
11124                               {
11125                                     sEndSectorB = GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ] );
11126                               }
11127 
11128                               if( ( sEndSectorB > sEndSectorA ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11129                               {
11130                                     SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11131                               }
11132                         }
11133                         break;
11134 
11135                   case( 5 ):
11136                         iExpiryTime = GetContractExpiryTime( &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] ) );
11137 
11138                         //by contract expiry
11139                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < FIRST_VEHICLE; iCounterA++ )
11140                         {
11141                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11142                               {
11143                                     break;
11144                               }
11145 
11146                               iExpiryTimeA = GetContractExpiryTime( &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ] ) );
11147 
11148                               if( ( iExpiryTimeA > iExpiryTime ) && ( iCounterA < iCounter ) )
11149                               {
11150                                     SwapCharactersInList( iCounter, iCounterA );
11151                               }
11152                         }
11153                         break;
11154 
11155                   default:
11156                         Assert(0);
11157                         return;
11158             }
11159       }
11160       
11161 
11162       if ( fRetainSelectedMercs )
11163       {
11164             // select nobody & reset the selected list
11165             ChangeSelectedInfoChar( -1, TRUE );
11166 
11167 
11168             // now select all the soldiers that were selected before
11169             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
11170             {
11171                   if( pSelectedSoldier[ iCounter ] )
11172                   {
11173                         for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounterA++ )
11174                         {
11175                               // is this entry even valid
11176                               if( gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].fValid == FALSE )
11177                               {
11178                                     continue;
11179                               }
11180 
11181                               // grab current soldier
11182                               pCurrentSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounterA ].usSolID ];
11183 
11184                               // check if soldier is active
11185                               if( pCurrentSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
11186                               {
11187                                     continue;
11188                               }
11189 
11190                               // this guy is selected
11191                               if( pSelectedSoldier[ iCounter ] == pCurrentSoldier )
11192                               {
11193                                     SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( ( INT8 ) iCounterA );
11194                               }
11195 
11196                               // update who the currently selected info guy is
11197                               if( pPreviousSelectedInfoChar == pCurrentSoldier )
11198                               {
11199                                     ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ( INT8 ) iCounterA, FALSE );
11200                               }
11201                         }
11202                   }
11203             }
11204       }
11205       else
11206       {
11207             // keep currently selected merc, but reset the selected list (which isn't saved/restored, that's why)
11208             ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
11209       }
11210 
11211 
11212       // reset blinking animations 
11213       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
11214 
11215       // dirty the screen parts affected
11216       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11217       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
11218 }
11219 
11220 
11221 
11222 void SwapCharactersInList( INT32 iCharA, INT32 iCharB )
11223 {
11224       UINT16 usTempSoldID;
11225 
11226       // swap
11227       usTempSoldID = gCharactersList[ iCharA ].usSolID;
11228       gCharactersList[ iCharA ].usSolID =  gCharactersList[ iCharB ].usSolID;
11229       gCharactersList[ iCharB ].usSolID = usTempSoldID;
11230 }
11231 
11232 
11233 
11234 void RemoveTeamPanelSortButtonsForMapScreen( void )
11235 {
11236       INT32 iCounter = 0;
11237 
11238       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_SORT_METHODS; iCounter++ )
11239       {
11240             UnloadButtonImage( giMapSortButtonImage[ iCounter ] );
11241             RemoveButton( giMapSortButton[ iCounter ] );
11242 
11243             giMapSortButtonImage[ iCounter ] = -1;
11244             giMapSortButton[ iCounter ] = -1;
11245       }
11246       return;
11247 }
11248 
11249 
11250 void HandleCommonGlowTimer( )
11251 {
11252       INT32 iCurrentTime = 0;
11253 
11254       // grab the current time
11255       iCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
11256 
11257       // only bother checking once flash interval has elapsed
11258       if( ( iCurrentTime - giCommonGlowBaseTime ) >= GLOW_DELAY )
11259       {
11260             // update timer so that we only run check so often
11261             giCommonGlowBaseTime = iCurrentTime;
11262 
11263             // set flag to trigger glow higlight updates
11264             gfGlowTimerExpired = TRUE;
11265       }
11266       else
11267       {
11268             gfGlowTimerExpired = FALSE;
11269       }
11270 }
11271 
11272 
11273 void HandleAssignmentsDoneAndAwaitingFurtherOrders( void )
11274 {
11275       // run through list of grunts and handle awating further orders
11276       INT32 iCounter = 0, iCurrentTime = 0;
11277       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11278 
11279 
11280       // update "nothing to do" flags if necessary
11281       if ( gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo )
11282       {
11283             ReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo();
11284       }
11285 
11286       // grab the current time
11287       iCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
11288 
11289       // only bother checking once flash interval has elapsed
11290       if( ( iCurrentTime - giFlashAssignBaseTime ) >= ASSIGNMENT_DONE_FLASH_TIME )
11291       {
11292             // update timer so that we only run check so often
11293             giFlashAssignBaseTime = iCurrentTime;
11294 
11295             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
11296             {
11297                   if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
11298                   {
11299                         break;
11300                   }
11301                   
11302                   pSoldier = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] );
11303 
11304                   // toggle and redraw if flash was left ON even though the flag is OFF
11305                   if( pSoldier->fDoneAssignmentAndNothingToDoFlag || fFlashAssignDone )
11306                   {
11307                         fFlashAssignDone = !fFlashAssignDone;
11308                         fDrawCharacterList = TRUE;
11309 
11310                         // only need to find one
11311                         break;
11312                   }
11313             }
11314       }
11315 }
11316 
11317 
11318 void DisplayIconsForMercsAsleep( void )
11319 {
11320       // run throught he list of grunts to see who is asleep and who isn't
11321       HVOBJECT hHandle;
11322       INT32 iCounter;
11323       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
11324 
11325       // if we are in inventory
11326       if( fShowInventoryFlag == TRUE )
11327       {
11328             return;
11329       }
11330 
11331       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiSleepIcon );
11332 
11333       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
11334       {
11335             if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
11336             {
11337                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
11338                   if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->fMercAsleep && CanChangeSleepStatusForSoldier( pSoldier ) )
11339                   {
11340                         // WANNE 2
11341                         //BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0, 125, ( INT16 )( Y_START+(iCounter * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) ) ) , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
11342                         BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0, SLEEP_X + 2, ( INT16 )( Y_START+(iCounter * ( Y_SIZE + 2 ) ) ) , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
11343                   }
11344             }
11345       }
11346       return;
11347 }
11348 
11349 
11350 //Kris:  Added this function to blink the email icon on top of the laptop button whenever we are in
11351 //       mapscreen and we have new email to read.
11352 void CheckForAndRenderNewMailOverlay()
11353 {
11354       if( fNewMailFlag )
11355       {
11356             if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 667 )
11357             {
11358                   // WANNE 2
11359                   if( ButtonList[ guiMapBottomExitButtons[ MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
11360                   { //button is down, so offset the icon
11361                         //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiNewMailIcons, 1, 465, 418, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
11362                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiNewMailIcons, 1, (SCREEN_WIDTH - 175), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 62), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
11363                         //InvalidateRegion( 465, 418, 480, 428 );
11364                         InvalidateRegion( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 175), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 62), (SCREEN_WIDTH - 160), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 52 ));
11365                   }
11366                   // WANNE 2
11367                   else
11368                   {     //button is up, so draw the icon normally
11369                         //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiNewMailIcons, 0, 464, 417, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
11370                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiNewMailIcons, 0, (SCREEN_WIDTH - 176), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 63), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
11371                         if( !(ButtonList[ guiMapBottomExitButtons[ MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED ) )
11372                         {
11373                               UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
11374                               UINT8  *pDestBuf;
11375                               SGPRect area = { (SCREEN_WIDTH - 177), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 63), (SCREEN_WIDTH - 163), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 55) };
11376 
11377                           pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
11378                               Blt16BPPBufferHatchRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &area );
11379                               UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
11380                         }
11381                         InvalidateRegion( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 177), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 63), (SCREEN_WIDTH - 159), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 50) );
11382 
11383                   }
11384             }
11385             else
11386             { //The blink is now off, so mark the button dirty so that it'll render next frame.
11387                   MarkAButtonDirty( guiMapBottomExitButtons[ MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP ] );
11388             }
11389       }
11390 }
11391 
11392 
11393 
11394 BOOLEAN CanToggleSelectedCharInventory( void )
11395 {
11396       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11397 
11398 
11399       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE )
11400       {
11401             return(FALSE);
11402       }
11403 
11404       // already in inventory and an item picked up?
11405       if( fShowInventoryFlag && ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) )
11406       {
11407             return(FALSE);
11408       }
11409 
11410 
11411       // nobody selected?
11412       if( bSelectedInfoChar == -1 )
11413       {
11414             return(FALSE);
11415       }
11416 
11417       // does the selected guy have inventory and can we get at it?
11418       if ( !MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( bSelectedInfoChar ) )
11419       {
11420             return(FALSE);
11421       }
11422 
11423       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
11424 
11425       // if not in inventory, and holding an item from sector inventory
11426       if( !fShowInventoryFlag && 
11427                   ( ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) || gpItemPointer || fMapInventoryItem ) &&
