11428                   ( gpItemPointerSoldier == NULL ) )
11429       {
11430             // make sure he's in that sector
11431             if ( ( pSoldier->sSectorX != sSelMapX ) ||
11432                          ( pSoldier->sSectorY != sSelMapY ) ||
11433                          ( pSoldier->bSectorZ != iCurrentMapSectorZ ) ||
11434                          pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
11435             {
11436                   return(FALSE);
11437             }
11438       }
11439 
11440 
11441       // passed!
11442       return(TRUE);
11443 }
11444 
11445 
11446 
11447 BOOLEAN MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( INT8 bCharNumber )
11448 {
11449       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11450 
11451 
11452       Assert( bCharNumber >= 0 );
11453       Assert( bCharNumber < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
11454 
11455       // invalid character slot selected?
11456       if( gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
11457       {
11458             return(FALSE);
11459       }
11460 
11461       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ];
11462 
11463       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) ||
11464                   ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
11465                         // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Commented the following line
11466                         // ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ||
11467                         // And added this instead:
11468                   ( (!gGameExternalOptions.fVehicleInventory) && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) ) ||
11469                   ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) ) ||
11470                   ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC ) ||
11471                   ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
11472             )
11473       {
11474             return(FALSE);
11475       }
11476 
11477       return( TRUE );
11478 }
11479 
11480 
11481 
11482 void CheckForInventoryModeCancellation()
11483 {
11484       if ( fShowInventoryFlag || fShowDescriptionFlag )
11485       {
11486             // can't bail while player has an item in hand...
11487             if( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR )
11488             {
11489                   return;
11490             }
11491 
11492             if ( !CanToggleSelectedCharInventory( ) )
11493             {
11494                   // get out of inventory mode if it's on!  (could have just bled below OKLIFE)
11495                   if ( fShowInventoryFlag )
11496                   {
11497                         fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
11498                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
11499                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11500                   }
11501 
11502                   // get out of inventory description if it's on!
11503                   if ( fShowDescriptionFlag )
11504                   {
11505                         DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
11506                   }
11507             }
11508       }
11509 }
11510 
11511 
11512 void ChangeSelectedMapSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
11513 {
11514       // ignore while map inventory pool is showing, or else items can be replicated, since sector inventory always applies
11515       // only to the currently selected sector!!!
11516       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
11517             return;
11518 
11519       if ( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
11520             return;
11521 
11522       if( !IsTheCursorAllowedToHighLightThisSector( sMapX, sMapY ) )
11523             return;
11524 
11525       // disallow going underground while plotting (surface) movement
11526       if ( ( bMapZ != 0 ) && ( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || fPlotForHelicopter ) )
11527             return;
11528 
11529 
11530       sSelMapX = sMapX;
11531       sSelMapY = sMapY;
11532       iCurrentMapSectorZ = bMapZ;
11533 
11534       // if going underground while in airspace mode
11535       if ( ( bMapZ > 0 ) && ( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE ) )
11536       {
11537             // turn off airspace mode
11538             ToggleAirspaceMode( );
11539       }
11540 
11541       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
11542       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
11543 
11544       // also need this, to update the text coloring of mercs in this sector
11545       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11546 }
11547 
11548 
11549 
11550 BOOLEAN CanChangeDestinationForCharSlot( INT8 bCharNumber, BOOLEAN fShowErrorMessage )
11551 {
11552       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11553       INT8 bErrorNumber = -1;
11554 
11555 
11556       if ( bCharNumber == -1 )
11557             return( FALSE );
11558 
11559       if ( gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
11560             return (FALSE);
11561 
11562 
11563       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ];
11564 
11565       // valid soldier?
11566       Assert( pSoldier );
11567       Assert( pSoldier->bActive );
11568 
11569 
11570       if ( CanEntireMovementGroupMercIsInMove( pSoldier, &bErrorNumber ) )
11571       {
11572             return( TRUE );
11573       }
11574       else
11575       {
11576             // function may fail without returning any specific error # (-1).
11577             // if it gave us the # of an error msg, and we were told to display it
11578             if ( ( bErrorNumber != -1 ) && fShowErrorMessage )
11579             {
11580                   ReportMapScreenMovementError( bErrorNumber );
11581             }
11582 
11583             return( FALSE );
11584       }
11585 }
11586 
11587 
11588 
11589 BOOLEAN CanExtendContractForCharSlot( INT8 bCharNumber )
11590 {
11591       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11592 
11593 
11594       if ( bCharNumber == -1 )
11595             return( FALSE );
11596 
11597       if ( gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
11598             return (FALSE);
11599 
11600       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ];
11601 
11602       // valid soldier?
11603       Assert( pSoldier );
11604       Assert( pSoldier->bActive );
11605 
11606       // if a vehicle, in transit, or a POW
11607       if( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ||
11608                   ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) ||
11609                   ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
11610       {
11611             // can't extend contracts at this time
11612             return (FALSE);
11613       }
11614 
11615       // mercs below OKLIFE, M.E.R.C. mercs, EPCs, and the Robot use the Contract menu so they can be DISMISSED/ABANDONED!
11616 
11617       // everything OK
11618       return( TRUE );
11619 }
11620 
11621 
11622 BOOLEAN CanChangeSleepStatusForCharSlot( INT8 bCharNumber )
11623 {
11624       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11625 
11626       if ( bCharNumber == -1 )
11627             return( FALSE );
11628 
11629       if ( gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE )
11630             return (FALSE);
11631 
11632 
11633       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ];
11634 
11635       return( CanChangeSleepStatusForSoldier( pSoldier ) );
11636 }
11637 
11638 
11639 BOOLEAN CanChangeSleepStatusForSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11640 {
11641       // valid soldier?
11642       Assert( pSoldier );
11643       Assert( pSoldier->bActive );
11644 
11645       // if a vehicle, robot, in transit, or a POW
11646       if( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) ||
11647                   ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
11648       {
11649             // can't change the sleep status of such mercs
11650             return ( FALSE );
11651       }
11652 
11653       // if dead
11654       if( ( pSoldier->bLife <= 0 ) || ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
11655       {
11656             return ( FALSE );
11657       }
11658 
11659       // this merc MAY be able to sleep/wake up - we'll allow player to click and find out
11660       return( TRUE );
11661 }
11662 
11663 
11664 void ChangeMapScreenMaskCursor( UINT16 usCursor )
11665 {
11666       MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( usCursor );
11667       MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMapScreenMaskRegion, usCursor );
11668 
11669       if ( usCursor == CURSOR_CHECKMARK )
11670             fCheckCursorWasSet = TRUE;
11671       else
11672             fCheckCursorWasSet = FALSE;
11673 
11674       if ( usCursor == CURSOR_NORMAL )
11675       {
11676     if ( !InItemStackPopup( ) )
11677     {
11678               // cancel mouse restriction
11679               FreeMouseCursor();
11680     }
11681       }
11682       else
11683       {
11684             // restrict mouse cursor to the map area
11685             RestrictMouseCursor( &MapScreenRect );
11686       }
11687 }
11688 
11689 
11690 
11691 void CancelOrShortenPlottedPath( void )
11692 {
11693       INT16 sMapX, sMapY;
11694       UINT32 uiReturnValue;
11695 
11696 
11697       GetMouseMapXY(&sMapX, &sMapY);
11698 
11699 /*
11700       // translate zoom in to zoom out coords
11701       if(fZoomFlag)
11702       {
11703             sMapX=(UINT16)iZoomX/MAP_GRID_X+sMapX;
11704             sMapX=sMapX/2;
11705             sMapY=(UINT16)iZoomY/MAP_GRID_Y+sMapY;
11706             sMapY=sMapY/2;
11707        }
11708 */
11709 
11710       // check if we are in aircraft mode
11711       if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
11712       {
11713             // check for helicopter path being plotted
11714             if( !fPlotForHelicopter )
11715                   return;
11716 
11717             // if player can't redirect it
11718             if ( CanHelicopterFly( ) == FALSE )
11719             {
11720                   // explain & ignore
11721                   ExplainWhySkyriderCantFly();
11722                   return;
11723             }
11724 
11725 
11726             // try to delete portion of path AFTER the current sector for the helicopter
11727             uiReturnValue = ClearPathAfterThisSectorForHelicopter( sMapX, sMapY );
11728       }
11729       else
11730       {
11731             // check for character path being plotted
11732             if( bSelectedDestChar == -1 )
11733                   return;
11734 
11735             // try to delete portion of path AFTER the current sector for the helicopter
11736             uiReturnValue = ClearPathAfterThisSectorForCharacter( &Menptr[gCharactersList[bSelectedDestChar].usSolID], sMapX, sMapY );
11737       }
11738 
11739 
11740       switch ( uiReturnValue )
11741       {
11742             case ABORT_PLOTTING:
11743                   AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
11744                   break;
11745 
11746             case PATH_CLEARED:      // movement was canceled
11747                   // message was already issued when path was cleared
11748                   DestinationPlottingCompleted();
11749                   break;
11750 
11751             case PATH_SHORTENED:    // route was shortened but isn't completely gone
11752                   // display "route shortened" message
11753                   MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pMapPlotStrings[ 4 ] );
11754                   break;
11755 
11756             default:
11757                   Assert( FALSE );
11758                   break;
11759       }
11760 
11761       // this triggers the path node animation to reset itself back to the first node
11762       fDeletedNode = TRUE;
11763 
11764       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
11765 
11766       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11767       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;          // to update ETAs if path reversed or shortened
11768 }
11769 
11770 
11771 BOOLEAN HandleCtrlOrShiftInTeamPanel( INT8 bCharNumber )
11772 {
11773       // check if shift or ctrl held down, if so, set values in list
11774       if (_KeyDown(CTRL))
11775       {
11776             ToggleEntryInSelectedList( bCharNumber );
11777 
11778             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11779             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
11780 
11781             return( TRUE);
11782       }
11783       else if( _KeyDown(SHIFT) )
11784       {
11785             // build a list from the bSelectedInfoChar To here, reset everyone
11786 
11787             //empty the list
11788             ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
11789             // rebuild the list
11790             BuildSelectedListFromAToB( bSelectedInfoChar, bCharNumber );
11791 
11792             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11793             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
11794 
11795             return( TRUE );
11796       }
11797 
11798       return( FALSE );
11799 }
11800 
11801 
11802 INT32 GetContractExpiryTime( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11803 {
11804       if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC ) || ( pSoldier->ubProfile == SLAY ) )
11805       {
11806             return ( pSoldier->iEndofContractTime );
11807       }
11808       else
11809       {
11810             // never - really high number
11811             return ( 999999 );
11812       }
11813 }
11814 
11815 
11816 
11817 void ChangeSelectedInfoChar( INT8 bCharNumber, BOOLEAN fResetSelectedList )
11818 {
11819       Assert( ( bCharNumber >= -1 ) && ( bCharNumber < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT ) );
11820 
11821       if( ( bCharNumber != -1 ) && ( gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid == FALSE ) )
11822             return;
11823 
11824 
11825       // if holding an item
11826       if ( ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) || gpItemPointer || fMapInventoryItem )
11827       {
11828             // make sure we can give it to this guy, otherwise don't allow the change
11829             if ( !MapscreenCanPassItemToCharNum( bCharNumber ) )
11830             {
11831                   return;
11832             }
11833       }
11834 
11835 
11836       if ( fResetSelectedList )
11837       {
11838             // reset selections of all listed characters.  Do this even if this guy is already selected.
11839             // NOTE: this keeps the currently selected info char selected
11840             ResetSelectedListForMapScreen( );
11841       }
11842 
11843 
11844       // if this is really a change
11845       if ( bSelectedInfoChar != bCharNumber )
11846       {
11847             // if resetting, and another guy was selected
11848             if ( fResetSelectedList && ( bSelectedInfoChar != -1 ) )
11849             {
11850                   // deselect previously selected character
11851                   ResetEntryForSelectedList( bSelectedInfoChar );
11852             }
11853 
11854             bSelectedInfoChar = bCharNumber;
11855 
11856             if ( bCharNumber != -1 )
11857             {
11858                   // the selected guy must always be ON in the list of selected chars
11859                   SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( bCharNumber );
11860             }
11861 
11862             // if we're in the inventory panel
11863             if ( fShowInventoryFlag )
11864             {
11865                   // and we're changing to nobody or a guy whose inventory can't be accessed
11866                   if ( ( bCharNumber == -1 ) || !MapCharacterHasAccessibleInventory( bCharNumber ) )
11867                   {
11868                         // then get out of inventory mode
11869                         fShowInventoryFlag = FALSE;
11870                   }
11871             }
11872 
11873             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
11874 
11875             // if showing sector inventory
11876             if ( fShowMapInventoryPool )
11877             {
11878                   // redraw right side to update item hatches
11879                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
11880             }
11881       }
11882 
11883       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
11884 }
11885 
11886 
11887 
11888 void CopyPathToAllSelectedCharacters( PathStPtr pPath )
11889 {
11890       INT32 iCounter = 0;
11891       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11892 
11893 
11894       // run through list and copy paths for each selected character
11895       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
11896       {
11897             if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
11898             {
11899                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
11900 
11901                   // skip itself!
11902                   if ( GetSoldierMercPathPtr( pSoldier ) != pPath )
11903                   {
11904                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
11905                         {
11906                               pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].pMercPath = CopyPaths( pPath, pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].pMercPath );
11907                         }
11908                         else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
11909                         {
11910                               pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].pMercPath = CopyPaths( pPath, pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].pMercPath );
11911                         }
11912                         else
11913                         {
11914                               pSoldier->pMercPath = CopyPaths( pPath, pSoldier->pMercPath );
11915                         }
11916 
11917                         // don't use CopyPathToCharactersSquadIfInOne(), it will whack the original pPath by replacing that merc's path!
11918                   }
11919             }
11920       }
11921 }
11922 
11923 
11924 
11925 void CancelPathsOfAllSelectedCharacters()
11926 {
11927       INT8 bCounter = 0;
11928       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
11929       BOOLEAN fSkyriderMsgShown = FALSE;
11930 
11931 
11932       // cancel destination for the clicked and ALL other valid & selected characters with a route set
11933       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; bCounter++ )
11934       {
11935             // if we've clicked on a selected valid character
11936             if( ( gCharactersList[ bCounter ].fValid == TRUE ) && IsEntryInSelectedListSet( bCounter ) )
11937             {
11938                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCounter ].usSolID ];
11939 
11940                   // and he has a route set
11941                   if ( GetLengthOfMercPath( pSoldier ) > 0 )
11942                   {
11943                         // if he's in the chopper, but player can't redirect it
11944                         if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId ) && ( CanHelicopterFly( ) == FALSE ) )
11945                         {
11946                               if ( !fSkyriderMsgShown )
11947                               {
11948                                     // explain
11949                                     ExplainWhySkyriderCantFly();
11950                                     fSkyriderMsgShown = TRUE;
11951                               }
11952 
11953                               // don't cancel, ignore
11954                               continue;
11955                         }
11956 
11957 
11958                         // cancel the entire path (also clears vehicles for any passengers selected, and handles reversing directions)
11959                         if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
11960                         {
11961                               CancelPathForVehicle( &( pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ] ), FALSE );
11962                         }
11963                         else
11964                         {
11965                               CancelPathForCharacter( pSoldier );
11966                         }
11967                   }
11968             }
11969       }
11970 }
11971 
11972 
11973 
11974 void ConvertMinTimeToETADayHourMinString( UINT32 uiTimeInMin, STR16 sString )
11975 {
11976       UINT32 uiDay, uiHour, uiMin;
11977 
11978       uiDay  = ( uiTimeInMin / NUM_MIN_IN_DAY );
11979       uiHour = ( uiTimeInMin - ( uiDay * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) ) / NUM_MIN_IN_HOUR;
11980       uiMin  = uiTimeInMin - ( ( uiDay * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) + ( uiHour * NUM_MIN_IN_HOUR ) );
11981 
11982       // there ain't enough room to show both the day and ETA: and without ETA it's confused as the current time
11983 //    swprintf( sString, L"%s %s %d, %02d:%02d", pEtaString[ 0 ], pDayStrings[ 0 ], uiDay, uiHour, uiMin );
11984 //    swprintf( sString, L"%s %d, %02d:%02d", pDayStrings[ 0 ], uiDay, uiHour, uiMin );
11985       swprintf( sString, L"%s %02d:%02d", pEtaString[ 0 ], uiHour, uiMin );
11986 }
11987 
11988 
11989 
11990 INT32 GetGroundTravelTimeOfCharacter( INT8 bCharNumber )
11991 {
11992       INT32 iTravelTime = 0;
11993 
11994       if( bCharNumber == -1 )
11995             return(0);
11996 
11997       if ( !gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid )
11998             return(0);
11999 
12000       // get travel time for the last path segment (stored in pTempCharacterPath)
12001       iTravelTime = GetPathTravelTimeDuringPlotting( pTempCharacterPath );
12002 
12003       // add travel time for any prior path segments (stored in the selected character's mercpath, but waypoints aren't built)
12004       iTravelTime += GetPathTravelTimeDuringPlotting( GetSoldierMercPathPtr( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ] ) );
12005 
12006       return( iTravelTime );
12007 }
12008 
12009 
12010 
12011 INT16 CalcLocationValueForChar( INT32 iCounter )
12012 {
12013       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12014       INT16 sLocValue = 0;
12015 
12016       Assert( iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
12017 
12018       if( gCharactersList[ iCounter ].fValid == FALSE )
12019             return( sLocValue );
12020 
12021       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
12022 
12023       // don't reveal location of POWs!
12024       if( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
12025       {
12026             sLocValue = SECTOR( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY );
12027             // underground: add 1000 per sublevel
12028             sLocValue += 1000 * ( pSoldier->bSectorZ );
12029       }
12030 
12031       return( sLocValue );
12032 }
12033 
12034 
12035 
12036 void CancelChangeArrivalSectorMode( )
12037 {                                         
12038       // "put him in change arrival sector" mode
12039       gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode = FALSE;
12040 
12041       // change the cursor to that mode
12042       SetUpCursorForStrategicMap();
12043 
12044       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
12045 }
12046 
12047 
12048 
12049 
12050 void MakeMapModesSuitableForDestPlotting( INT8 bCharNumber )
12051 {
12052       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12053 
12054 
12055       if( gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].fValid == TRUE )
12056       {
12057             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCharNumber ].usSolID ];
12058 
12059             CancelSectorInventoryDisplayIfOn( FALSE );
12060 
12061             TurnOnShowTeamsMode( );
12062 
12063             if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId ) )
12064             {
12065                   if ( fShowAircraftFlag == FALSE )
12066                   {
12067                         // turn on airspace mode automatically
12068                         ToggleAirspaceMode();
12069                   }
12070             }
12071             else
12072             {
12073                   if ( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
12074                   {
12075                         // turn off airspace mode automatically
12076                         ToggleAirspaceMode();
12077                   }
12078             }
12079 
12080             // if viewing a different sublevel
12081             if ( iCurrentMapSectorZ != pSoldier->bSectorZ )
12082             {
12083                   // switch to that merc's sublevel
12084                   JumpToLevel( pSoldier->bSectorZ );
12085             }
12086       }
12087 }
12088 
12089 
12090 
12091 BOOLEAN AnyMovableCharsInOrBetweenThisSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
12092 {
12093       INT32 iFirstId = 0, iLastId = 0;
12094       INT32 iCounter = 0;
12095       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12096 
12097 
12098       // to speed it up a little?
12099       iFirstId = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
12100       iLastId = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
12101 
12102       for( iCounter = iFirstId; iCounter <= iLastId; iCounter++ )
12103       {
12104             // get the soldier
12105             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
12106 
12107             // is the soldier active
12108             if( pSoldier->bActive == FALSE )
12109             {
12110                   continue;
12111             }
12112 
12113             // POWs, dead guys, guys in transit can't move
12114             if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) ||
12115                          ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
12116                          ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) ||
12117                          ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 ) )
12118             {
12119                   continue;
12120             }
12121 
12122             // don't count mercs aboard Skyrider
12123             if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId ) )
12124             {
12125                   continue;
12126             }
12127 
12128             // don't count vehicles - in order for them to move, somebody must be in the sector with them
12129             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
12130             {
12131                   continue;
12132             }
12133 
12134 
12135             // is he here?
12136             if( ( pSoldier->sSectorX == sSectorX ) && ( pSoldier->sSectorY == sSectorY ) && ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == bSectorZ ) )
12137             {
12138                   // NOTE that we consider mercs between sectors, mercs < OKLIFE, and sleeping mercs to be "movable".
12139                   // This lets CanCharacterMoveInStrategic() itself report the appropriate error message when character is clicked
12140                   return( TRUE );
12141             }
12142       }
12143 
12144 
12145       return( FALSE );
12146 }
12147 
12148 
12149 
12150 BOOLEAN RequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination( void )
12151 {
12152       // should we allow it?
12153       if( CanHelicopterFly( ) == TRUE )
12154       {
12155             // if not warned already, and chopper empty, but mercs are in this sector
12156             if ( !gfSkyriderEmptyHelpGiven &&
12157                    ( GetNumberOfPassengersInHelicopter() == 0 ) &&
12158                    ( PlayerMercsInHelicopterSector() > 0 ) )
12159             {
12160                   DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pSkyriderText[ 6 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
12161                   gfSkyriderEmptyHelpGiven = TRUE;
12162                   return( FALSE );
12163             }
12164 
12165             // say Yo!
12166             SkyRiderTalk( SKYRIDER_SAYS_HI );
12167 
12168             // start plotting helicopter movement
12169             fPlotForHelicopter = TRUE;
12170 
12171             // change cursor to the helicopter
12172             SetUpCursorForStrategicMap();
12173 
12174             // remember the helicopter's current path so we can restore it if need be
12175             gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath = CopyPaths( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath, gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath );
12176 
12177             // affects Skyrider's dialogue
12178             SetFactTrue( FACT_SKYRIDER_USED_IN_MAPSCREEN );
12179 
12180             return( TRUE );
12181       }
12182       else // not allowed to reroute the chopper right now
12183       {
12184             // tell player why not
12185             ExplainWhySkyriderCantFly();
12186 
12187             return( FALSE );
12188       }
12189 }
12190 
12191 
12192 
12193 void ExplainWhySkyriderCantFly( void )
12194 {
12195       // do we owe him money?
12196       if( gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance < 0 )
12197       {
12198             // overdue cash
12199             SkyRiderTalk( OWED_MONEY_TO_SKYRIDER );
12200             return;
12201       }
12202 
12203       // is he returning to base?
12204       if( fHeliReturnStraightToBase )
12205       {
12206             // returning to base
12207             SkyRiderTalk( RETURN_TO_BASE );
12208             return;
12209       }
12210 
12211       // grounded by enemies in sector?
12212       if ( CanHelicopterTakeOff() == FALSE )
12213       {
12214             SkyRiderTalk( CHOPPER_NOT_ACCESSIBLE );
12215 //          DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, pSkyriderText[ 4 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
12216             return;
12217       }
12218 
12219       // Drassen too disloyal to wanna help player?
12220       if ( CheckFact( FACT_LOYALTY_LOW, SKYRIDER ) )
12221       {
12222             SkyRiderTalk( DOESNT_WANT_TO_FLY );
12223             return;
12224       }
12225 
12226       // no explainable reason
12227 }
12228 
12229 
12230 UINT8 PlayerMercsInHelicopterSector( void )
12231 {
12232       GROUP *pGroup = NULL;
12233 
12234       Assert( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1);
12235       pGroup = GetGroup( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
12236 
12237       if ( pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
12238       {
12239             return( 0 );
12240       }
12241 
12242       return( PlayerMercsInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, 0 ) );
12243 }
12244 
12245 
12246 
12247 void HandleNewDestConfirmation( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
12248 {
12249       UINT8 ubCurrentProgress;
12250 
12251 
12252       // if moving the chopper itself, or moving a character aboard the chopper
12253       if( fPlotForHelicopter )
12254       {
12255             // if there are no enemies in destination sector, or we don't know
12256             if ( ( NumEnemiesInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == 0 ) ||
12257                          (    WhatPlayerKnowsAboutEnemiesInSector( sMapX, sMapY ) == KNOWS_NOTHING ) )
12258             {
12259                   // no problem
12260                   
12261                   // get current player progress
12262                   ubCurrentProgress = CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage();
12263 
12264                   // if we're doing a lot better than last time he said anything
12265                   if ( ( ubCurrentProgress > gubPlayerProgressSkyriderLastCommentedOn ) &&
12266                                ( ( ubCurrentProgress - gubPlayerProgressSkyriderLastCommentedOn ) >= MIN_PROGRESS_FOR_SKYRIDER_QUOTE_DOING_WELL ) )
12267                   {
12268                         // kicking ass!
12269                         SkyRiderTalk( THINGS_ARE_GOING_WELL );
12270 
12271                         gubPlayerProgressSkyriderLastCommentedOn = ubCurrentProgress;
12272                   }
12273                   // if we're doing noticably worse than last time he said anything
12274                   else if ( ( ubCurrentProgress < gubPlayerProgressSkyriderLastCommentedOn ) &&
12275                                ( ( gubPlayerProgressSkyriderLastCommentedOn - ubCurrentProgress ) >= MIN_REGRESS_FOR_SKYRIDER_QUOTE_DOING_BADLY ) )
12276                   {
12277                         // sucking rocks!
12278                         SkyRiderTalk( THINGS_ARE_GOING_BADLY );
12279 
12280                         gubPlayerProgressSkyriderLastCommentedOn = ubCurrentProgress;
12281                   }
12282                   else
12283                   {
12284                         // ordinary confirmation quote
12285                         SkyRiderTalk( CONFIRM_DESTINATION );
12286                   }
12287             }
12288             else
12289             {
12290                   // ok, but... you know there are enemies there...
12291                   SkyRiderTalk( BELIEVED_ENEMY_SECTOR );
12292             }
12293       }
12294       else
12295       {
12296             RandomAwakeSelectedMercConfirmsStrategicMove( );
12297 
12298             // tell player the route was CONFIRMED
12299             // NOTE: We don't this this for the helicopter any more, since it clashes with Skyrider's own confirmation msg
12300             MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pMapPlotStrings[ 1 ] );
12301       }
12302 
12303 
12304       // wake up anybody who needs to be awake to travel
12305       WakeUpAnySleepingSelectedMercsOnFootOrDriving();
12306 }
12307 
12308 
12309 
12310 void RandomAwakeSelectedMercConfirmsStrategicMove( void )
12311 {
12312       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12313       INT32 iCounter;
12314       UINT8 ubSelectedMercID[ 20 ];
12315       UINT8 ubSelectedMercIndex[ 20 ];
12316       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
12317       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
12318 
12319 
12320       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
12321       {
12322             if( ( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE ) )
12323             {
12324                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
12325 
12326                   if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) &&
12327                                     !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
12328                   {
12329                         ubSelectedMercID[ ubNumMercs ] = pSoldier->ubID;
12330                         ubSelectedMercIndex[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)iCounter;
12331 
12332                         ubNumMercs++;
12333                   }
12334             }
12335       }
12336 
12337       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
12338       {
12339             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
12340 
12341             // select that merc so that when he speaks we're showing his portrait and not someone else
12342             ChangeSelectedInfoChar( ubSelectedMercIndex[ ubChosenMerc ], FALSE );
12343 
12344             DoMercBattleSound( MercPtrs[ ubSelectedMercID[ ubChosenMerc ] ], ( UINT8 ) ( Random(2) ? BATTLE_SOUND_OK1 : BATTLE_SOUND_OK2 ) );
12345             //TacticalCharacterDialogue( MercPtrs[ ubSelectedMercID[ ubChosenMerc ] ], ubQuoteNum );
12346       }
12347 }
12348 
12349 
12350 void DestinationPlottingCompleted( void )
12351 {
12352       // clear previous paths for selected characters and helicopter
12353       ClearPreviousPaths();
12354 
12355       fPlotForHelicopter = FALSE;
12356       bSelectedDestChar = - 1;
12357       giDestHighLine = -1;
12358 
12359       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
12360 
12361       // reset cursor
12362       SetUpCursorForStrategicMap( );
12363 
12364       fJustFinishedPlotting = TRUE;
12365       fEndPlotting = TRUE;
12366 }
12367 
12368 
12369 
12370 void HandleMilitiaRedistributionClick( void )
12371 {
12372       INT8 bTownId;
12373       BOOLEAN fTownStillHidden;
12374       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
12375 
12376 
12377       // if on the surface
12378       if ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 )
12379       {
12380             bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY );
12381             fTownStillHidden = ( ( bTownId == TIXA ) && !fFoundTixa ) || ( ( bTownId == ORTA ) && !fFoundOrta );
12382 
12383             if( ( bTownId != BLANK_SECTOR ) && !fTownStillHidden )
12384             {
12385                   if ( MilitiaTrainingAllowedInSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
12386                   {
12387                         if( fShowTownInfo == TRUE )
12388                         {
12389                               fShowTownInfo = FALSE;
12390                         }
12391                         fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
12392 
12393                         // check if there's combat in any of the town's sectors
12394                         if ( CanRedistributeMilitiaInSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, bTownId ) )
12395                         {
12396                               // Nope, ok, set selected militia town
12397                               sSelectedMilitiaTown = bTownId;
12398                         }
12399                         else
12400                         {
12401                               // can't redistribute militia during combat!
12402                               DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pMilitiaString[ 2 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
12403                         }
12404                   }
12405                   else
12406                   {
12407                         // can't have militia in this town
12408                         swprintf( sString, pMapErrorString[ 31 ], pTownNames [ bTownId ] );
12409                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
12410                   }
12411             }
12412             else if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, 0 ) && fSamSiteFound[ GetSAMIdFromSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, 0 ) ] )
12413             {
12414                   // can't move militia around sam sites
12415                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pMapErrorString[ 30 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
12416             }
12417       }
12418 }
12419 
12420 
12421 
12422 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
12423 void DumpSectorDifficultyInfo( void )
12424 {
12425       // NOTE: This operates on the selected map sector!
12426       CHAR16 wSectorName[ 128 ];
12427 
12428       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Playing Difficulty: %s", gzGIOScreenText[ GIO_DIF_LEVEL_TEXT + gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel ] );
12429       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Highest Progress (0-100) = %d%%", HighestPlayerProgressPercentage() );
12430       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Player Kills = %d", gStrategicStatus.usPlayerKills );
12431 
12432       GetSectorIDString( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 ) iCurrentMapSectorZ, wSectorName, TRUE );
12433       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"SECTOR: %s", wSectorName );
12434 
12435       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Pyth. Distance From Meduna (0-20) = %d", GetPythDistanceFromPalace( sSelMapX, sSelMapY ) );
12436 
12437       if ( ( gWorldSectorX == sSelMapX ) && ( gWorldSectorY == sSelMapY ) && ( gbWorldSectorZ == iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
12438       {
12439             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Enemy Difficulty Factor (0 to 100) = %d%%", CalcDifficultyModifier( SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY ) );
12440             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Avg Regular Enemy Exp. Level (2-6) = %d", 2 + ( CalcDifficultyModifier( SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY ) / 20 ) );
12441       }
12442       else
12443       {
12444             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"--Must load sector to calculate difficulty--" );
12445       }
12446 }
12447 #endif
12448 
12449 
12450 
12451 void StartChangeSectorArrivalMode( void )
12452 {
12453       // "put him in change arrival sector" mode
12454       gfInChangeArrivalSectorMode = TRUE;
12455 
12456       // redraw map with bullseye removed
12457       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
12458 
12459       // change the cursor to that mode
12460       SetUpCursorForStrategicMap();
12461 
12462       // give instructions as overlay message
12463       MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pBullseyeStrings[ 0 ] );
12464 }
12465 
12466 
12467 
12468 BOOLEAN CanMoveBullseyeAndClickedOnIt( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
12469 {
12470       // if in airspace mode, and not plotting paths
12471       if( ( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE ) && ( bSelectedDestChar == -1 ) && ( fPlotForHelicopter == FALSE ) )
12472       {
12473             // don't allow moving bullseye until after initial arrival
12474             if ( gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart == FALSE )
12475             {
12476                   // if he clicked on the bullseye, and we're on the surface level
12477                   if ( ( sMapX == gsMercArriveSectorX ) && ( sMapY == gsMercArriveSectorY ) && ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == 0 ) )
12478                   {
12479                         return( TRUE );
12480                   }
12481             }
12482       }
12483 
12484       return( FALSE );
12485 }
12486 
12487 
12488 
12489 void CreateBullsEyeOrChopperSelectionPopup( void )
12490 {
12491       wcscpy( gzUserDefinedButton1, pHelicopterEtaStrings[ 8 ] );
12492       wcscpy( gzUserDefinedButton2, pHelicopterEtaStrings[ 9 ] );
12493 
12494       // do a BULLSEYE/CHOPPER message box
12495       DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pHelicopterEtaStrings[ 7 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_GENERIC, BullsEyeOrChopperSelectionPopupCallback );
12496 }
12497 
12498 
12499 void BullsEyeOrChopperSelectionPopupCallback( UINT8 ubExitValue )
12500 {
12501       // button 1 pressed?
12502       if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
12503       {
12504             // chose chopper
12505             // have to set a flag 'cause first call to RequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination() triggers another msg box & won't work
12506             gfRequestGiveSkyriderNewDestination = TRUE;
12507       }
12508       // button 2 pressed?
12509       else if( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO )
12510       {
12511             // chose bullseye
12512             StartChangeSectorArrivalMode();
12513       }
12514 }
12515 
12516 
12517 // wake up anybody who needs to be awake to travel
12518 void WakeUpAnySleepingSelectedMercsOnFootOrDriving( void )
12519 {
12520       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12521       INT32 iCounter;
12522       BOOLEAN fSuccess = FALSE;
12523 
12524 
12525       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
12526       {
12527             if( ( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE ) )
12528             {
12529                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
12530 
12531                   // if asleep
12532                   if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
12533                   {
12534                         // and on foot or driving
12535                         if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY ) ||
12536                                      ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && SoldierMustDriveVehicle( pSoldier, pSoldier->iVehicleId, FALSE ) ) )
12537                         {
12538                               // we should be guaranteed that he CAN wake up to get this far, so report errors, but don't force it
12539                               fSuccess = SetMercAwake( pSoldier, TRUE, FALSE );
12540                               Assert( fSuccess );
12541                         }
12542                   }
12543             }
12544       }
12545 }
12546 
12547 void HandlePostAutoresolveMessages()
12548 {
12549       //KM: Autoresolve sets up this global sector value whenever the enemy gains control of a sector.  As soon as 
12550       //we leave autoresolve and enter mapscreen, then this gets called and handles ownership change for the sector.
12551       //It also brings up a dialog stating to the player what happened, however, the internals of those functions
12552       //breaks autoresolve and the game crashes after autoresolve is finished.  The value doesn't need to be saved.
12553       //
12554       //An additional case is when creatures kill all opposition in the sector.  For each surviving monster, civilians 
12555       //are "virtually" murdered and loyalty hits will be processed.
12556       if( gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters >= 1 )
12557       {
12558             AdjustLoyaltyForCivsEatenByMonsters( (UINT8)SECTORX( gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID ), 
12559                                                                                                                          (UINT8)SECTORY( gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID ),
12560                                                                                                                          (UINT8)gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters );
12561             gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters = -2;
12562       }
12563       else if( gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters == -2 )
12564       {
12565             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
12566             gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters = -1;
12567             gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = -1;
12568       }
12569       else if( gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID >= 0 )
12570       { //bring up the dialog box
12571             SetThisSectorAsEnemyControlled( (UINT8)SECTORX( gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID ), (UINT8)SECTORY( gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID ), 0, TRUE );
12572             gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = -2;
12573       }
12574       else if( gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID == -2 )
12575       { //dirty the mapscreen after the dialog box goes away.  
12576             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
12577             gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = -1;
12578       }
12579       else if( gbMilitiaPromotions )
12580       {
12581             UINT16 str[ 512 ];
12582             BuildMilitiaPromotionsString( str );
12583             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
12584       }
12585 }
12586 
12587 
12588 void GetMapscreenMercAssignmentString( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, wchar_t sString[] )
12589 {
12590       if( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
12591       {
12592             wcscpy(sString, pAssignmentStrings[ pSoldier->bAssignment ] );
12593       }
12594       else
12595       {
12596             wcscpy( sString, pShortVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].ubVehicleType ] );
12597       }
12598 }
12599 
12600 
12601 void GetMapscreenMercLocationString( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, wchar_t sString[] )
12602 {
12603       wchar_t pTempString[32];
12604 
12605 
12606       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
12607       {
12608             // show blank
12609             wcscpy( sString, L"--" );
12610       }
12611       else
12612       {
12613             if( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
12614             {
12615                   // POW - location unknown
12616                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPOWStrings[ 1 ] );
12617             }
12618             else
12619             {
12620                   swprintf( pTempString, L"%s%s%s",
12621                                     pMapVertIndex[ pSoldier->sSectorY ], pMapHortIndex[ pSoldier->sSectorX ], pMapDepthIndex[ pSoldier->bSectorZ ] );
12622 
12623                   if ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
12624                   {
12625                         // put brackets around it when he's between sectors!        
12626                         swprintf( sString, L"(%s)", pTempString );
12627                   }
12628                   else
12629                   {
12630                         wcscpy( sString, pTempString );
12631                   }
12632             }
12633       }
12634 }
12635 
12636 
12637 void GetMapscreenMercDestinationString( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, wchar_t sString[] )
12638 {
12639       INT32 iSectorX, iSectorY;
12640       INT16 sSector=0;
12641       GROUP *pGroup = NULL;
12642 
12643 
12644       // by default, show nothing
12645       wcscpy( sString, L"" );
12646 
12647       // if dead or POW - has no destination (no longer part of a group, for that matter)
12648       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) ||
12649                   ( pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
12650                   ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 ) )
12651       {
12652             return;
12653       }
12654 
12655       if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
12656       {
12657             // show the sector he'll be arriving in
12658             iSectorX = gsMercArriveSectorX;
12659             iSectorY = gsMercArriveSectorY;
12660       }
12661       else
12662       {
12663             // if he's going somewhere
12664             if ( GetLengthOfMercPath( pSoldier ) > 0 )
12665             {
12666                   sSector = GetLastSectorIdInCharactersPath( pSoldier );
12667                   // convert
12668                   iSectorX = sSector % MAP_WORLD_X;
12669                   iSectorY = sSector / MAP_WORLD_Y;
12670             }
12671             else // no movement path is set...
12672             {
12673                   if ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
12674                   {
12675                         // he must be returning to his previous (reversed so as to be the next) sector, so show that as his destination
12676                         // individual soldiers don't store previous/next sector coordinates, must go to his group for that
12677                         pGroup = GetGroup( GetSoldierGroupId( pSoldier ) );
12678                         Assert( pGroup );
12679                         iSectorX = pGroup->ubNextX;
12680                         iSectorY = pGroup->ubNextY;
12681                   }
12682                   else
12683                   {
12684                         // show nothing
12685                         return;
12686                   }
12687             }
12688       }
12689 
12690 
12691       swprintf( sString, L"%s%s", pMapVertIndex[ iSectorY ], pMapHortIndex[ iSectorX ] );
12692 }
12693 
12694 
12695 void GetMapscreenMercDepartureString( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, wchar_t sString[], UINT8 *pubFontColor )
12696 {
12697       INT32 iMinsRemaining = 0;
12698       INT32 iDaysRemaining = 0;
12699       INT32 iHoursRemaining = 0;
12700 
12701 
12702       if( ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC && pSoldier->ubProfile != SLAY ) || pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
12703       {
12704             swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
12705       }
12706       else
12707       {
12708             iMinsRemaining = pSoldier->iEndofContractTime - GetWorldTotalMin();
12709 
12710             //if the merc is in transit
12711             if( pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
12712             {
12713                   //and if the time left on the cotract is greater then the contract time
12714                   if( iMinsRemaining > (INT32)( pSoldier->iTotalContractLength * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY ) )
12715                   {
12716                         iMinsRemaining = ( pSoldier->iTotalContractLength * NUM_MIN_IN_DAY );
12717                   }
12718             }
12719 
12720             // if 3 or more days remain
12721             if( iMinsRemaining >= MAP_TIME_UNDER_THIS_DISPLAY_AS_HOURS )
12722             {
12723                   iDaysRemaining = iMinsRemaining / (24*60);
12724 
12725                   *pubFontColor = FONT_LTGREEN;
12726 
12727                   swprintf(sString, L"%d%s", iDaysRemaining, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ] ); 
12728             }
12729             else  // less than 3 days
12730             {
12731                   if( iMinsRemaining > 5 )
12732                   {
12733                         iHoursRemaining = ( iMinsRemaining + 59 ) / 60;
12734                   }
12735                   else
12736                   {
12737                         iHoursRemaining = 0;
12738                   }
12739 
12740              // last 3 days is Red, last 4 hours start flashing red/white!
12741              if( ( iMinsRemaining <= MINS_TO_FLASH_CONTRACT_TIME ) && ( fFlashContractFlag == TRUE ) )
12742              {
12743                    *pubFontColor = FONT_WHITE;
12744              }
12745              else
12746              {
12747                    *pubFontColor = FONT_RED;
12748              }
12749 
12750              swprintf(sString, L"%d%s", iHoursRemaining, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_HOURS_ABBREVIATION ] );
12751             }
12752       }
12753 }
12754 
12755 
12756 
12757 void InitPreviousPaths( void )
12758 {
12759       INT32 iCounter = 0;
12760 
12761       // init character previous paths
12762       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
12763       {
12764             gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] = NULL;
12765       }
12766 
12767       // init helicopter previous path
12768       gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath = NULL;
12769 }
12770 
12771 
12772 void RememberPreviousPathForAllSelectedChars( void )
12773 {
12774       INT32 iCounter = 0;
12775       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12776 
12777       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
12778       {
12779             if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
12780             {
12781                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
12782 
12783                   // remember his previous path by copying it to his slot in the array kept for that purpose
12784                   gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] = CopyPaths( GetSoldierMercPathPtr( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ] ), gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] );
12785             }
12786       }
12787 }
12788 
12789 
12790 void RestorePreviousPaths( void )
12791 {
12792       INT32 iCounter = 0;
12793       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
12794       PathStPtr *ppMovePath = NULL;
12795       UINT8 ubGroupId = 0;
12796       BOOLEAN fPathChanged = FALSE;
12797 
12798 
12799       // invalid if we're not plotting movement
12800       Assert( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) );
12801 
12802 
12803       if ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
12804       {
12805             ppMovePath = &( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath );
12806             ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
12807 
12808             // if the helicopter had a previous path
12809             if( gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath != NULL )
12810             {
12811                   gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath );
12812 
12813                   // clear current path
12814                   *ppMovePath = ClearStrategicPathList( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
12815                   // replace it with the previous one
12816                   *ppMovePath = CopyPaths( gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath, *ppMovePath );
12817                   // will need to rebuild waypoints
12818                   fPathChanged = TRUE;
12819             }
12820             else  // no previous path
12821             {
12822                   // if he currently has a path
12823                   if( *ppMovePath )
12824                   {
12825                         // wipe it out!
12826                         *ppMovePath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( *ppMovePath );
12827                         *ppMovePath = ClearStrategicPathList( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
12828                         // will need to rebuild waypoints
12829                         fPathChanged = TRUE;
12830                   }
12831             }
12832 
12833             if ( fPathChanged )
12834             {
12835                   // rebuild waypoints
12836                   RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
12837 
12838                   // copy his path to all selected characters
12839                   CopyPathToAllSelectedCharacters( *ppMovePath );
12840             }
12841       }
12842       else  // character(s) plotting
12843       {
12844             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
12845             {
12846                   // if selected
12847                   if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
12848                   {
12849                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ iCounter ].usSolID ];
12850 
12851                         if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
12852                         {
12853                               ppMovePath = &( pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].pMercPath );
12854                               ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].ubMovementGroup;
12855                         }
12856                         else if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
12857                         {
12858                               ppMovePath = &( pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].pMercPath );
12859                               ubGroupId = pVehicleList[ pSoldier->iVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup;
12860                         }
12861                         else if( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
12862                         {
12863                               ppMovePath = &( pSoldier->pMercPath );
12864                               ubGroupId = pSoldier->ubGroupID;
12865                         }
12866                         else
12867                         {
12868                               // invalid pSoldier - that guy can't possibly be moving, he's on a non-vehicle assignment!
12869                               Assert( 0 );
12870                               continue;
12871                         }
12872 
12873 
12874                         fPathChanged = FALSE;
12875 
12876                         // if we have the previous path stored for the dest char
12877                         if( gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] )
12878                         {
12879                               gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] );
12880 
12881                               // clear current path
12882                               *ppMovePath = ClearStrategicPathList( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
12883                               // replace it with the previous one
12884                               *ppMovePath = CopyPaths( gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ], *ppMovePath );
12885                               // will need to rebuild waypoints
12886                               fPathChanged = TRUE;
12887                         }
12888                         else  // no previous path stored
12889                         {
12890                               // if he has one now, wipe it out
12891                               if( *ppMovePath )
12892                               {
12893                                     // wipe it out!
12894                                     *ppMovePath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( *ppMovePath );
12895                                     *ppMovePath = ClearStrategicPathList( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
12896                                     // will need to rebuild waypoints
12897                                     fPathChanged = TRUE;
12898                               }
12899                         }
12900 
12901 
12902                         if ( fPathChanged )
12903                         {
12904                               // rebuild waypoints
12905                               RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath( *ppMovePath, ubGroupId );
12906                         }
12907                   }
12908             }
12909       }
12910 }
12911 
12912 
12913 void ClearPreviousPaths( void )
12914 {
12915       INT32 iCounter = 0;
12916 
12917       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
12918       {
12919             if( fSelectedListOfMercsForMapScreen[ iCounter ] == TRUE )
12920             {
12921                   gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ] = ClearStrategicPathList( gpCharacterPreviousMercPath[ iCounter ], 0 );
12922             }
12923       }
12924       gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( gpHelicopterPreviousMercPath, 0 );
12925 }
12926 
12927 
12928 void SelectAllCharactersInSquad( INT8 bSquadNumber )
12929 {
12930       INT8 bCounter;
12931       BOOLEAN fFirstOne = TRUE;
12932       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
12933 
12934       // ignore if that squad is empty
12935       if( SquadIsEmpty( bSquadNumber ) == TRUE )
12936       {
12937             return;
12938       }
12939 
12940       // select nobody & reset the selected list
12941       ChangeSelectedInfoChar( -1, TRUE );
12942 
12943       // now select all the soldiers that are in this squad
12944       for( bCounter = 0; bCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; bCounter++ )
12945       {
12946             // is this entry is valid
12947             if( gCharactersList[ bCounter ].fValid == TRUE )
12948             {
12949                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bCounter ].usSolID ];
12950 
12951                   // if this guy is on that squad or in a vehicle which is assigned to that squad
12952                   // NOTE: There's no way to select everyone aboard Skyrider with this function...
12953                   if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == bSquadNumber ) || IsSoldierInThisVehicleSquad( pSoldier, bSquadNumber ) )
12954                   {
12955                         if ( fFirstOne )
12956                         {
12957                               // make the first guy in the list who is in this squad the selected info char
12958                               ChangeSelectedInfoChar( bCounter, FALSE );
12959 
12960                               // select his sector
12961                               ChangeSelectedMapSector( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
12962 
12963                               fFirstOne = FALSE;
12964                         }
12965 
12966                         SetEntryInSelectedCharacterList( bCounter );
12967                   }
12968             }
12969       }
12970 }
12971 
12972 
12973 
12974 BOOLEAN CanDrawSectorCursor( void )
12975 {
12976       if( /*( fCursorIsOnMapScrollButtons == FALSE ) && */
12977                   ( fShowTownInfo == FALSE ) && ( ghTownMineBox == -1 ) &&
12978                   ( fShowUpdateBox == FALSE ) && ( GetNumberOfMercsInUpdateList() == 0 ) &&
12979                   ( sSelectedMilitiaTown == 0 ) && ( gfMilitiaPopupCreated == FALSE ) &&
12980                   ( gfStartedFromMapScreen == FALSE ) &&
12981                   ( fShowMapScreenMovementList == FALSE ) && ( ghMoveBox == - 1 ) &&
12982                   ( fMapInventoryItem == FALSE )
12983             )
12984       {
12985             return( TRUE );
12986       }
12987 
12988       return( FALSE );
12989 }
12990 
12991 
12992 
12993 void RestoreMapSectorCursor( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
12994 {
12995       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
12996 
12997 
12998       Assert( ( sMapX >= 1 ) && ( sMapX <= 16 ) );
12999       Assert( ( sMapY >= 1 ) && ( sMapY <= 16 ) );
13000 
13001       GetScreenXYFromMapXY( sMapX, sMapY, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
13002 
13003       sScreenY -= 1;
13004 
13005 /*
13006       if(fZoomFlag)
13007             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( ((INT16)( sScreenX - MAP_GRID_X )), ((INT16)( sScreenY - MAP_GRID_Y )), DMAP_GRID_ZOOM_X, DMAP_GRID_ZOOM_Y);
13008       else
13009 */
13010       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sScreenX, sScreenY, DMAP_GRID_X, DMAP_GRID_Y );
13011 }
13012 
13013 
13014 
13015 void RequestToggleMercInventoryPanel( void )
13016 {
13017       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
13018       {
13019             // stop mapscreen text
13020             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
13021             return;
13022       }
13023 
13024       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
13025       {
13026             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
13027       }
13028 
13029 
13030       if ( !CanToggleSelectedCharInventory() )
13031       {           
13032             return;
13033       }
13034 
13035       if( fShowDescriptionFlag == TRUE )
13036       {
13037             // turn off item description
13038             DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
13039       }
13040       else
13041       {
13042             // toggle inventory mode
13043             fShowInventoryFlag = !fShowInventoryFlag;
13044 
13045             // set help text for item glow region
13046             if( fShowInventoryFlag )
13047             {
13048                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 2 ] );
13049             }
13050             else
13051             {
13052                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, pMiscMapScreenMouseRegionHelpText[ 0 ] );
13053             }
13054       }
13055 
13056       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
13057 }
13058 
13059 
13060 
13061 void RequestContractMenu( void )
13062 {
13063       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
13064       {
13065             // stop mapscreen text
13066             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
13067             return;
13068       }
13069 
13070       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE )
13071       {
13072             return;
13073       }
13074 
13075       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
13076       {
13077             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
13078       }
13079 
13080 
13081       // in case we have multiple guys selected, turn off everyone but the guy we're negotiating with
13082       ChangeSelectedInfoChar( bSelectedInfoChar, TRUE );
13083 
13084       if ( CanExtendContractForCharSlot( bSelectedInfoChar ) )
13085       {
13086             // create
13087             RebuildContractBoxForMerc( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] );
13088 
13089             // reset selected characters
13090             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
13091 
13092             bSelectedContractChar = bSelectedInfoChar;
13093             giContractHighLine = bSelectedContractChar;
13094 
13095             // if not triggered internally
13096             if ( CheckIfSalaryIncreasedAndSayQuote( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], TRUE ) == FALSE )
13097             {
13098                   // show contract box
13099                   fShowContractMenu = TRUE;
13100 
13101                   // stop any dialogue by character
13102                   StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
13103             }
13104 
13105             //fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
13106       }
13107       else
13108       {
13109             // reset selected characters
13110             ResetAllSelectedCharacterModes( );
13111       }
13112 }
13113 
13114 
13115 
13116 void ChangeCharacterListSortMethod( INT32 iValue )
13117 {
13118       Assert( iValue >= 0 );
13119       Assert( iValue < MAX_SORT_METHODS );
13120 
13121       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
13122       {
13123             // stop mapscreen text
13124             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
13125             return;
13126       }
13127 
13128       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive == TRUE )
13129       {
13130             return;
13131       }
13132 
13133       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
13134       {
13135             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
13136       }
13137 
13138 
13139       giSortStateForMapScreenList = iValue;
13140       SortListOfMercsInTeamPanel( TRUE );
13141 }
13142 
13143 
13144 
13145 void MapscreenMarkButtonsDirty()
13146 {
13147       // redraw buttons
13148       MarkButtonsDirty( );
13149 
13150       // if border buttons are created
13151       if( !fShowMapInventoryPool ) 
13152       {
13153             // if the attribute assignment menu is showing
13154             if ( fShowAttributeMenu )
13155             {
13156                   // don't redraw the town button, it would wipe out a chunk of the attribute menu
13157                   UnMarkButtonDirty( giMapBorderButtons[ MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN ] );
13158             }
13159       }
13160 }
Generated on Sat Sep 9 13:48:35 2006 for Build by  1.4.7
